K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27a-18: da ltar byung ba ci'ang mi mkhyen pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27a-19: mi rtogs pa mi mnga' ba lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27a-20: bdag gi bu 'di rlung gis rgyab sgur por bgyis pa de sos par mdzad du gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27a-21: de dag gis kyang de la sngags dang sman mang du byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27a-22: 'on kyang sos par byed ma nus so; ;de nas khyim bdag de'i mdza' bo bshes ba'i grogs po sangs rgyas pa'i dge bsnyen zhig yod pa des de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27a-24: skyabs ma yin pa 'di dag la skyabs btsal te ci bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27b-0: @27b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27b-1: khyod kyi legs pa thams cad mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27b-7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27b-8: de nas khyim bdag des thos ma thag tu dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27b-9: dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'tsham pa'i chos bstan nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi mjug rdzogs nas khyim bdag de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27b-12: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi khyim du bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:27b-14: de nas khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-0: de nas des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po spyar nas nang bar sngar langs te gdan bshams nas phyag @28a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-1: chab kyi chur bkang ste bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-3: gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-6: chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs pa dang khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-7: me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-8: me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-9: mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu; mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-10: blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-11: mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-12: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la'ang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28a-13: de ltar mthong nas kyang khye'u de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-0: shin tu @28b dga' ba skyes nas de gus par sgrim pa'i tshul gyis khri las langs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-1: de khri las langs pa'i mod la rgyab sgur ba de snga mkho bzhin du rangs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-2: de nas de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-3: dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs nas 'di skad du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-5: bdag la dka' ba mdzad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-7: bdag la dka' ba mdzad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-10: de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-11: rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-15: bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:28b-18: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-1: nas khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-2: khye'u des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag bden pa rnams la bkod nas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-6: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-7: de nas phyi zhig na khye'u de'i blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba rnam pa du ma ni; bsal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-9: bde ba dang yid bde ba rnam pa du ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-11: sdig pa mi dag pa'i chos rnam pa du ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-13: dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-15: bdag gis khyim na gnas pa btang la bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad du 'gro'o snyam du bsam ste pha ma la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-16: btsun pa; bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29a-17: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-0: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par @29b spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-1: de nas de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-2: tshangs par spyod cig ces bka' stsal nas tshig de skad ces bka' stsal ba'i mod la skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-4: bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-7: chu snod thogs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-9: de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-10: de ni mgo bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-11: sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-12: mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lung phog nas des kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-15: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-16: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-17: gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-18: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-19: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-20: rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-21: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-22: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-23: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-24: gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:29b-25: de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-1: na; las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-3: las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyab sgur bur gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-4: bcom ldan 'das la brten te snga ma kho bzhin du rangs par gyur nas 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te ma mnyes par ma bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-8: dge slong 'dis las byas shing bsags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-10: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-13: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-14: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-16: de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu mtshe ma gnyis byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30a-17: de gnyis kyi btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-0: 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun @30b mar dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te gang gi tshe de gnyis tsher skyes pa de'i tshe de gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas de gnyis kyis pha ma la gsol te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs te de gnyis la mkhan pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-3: 'khor lo gnyis kyis gzung bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-5: kha ton byed pa'i 'khor lo 'di gnyis yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-8: thog mar re zhig kha ton la 'bad par bgyis la slad kyis bsam gtan bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-10: khyed gnyis ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du gyis shig ces byas nas des re zhig kha ton slob tu bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-11: de gnyis kyi nang na gcig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-16: gang gi tshe kha ton byas zin nas nyal bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-17: de'i tshe rgod bag can gcig shos kyis de nyal ba'i steng du yang dang yang ljid kyis 'debs par byas nas des de la btsun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-18: bdag la yang dang yang du gnod pa ma byed cig ces byas kyang des de'i dag ma nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-19: de nas de khros nas de nyid snad bar bya ba'i phyir drung du slob gcig bsgrengs te bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:30b-20: dge slong de'ang de la gtse ba'i phyir yang 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-0: de'i steng du ljid kyis phab nas de'i so phag de'i steng du phab ste rked pa chag nas gzhi de las @31a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-1: sdug bsngal chen po skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-2: de nas nu bo des kyang de'i lus kyi sdug bsngal mthong nas de'ang sems kyi sdug bsngal chen po skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-3: bdag gis mi dgos pa 'di lta bu byas pa nyis so snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas des sman pa dang yo byad rnams sbyar te phu bo'i nad g-yog byas nas des ri mo thogs par de'i rgyab sos par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-4: de gang gi tshe sos par gyur pa de'i tshe de shas char skyo ba skyes te lus rul pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-5: snying po med pa 'di ci dgos snyam nas des brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-7: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-8: nu bo des kyang des bya ba byas par rtogs nas de de la shin tu dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-9: dga' ba skyes nas de la bkur sti dang ldan pas g-yog byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-10: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-12: dge 'dun la'ang bkur sti byas nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de 'chi gar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-13: bdag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-15: dge 'dun la bkur sti byas nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyod kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31a-16: da dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @31b 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-1: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-2: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-3: bdag gis sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa'i las de'i skal ba can du bdag ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-4: ci ste bdag la las de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par gyur na'ang bdag gi lus dang sems kyi gnod pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis sel bar gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-7: de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-9: de khros nas phu bo'i rked pa bcag pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-10: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der rked pa chag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-11: des der smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-12: ci ste bdag la las de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par gyur na'ang bdag gi lus dang sems kyi gnod pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bsal bar gyur cig ces byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-13: da ltar ngas 'di gnod pa gnyis ka las yongs su bskyabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:31b-14: des der smon lam btab ste bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes @32a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-2: mi mnyas par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-3: da kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-4: 'di gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-6: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-9: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la; nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-11: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-12: de'i tshe dge slong mtshon mo dga' mo de'i tshe dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba na 'dug pa las phyi zhig na de'i blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-13: nyan thos chen mo gnas brtan ma gnas brtan ma rdzu 'phrul thob pa de dag rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di nas shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du'ang song /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-14: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-15: nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32a-16: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-0: gzhan yang ljongs 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i ljongs de dang de dag tu song nas kha zas gcing @32b ma bzang po dag khyer te 'ongs te za bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-1: bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul zhig thob na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-2: bdag kyang shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du'ang song /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-3: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-4: nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-5: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-6: gzhan yang ljongs 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye ba dang mi mang pos gang ba'i ljongs de dang de dag tu song la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-7: kha zas gtsang ma bzang po mang po blangs te bza' ba zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-8: ma la bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul bskyed par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-10: bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi man ngag ston nus pa su zhig yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-11: gal te bdag dge slong ma rnams kyi thad du song na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-12: 'di na dge slong ma rnams phrag dog can yin pas bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam mi ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-13: dge slong rnams kyang snyan sleb par dka' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-14: bdag cag gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams la gtam zer du'ang mi btub na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-15: rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi man ngag ston pa lta ci smos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-16: mal bdag drug sde rnams kyi thad du song na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-17: de dag bdag gi gnyen yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-18: rtag tu bdag gi don du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang phan par 'dod pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:32b-20: bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi man ngag ston kyang nus na bdag gis ji ltar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:33a-0: thog ma kho nar bdag gis de dag la zang zing gis gcams la phyis bdag gis 'di dag la don de'i gsol ba gdab bo snyam bsam nas des de dag spyan drangs te rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' @33a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:33a-1: ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:33a-5: rdzu 'phrul sgrub par 'tshal la; khyed kyang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par spyod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:33a-6: bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi man ngag bstan du gsol /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:37b-6: des gal te dge slong 'di bdag bsu bar yang mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:37b-7: ldang bar yang mi byed par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:37b-8: 'di'i mgo 'ud por bcad de sa la dor ro snyam du sdang ba'i sems kyis 'ongs par des mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:37b-9: des rgyal po de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te gom pa drug por nas bsu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:37b-10: bsu ba'i mod la rgyal po de'i lus las 'od 'byung ba de med par gyur te sa yang gas so; ;de nas de mthong ma thag tu rgyal po ska gnas dge slong 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:37b-13: bdag 'di la sdang ba'i sems kyis song ba las 'di'i mthus bdag gi 'od med par gyur la sa'ang gas par gyur to snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza ga la ba der song ste rkang pa la phyag btsal nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:37b-18: mi mkhas pa'i nongs pa bzod par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:37b-23: rang gi sems la bzod pa gsol cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-3: bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur lags grang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-7: khyod rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la srog gi bar chad du'ang mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-10: bdag gis khyod la gom pa drug bsu ba des na khyod zla ba drug gi bar du rgyal srid stor bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-11: zla ba drug lon nas phyir yang rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-13: gzhan yang bdag la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-14: sems dga' bar byas ma thag pa des na khyod sa'i 'og tu nub par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-15: khyod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yang slar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-16: de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal pos gnas brtan la sems dga' ba bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-17: sems dga' ba bskyed pa'i mod la de'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yang slar byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-18: sa gas pa yang slar 'byor par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-19: de nas rgyal po de gnas brtan la lhag par yang dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-20: dga' bar gyur nas gnas brtan gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te gnas brtan gyi thad nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-21: de nas phyi zhig na bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te ri dvags bshor du song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38a-22: de ri dvags kyi mig blangs te song nas dpung gi tshogs kyang logs shig tu song /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-0: rgyal po'ang logs @38b shig tu song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-1: de dpung gi tshogs dang bral nas 'brog 'chol te ba lang gi lhas shig tu song nas de der sus kyang ngo ma shes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-2: des kyang su'ang ngo mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-3: de myos nas de zla ba drug gi bar du ba lang gi lhas de nyid na 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-4: de nas de bu dang blon po dang zham ring 'khor rnams kyis kyang btsal ba las ma rnyed nas slar rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ong ste bdag cag gis ma rnyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-5: ji ltar bya gar song zhig gu snyam nas kha rog ste 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-6: de nas zla ba drug lon pa dang rgyal po de gzhan gyis mthong nas ngo shes te lha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-7: khyod ga las gshegs te 'dir byon ces dris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-8: rgyal po de'ang sems brtas nas des ba lang rdzi de la ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-11: thugs ston la spro ba chen po bskyed du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-12: bdag gis khyod nyid kyi pho brang du bskyal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-13: zhes smras nas ba lang rdzi des rgyal po de khrid de koo sh'ambhi logs su chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-14: blon po rigs pa'i mun 'dzin gyi bu zhes bya bas kyang zla ba drug lon pa dang yid la dran te rgyal po de gar gshegs shig gu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-15: bdag cag gis btsal dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-16: gal te bdag cag gis gson por rnyed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-17: de nyid rgyal po mdzad par zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-18: de ma yin te nongs par gyur na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-19: rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-20: snyam du bsam nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te grong khyer dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:38b-22: rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu tshol du dong ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39a-1: mun 'dzin gyi bus bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka thag ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39a-2: mthong nas kyang dga' ches te bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka ga la ba der song nas snyun gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39a-3: lha gang du gshegs zhes dris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39a-4: de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39a-5: blon po rigs pa'i mun 'dzin gyi bus smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39a-8: 'phags pa pindo la bha ra dhva dzas ji skad lung bstan pa thams cad de kho na bzhin du gyur pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39a-9: de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de gnas brtan la shin tu dga' bar gyur nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39a-10: re zhig bdag grong khyer du 'gro ba btang la 'phags pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza de nyid la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam du bsam nas koo sh'ambhir ma song bar khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39a-11: de ji srid du bzhon pas 'gro bar bya ba'i sa de srid du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas kun dga' ra bar song nas tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza'i rkang pa la phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39a-12: gnas brtan gyis kyang de la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39b-0: de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char gas tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza'i gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas @39b tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39b-1: 'phags pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dgung bdun gyi bar du bdag gi der bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39b-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dzas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39b-3: de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dzas cang mi smra bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te rkang pa la phyag btsal nas tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza'i thad nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39b-4: de nas des zhag bdun gyi bar du tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza 'khor dang bcas pa bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas tha ma'i nyin par re re la'ang ras zung re phul te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39b-5: tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dzas kyang de dang mthun pa'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39b-8: yang dag par dga' bar byas so; ;chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39b-11: yang dag par dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:39b-12: de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu ji srid dgyes pa'i bar bzhugs nas chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40a-1: gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas koo sh'ambhi ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs pa las mthar gyis koo sh'ambhir byon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40a-2: koo sh'ambhi na khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40a-3: de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bad sa'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te koo sh'ambhir byon pas koo shambhi na khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40a-5: thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40a-6: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40a-8: yang dag par gzengs bstod; yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40a-9: chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40a-12: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40a-13: de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40b-0: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun @40b dang bcas par dgung zla gsum gyi bar du bdag las na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams bzhes par ci gnang zhes gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40b-2: de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas khyim bdag gdangs las rig gi kun dga' ra bar yo byad thams cad sbyar nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas tha ma'i nyin par bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40b-3: dge slong gzhan dag la'ang re re la ras zung re phul nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40b-4: de'ang dus dus su bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas chos mnyan par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40b-5: bcom ldan 'das las chos nyan nas lhag par yang tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza 'ba' zhig gi thad du bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:40b-6: de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas the tshom skyes te rgyal po 'di ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza 'ba' zhig la lhag par bkur sti byed cig gu snyam nas de dag gis gtam de rgyas par thos so; ;thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol te 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-0: bad sa'i rgyal po 'char kas rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa pindo la bha ra dhva dza'i thad du @41a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-1: mchis nas gzhi des na de'i 'od ma mchis par gyur te dog sa la yang de'u nub pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-2: gang gi che des slar sems dga' ba bskyed pa de'i tshe 'od de'ang slar byung bar gyur la; dogs gas ba'ang slar 'byor par gyur pa la gzigs lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-6: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-7: 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na'ang grong khyer 'bras 'phel zhes bya ba na rgyal po lhun po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-8: de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-9: rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-10: 'bras s'a lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-11: bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-12: de nas rgyal po de'i mdun na 'don des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyis re zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-13: rigs dang mthun par ming btags nas 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus skyed bsrings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41a-14: de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-8: nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-9: mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-10: snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-11: srid srung gi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-13: mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-17: kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-18: de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-19: phyi zhig na des bdag gi pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid 'dzin pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-20: mthong nas kyang des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-21: pha shi ba'i 'og tu bdag gi cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid 'dzin pa'i bar du 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-22: bdag gis khyim na gnas pa btang la nags 'dabs su gnas bca' bar bya'o snyam du bsam nas pha ma la gsol te nags 'dabs su gnas bcas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-23: de der song nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-24: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i pho brang 'bras 'phel du phyin nas de'i phas bu de'i phyir bdag gi skyed mos tshal du yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil po phub nas yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te de la dus dus su skye bo phal po che 'dod zhing chos nyan par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:41b-25: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po lhun pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas ri dvags bshor du song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-1: skye bo phal po che mdun na 'don gyi skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-2: mthong nas kyang skye bo'i tshigs 'di dag gar 'dong zhes dris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-3: blon po rnams kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-4: lha; mdun na 'don gyi bu de rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-6: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-8: de la blta ba'i slad du mchi ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-9: de nas rgyal pos bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-11: nga'i yang snying du sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-14: dran par bya ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-15: nga'ang de blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam du bsam nas rgyal po de drang srong de ga la ba der song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-16: drang srong des de mthong nas bsu yang ma bsus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-18: de nas de mthong ma thag tu rgyal po de khro ba chen pos non nas 'di nga'i yul na 'dug pa'i mdun na 'don gyi bu yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-19: nga 'ongs na bsu yang ma bsus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-21: 'di'i mgo bo bcad de bor ro snyam du bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-22: rgyal po de'i lus las 'od 'byung ba de des sems bskyed ma thab tu 'od med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-23: sa yang gas te der nub tu byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-24: de mthong ma thag tu rgyal po de 'jigs pa chen po skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-26: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig yin no snyam nas dga' ba chen po skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-27: de nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag btsal nas bzod pa gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42a-28: de nas drang srong gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-0: 'on kyang @42b rang gi sems la bzod pa gsol cing [?] byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-1: de nas rgyal po skrag nas drang srong de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-3: bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-4: srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur lags grang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-8: khyod rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la srog gi bar chad du'ang mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-10: khyod kyis bdag la sems sdang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-12: khyod kyi 'od de med par gyur la sa yang gas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-14: khyod kyis slar bdag la dga' ba'i sems bskyed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-15: khyod kyi 'od de slar snga mkho bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-16: de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po des drang srong de la sems dga' ba skyes nas de'i 'od de snga mkho bzhin du byung bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-17: sa yang slar 'byor par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-20: de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-21: pindo la bha ra dhva dza 'di nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-22: rgyal po lhun por gyur pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-23: bad sa'i rgyal po 'char ka 'di nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-24: de'i tshe'ang 'dis de la sems sdang bar byas pas de'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor med par gyur la sa'ang gas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-25: gang gi tshe phyir sems dga' ba bskyed pa de'i tshe ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-26: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor de'ang byung la; sa gas pa'ang phyir 'byor par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:42b-27: da ltar yang 'dis de la sems sdang bar byas pas 'di'i 'od kyang med par gyur la sa'ang gas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-0: gang gi tshe 'dis de la sems dga' ba @43a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-2: 'di'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yang byung bar gyur la sa'ang 'byor par gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-3: rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-4: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-5: de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-6: de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-7: rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu go dang nad rnams med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-8: 'bras s'a lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-9: bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-10: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po de'i btsun mo la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-11: bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-12: bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-13: k'a shi'i rgyal po'i bu mo'ang yin la gzugs kyang mdzes pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-14: bu mo 'di'i ming k'a shi mdzes ldan ma zhes gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-16: de nas bu mo k'a shi mdzes ldan ma bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-17: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43a-18: dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-0: rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus @43b bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-1: de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur te sgyu rtsal shes par gyur ba de'i tshe des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma gnyis la gsol te sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-3: dge 'dun la bkur sti byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-4: de gang gi chen por gyur pa de'i tshe ka shi'i rgyal po'i bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de; 'jig rten na bu mo de dang 'dra ba gzhan med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-5: zhes kun tu grags pas rgyas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-6: de nas de thos ma thag tu nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug 'dod chags kyi mdas phog nas de dag thams cad kyis k'a shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-7: de dag re re nas bu mo de nga la byin cig ces spring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-8: de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po tshangs pas byin sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-9: gal te bu mo 'di gcig la byin na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-10: gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyur na su la byin par bya snyam bsam nas gang la'ang sbyin mi 'dod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-11: de nas phyi zhig na nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-12: des bdag cag la dad pas bu mo sbyin par mi 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:43b-13: der song la mthus dbrog go snyam du bsam ste thams cad kyis nyi ma gcig tu dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir dong ste kho ra khor yug nas bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-0: de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis bdag nyid pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gtses par rig nas @44a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-1: khang bzang gi steng du song nas lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas nas de bdag gis ji ltar bya snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-2: de nas k'a shi mdzes ldan mas rgyal po khang bzang gi steng du song nas lag pa la rkom tshugs bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-3: mthong nas kyang pha la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-5: ci'i slad du khang bzang gi steng du gshegs nas phyag la rkom tshugs bcas te thugs khong du chud cing bzhugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-11: bdag byad bzhin ngan lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-12: ci na bdag gi slad du yab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-13: thugs khong du chud cing bzhugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-16: khyod yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang ldan pas de'i phyir nga sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-17: khyod nyid kyi phyir nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug 'khrugs nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te lhags nas w'a ra n'a sir bskor te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-18: k'a shi mdzes ldan mas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-20: bu mo dag la rang nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam pa ma mchis lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44a-26: bdag nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam par gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-0: khyod nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams nga bzlugs kyi bar du sdod cig byas nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis nyi 'og gi rgyal po de dag thams cad la @44b bzlugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-1: k'a shi mdzes ldan ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-2: rang nyid khyim thab 'dam par chad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-3: gal te khyed 'dod na 'dam du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-4: de nas der so so nas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-6: nga lta bu btang ste gzhan 'dam par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-9: de nas pho nya de phyir song nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin la bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-10: de thos ma thag tu rgyal po tshangs pas byin shin tu dga' bar gyur to; ;rgyal po drug po de dag gis kyang gcig la gcig bzlugs nas yid ches pa'i mna' mtho bcad de mjal du ma byas nas sa phyogs go skabs yangs pa zhig tu khang pa brtsegs pa tshar du sbrengs te rang rang gi g-yog 'khor dang rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i sengge'i khri dag la 'dug cing 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-11: k'a shi mdzes ldan ma'ang bzhon ba bzang po la zhon te bu mo dag gis g-yog byas nas chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs te w'a ra n'a si nas byung nas de dag thams cad kyi dbus nas thal te drang srong smra ba logs su kha bltas nas bcom ldan 'das logs su me tog gi chun po bor te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la skyabs su mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-14: zhes byas nas shing rta de drang srong smra ba logs su kha bsgyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-15: de nas rgyal po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-16: skye bo phal po che de dag ya mtshan du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:44b-17: 'di 'di ltar byad gzugs mdzes la 'dod pa rnams la'ang mi lta ba ngo mtshar to snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-0: de nas de dag de nyid kyi phyi bzhin du 'brang @45a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-1: ste re zhig 'dong la 'di ci byed pa blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-3: de nas k'a shi mdzes ldan ma drang srong smra ba ga la ba der song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-4: de ci srid du bzhon pas 'gro bar bya ba'i sa de srid du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas kun dga' ra bar song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-6: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-7: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta ma'i 'gugs pa btang ste de la gtad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-9: skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'is kyang de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-12: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-13: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45a-14: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-0: tsandan spangs pa @45b lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-1: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-2: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-3: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-4: dbang po dang nye dbang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-5: skye bo phal po che de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-7: de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan nas rang rang gi yul du dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-8: de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-10: k'a shi mdzes ldan mas las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-11: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rgyal po'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-12: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang byad gzugs dpe ma mchis par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-13: des bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:45b-16: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-1: 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-4: sbyon [?] byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-7: skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-8: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-10: de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra n'a sin khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-11: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-12: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-13: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dga' ma bcu lon pa dang bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46a-14: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags te 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-0: de nas de gang gi tshe na chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma la @46b gsol te rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas sangs rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-1: dge slong rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas pha ma gnyis la gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-3: de rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-5: thos par bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-8: bdag gis bsam gtan la 'bad par bya'o snyam du bsam nas yid la byed pa'i lung mnos te srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas bas byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed nas des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de 'chi gar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-9: kye ma bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-10: rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-11: bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der ci nas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-12: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:46b-13: byad gzugs dpe med par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung @47a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-1: bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-2: mi mnyan par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-3: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs ba thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-6: de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong ma gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-7: k'a shi mdzes ldan ma 'di nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-8: des der sbyin pa dag byin cing bsod nams dag byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-9: tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi gar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-10: bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-11: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang; byad gzugs dpe med par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-13: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-14: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47a-15: bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-0: gzugs @47b bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-1: byad gzugs dpe med par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-3: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-4: shugs mnyam pa dang; mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-5: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-6: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-7: des der byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-8: gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der byad gzugs dpe med par gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-11: bde byed ma zhes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-12: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-13: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-14: w'a ra n'a si na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-15: rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed pa las de gnyis phan tshun mi mthun par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-16: dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-17: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te ko sa la'i yul du song nas chu klung ldan gyi 'gram du phru ma btab ste 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:47b-18: rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas bdag dang g-yul 'gyed du 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-0: thos nas des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas k'a shi'i rgyal @48a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-1: po dang g-yul 'gyed du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-2: des kyang chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du phru ma btab ste 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-3: de nas de gnyis de na 'khod pas phan tshun du skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-4: de gnyis ka'ang mthu che zhing tshugs par dka' ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-5: de gnyis gcig gis gcig mi thub cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-6: de nas phyi zhi ga na de kho na 'khod bzhin du rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-7: k'a shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig kyang btsas nas der de gnyis so so'i pho brang 'khor du dga' ba'i rol mo brdungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-8: de nas de gnyis kyis phan tshun du thos nas 'dir dga' ba'i rol mo brdungs pa na ci zhig ces dris nas blon po rnams kyis bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-9: rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo btsas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-11: sras po bltams so zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-12: rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po rnams kyang bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-15: rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-18: de nas de thos ma thag tu de gnyis dga' bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-19: bdag cag gnyis phan tshun dgrar mi byed par gnyen byed pa'i thabs rnyed do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48a-20: de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la pho nya btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-0: khyod kyi bu mo btsas pa de bdag gi bu 'di'i chung mar byin cig @48b ces spring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-1: de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-3: bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang mdza' bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des kyang de la pho nya btang ste ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-4: zhes byas nas de gnyis gcig la gcig bzod par gsol te mdza' bo byas nas gcig gis kyang bu mo la gos dang rgyan mang po bskur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-5: gcig gis kyang khye'u la gos dang rgyan mang po bskur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-6: de gnyis phan tshun gnyen du byas nas mgul nas 'jus te yul de nas dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-7: de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-8: bu mo 'di btsas pas nga rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang bde bar gyur to snyam nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-9: ming bde byed ma zhes btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-10: de nas bu mo bde byed ma 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-11: de nas gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-13: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas sbyin pa dag byin te bsod nams dag byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:48b-14: dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du'ang rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro zhing chos nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-0: de nas phyi zhig na des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs nas rdzu 'phrul chen mo mthu chen mo rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam @49a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-2: de nas phyi zhig na des pha ma gnyis kyi mdun du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-5: chos 'di lta bu thob pas na 'dod pa yongs su spyod pa'i rngo mi thogs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-6: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-7: pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-9: khyod btsas ma thag tu bdag cag gis khyim thab la byin zin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-10: bdag cag gis gnang bar byar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-12: bdag cag gis de la bzlugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-13: de dang bdag cig ci nas phyis 'khon du mi 'gyur bar byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-14: bag ma len pa 'ongs nas khyod nyid kyis khyim thab la gsol ba thob la rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-15: de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la pho nya btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-16: bu mo bde byed ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-17: rab tu 'byung bar 'dod de bzlog par mi nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-18: ma thogs par bag ma longs shig ces spring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-19: rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang pho nya btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-21: bag ma btang ba'i sta gon gyis shig ces spring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-22: de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos ma thag tu bag ma gtang ba'i sta gon byas so; ;rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang bu 'byor ba chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49a-23: rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-0: de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de bkur sti chen pos @49b mnyan du yod par g-yar drangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-1: g-yar drangs nas rang gi pho brang du stegs bu byas te rgyan gyis brgyan nas der skye bo phal che 'dus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-2: bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis klubs nas stegs bu brgyan pa de'i steng du drangs te bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-3: khye'u de'ang stegs bu brgyan pa de'i steng du btang ste bu mo bde byed ma drang bar byas pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-4: de steng gi bar snang la 'phags te 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-7: glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-9: skye bo de dag gis mthong ma thag tu bde byed ma la dga' ba chen po skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-10: de nas khye'u des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-11: gal te 'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-12: 'di bdag dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa yongs su sbyod par ga la 'gyur snyam du bsam nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-14: mar spyon dang khyod nyid ci dgar 'dam du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-18: 'dod pa yongs su spyod pa'i rngo mi thogs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-19: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:49b-22: de nas de thos ma thag tu bu mo bde byed ma babs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-0: des skye bo'i tshogs de dag la chos bstan nas pha ma gnyis la gsol te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol @50a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-2: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-3: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-4: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'i la gtad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-6: skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'is kyang de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-9: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-10: dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-11: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-12: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-13: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-14: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-15: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-16: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-17: gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-19: bde byed ma de ltar rab tu byung nas rgyal po'i bu des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50a-20: bud med kyis kyang 'di lta bu'i chos rtogs par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-0: ma la bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das @50b kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gor ma chag snyam du bsam nas des kyang pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas des kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-2: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-3: de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-5: bu mo bde byed ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-6: rgyal po'i bu des las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-7: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-8: 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-10: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to; ;btsun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-11: 'di gnyis kyis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-14: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-15: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-18: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-19: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:50b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51a-0: de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhig @51a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51a-1: gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51a-2: de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas de gnyis gcig la gcig smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51a-4: bdag cag gnyis la bu'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51a-5: bu mo'ang med pas 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu ci bdog pa 'di dag rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51a-6: bdag cag gnyis gson gyi bar du ci 'di dag 'jig rten pha rol tu bskyal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51a-7: zhes zer nas de gza' bran gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul te yo byad thams cad sbyar nas dge slong rnams la bsnyen bkur byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51a-8: de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyi blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51a-9: bdag cag gnyis khyim na gnas pa btang la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51a-10: zhes zer nas khyim gyi 'khor btang ste sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs nas de gnyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang mthob pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51b-0: de gnyis kyis 'chi gar smon lam btab @51b pa; kye ma bdag cag gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas te tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gnyis ci nas gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51b-2: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51b-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gnyis kyis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51b-4: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51b-5: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51b-8: de'i tshe gza' bran du gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51b-10: rgyal po'i bu 'di nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:51b-11: de gnyis kyis der sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de 'chi gar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-1: pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-4: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-5: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-6: nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-7: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-8: de'i tshe lha'i bu nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul bar thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-9: lus do shal dang se mo dos mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-10: lha'i bu nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang 'od shin tu che ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-11: 'od 'phags pa des lha'i me tog autpa la dang padma dang ku mu da dang padma dkar po rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste nam sros pa dang mnyan du yod pa'i nang du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog autpa la dang padma dang ku mu da dang padma dkar po rnams dang lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dag gis gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52a-15: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-0: de thos nas lha'i bu des stan de nyid @52b la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-1: des bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-2: de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur len pa la gnas pa de dag gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-3: mthong nas kyang de dag gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-5: mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-6: lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-7: rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs sam snyam nas bcom ldan 'das la don de zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-10: mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-11: lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-12: rgyal po chen po bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-15: mdang sum mi mjed pa'i bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-16: lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-17: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-19: lha'i gzhal med khang 'od shin tu che ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-20: 'od 'phags pa de mdang sum pa la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:52b-21: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'ongs nas de 'ongs pa la ngas chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-0: @53a *// des nga las chos thos nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-1: des bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-3: lha'i bu des las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-4: las de'i rnam par smin pas lhar skyes te nor bu rin po che'i gnas su grub par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-5: bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-8: nor bu'i 'od 'di nyid kyis sngon las byas shing bsags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-10: las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-11: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-14: rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-15: las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-18: skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-19: lus can dag gi las rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-20: bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-21: tshogs shing dus la bab pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-24: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-25: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-28: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53a-29: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung @53b zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-1: de'i che w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-2: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-3: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-4: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dbu skra dang sen mo blangs nas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-5: des gtsug lag khang der yo byad thams cad phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-6: mchod rten char khebs la'ang nor bu rin po che btags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-7: de'i mthus mchod rten dang bcas pa'i gtsug lag khang de mtshan mo'ang nyin mo bzhin du snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-8: de nas des gtsug lag khang de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-9: dge slong rnams la'ang yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen ba kur byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-10: tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-11: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang bsrungs nas lha'i nang du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-12: der skyes nas de'i nor bu rin po che gzhal med khang grub par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-15: de'i tshe khyim bdag gang gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la mchod rten dang bcas pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas nor bu rin po che btags pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:53b-16: lha'i bu'i nor bu'i 'od 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-0: des der rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i mchod rten dang bcas @54a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-1: pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-2: mchod rten de la nor bu rin po che btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lha'i nang du skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-4: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-7: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-8: sna ma'i me tog ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-9: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-10: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-11: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-12: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-13: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las khyim bdag de bu med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-14: bu 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la'ang gsol ba 'debs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-19: tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-20: kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-22: lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54a-24: gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-0: rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la'ang gsol ba 'debs @54b la; 'jig rten na gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-4: gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-5: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-7: gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-9: pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-10: ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-12: dri za'i sems kyang rjes su chags pa dang ldan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-13: khong khro ba dang ldan pa rnam pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba skyes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-14: de nas de'ang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-15: sems can chen po che bar grags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-16: srid pa tha ma btsal bar bya ba rnyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-17: thar ba'i skal ba can du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-19: mya ngan las 'das pa la nang du bltas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-20: 'khor ba la phyi rol tu bltas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-21: srid par 'gro ba'i skye gnas rnams mi 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-22: lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa zhig kyang de'i chung ma'i mngal du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-23: bu med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-24: thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de; lnga gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-25: skyes pa chags par yang shes la ma chags par yang shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-26: dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:54b-27: bu chags pa shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-2: khye'u yang shes la bu mo'ang shes pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-3: gal te khye'u yin na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-4: lto g-yas logs su rten cing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-5: gal te bu mo yin na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-6: lto g-yon logs su rten cing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-7: de nas gang gi tshe de la bu chags par 'gyur ba de'i tshe de dga' ches nas khyim thab la sbran pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-10: bdag gi rum g-yas logs su rten cing gnas pa las khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-11: dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas nas de'ang dga' ches te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-15: brkyangs nas bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-16: bdag gi bu rung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-17: mi rung bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-18: bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-19: gsos na gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-20: nor skal la spyod par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-21: bdag gi rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-22: bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu'ang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-23: sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song zhig ces yon bsngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55a-24: des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzang gi steng du nyams rangs su bzhag ste grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-0: @55b tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-1: sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-2: ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-3: ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-4: ha cang lan tshva cha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-5: ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-6: ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-7: ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-8: kha ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshva dang mngar ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-9: do shal dang se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-10: lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang /
