K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-11: khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gis gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-12: des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci'ang mi thos par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig ba'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-14: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-15: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-17: 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-18: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-19: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-20: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-21: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-22: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-23: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:55b-24: chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-0: @56a *// mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-7: su ni; nyam nga bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-11: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-17: ngan song du bab; su ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-18: ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar ba dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-20: nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-22: 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-24: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-26: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-28: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-30: sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-31: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-32: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid; ;gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-33: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56a-34: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-0: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin @56b mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-1: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten la lta bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-2: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten la bltas na srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can zhig gis khyim bdag de'i chung ma chen ma'i ltor nying mtshams sbyar bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-5: ci sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-6: 'on te nyan thos kyis 'dul bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-7: de bdag nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur bar mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-8: de'ang sngon chad khyim de'i bsen yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-9: des khyim bdag de brtan por bya ba'i phyir zla med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-10: g-yog med par gcig pu khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-11: khyim bdag des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa zla med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-12: g-yog med par gcig pu 'ong ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-15: zhabs 'bring ma mchis par gcig pu gshegs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-16: 'phags pa'i zhabs 'bring bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis sam zhes dris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-17: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:56b-18: khyed cag lta bu 'ba' zhig las rnyed pa ma gtogs par bdag cag gis gud na g-yog ga la rnyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-1: las rnyed pa 'ba' zhig bdag cag gi g-yog byed par zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-4: bdag gi mchis brang la bu chags pa mchis kyi; de las gal te khye'u zhig btsas par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-5: de bdag gis 'phags pa'i zhabs ring du dbul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-6: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-7: khong dge ba dag ni dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-8: zhes de skad smras nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-9: khyim bdag de'i chung ma'ang zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-10: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-11: de'i lus thams cad nas sna ma'i me tog gi dri'i ngad ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-12: des khyim de thams cad sna ma'i me tog gi dris 'gengs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-13: khye'u de mngal du zhugs pa dang btsas pa'i tshe'ang khyim de kun tu sna ma'i me tog gi char 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-14: de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di ming ci skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-15: khye'u 'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-16: btsas pa'i tshe khyim du sna ma'i me tog gi char 'bab pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57a-17: de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming sna ma'i me tog ces gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-0: de nas khye'u sna ma'i me tog 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye @57b drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-1: de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-10: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-13: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-15: go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-21: brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-22: de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-23: khye'u de rab tu dbyung ba'i dus la bab par mthong nas khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste khyim bdag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-26: ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas khyod kyis bdag gi g-yog tu byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-28: dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-29: de kho na ltar dam ma bcas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-32: de kho na ltar dam bcas lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-33: zhes smras nas khye'u de lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ste tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la phul nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-35: khyod ma btsas pa'i snga rol nas 'phags pa ma 'gags pa la ngas phul gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-36: song la 'phags pa'i zhabs 'bring gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:57b-39: bdag la phan gdags pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-0: zhes byas nas khye'u de tshe dang @58a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-1: ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i phyi bzhin du chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-2: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas kyang khyim bdag de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-5: yang dag par dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-6: de nas khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas gtsug lag khang du khrid nas rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-9: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-10: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-11: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-12: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-13: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-14: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-15: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-16: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58a-17: gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-0: de'ang rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che la bsam gtan dang rnam par thar ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du @58b thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-3: khab lan re 'dzugs pa'i yun tsam la ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang gzhan dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-4: de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba rnam pa du ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-7: bde ba dang yid bde ba rnam pa du ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-9: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-11: dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-13: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin ji ltar bsab par bya snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-15: sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-16: sems can la phan pa'i phyir 'byung bar zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-17: ma la bdag gis kyang sems can la phan pa bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-18: de nas des bdag gis gdul bar 'gyur ba 'ga' lta yod dam snyam du bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-19: des thog ma kho nar pha ma gnyis mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-20: mthong nas kyang des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-21: thabs ci zhig gis de gnyis 'dul bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:58b-22: des rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul bar rig nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te rang gi khyim du pha ma gnyis kyi mdun logs nas sa brtol te byung nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug ste 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-3: glog 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan nas babs te stan bshams pa la 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-4: de 'dug nas pha ma gnyis la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-5: de nas khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-6: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas te bden pa mthong nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-7: de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-9: sna ma'i me tog gis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-10: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-11: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-12: btsas ma thag tu'ang lus thams cad sna ma'i me tog gi dad ldang zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-14: btsas pa'i tshe'ang khyim du sna ma'i me tog gi char phab la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59a-15: 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-0: @59b pha ma gnyis kyis kyang las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-1: des de kho na la brten nas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te ma mnyes par ma bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-4: 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-6: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-9: skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa pa; lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-11: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-12: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-13: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-14: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-15: phyi zhig de'i chung ma la bu chags nas des zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-16: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-17: de nas de cher skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:59b-18: des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma la gsol te rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-0: rab tu byung nas sde snod @60a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-1: gsum bslabs te rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur nas des pha ma gnyis dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la bkod de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-2: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-3: sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' la'ang btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-4: phyi zhig na des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-5: bdag gis thos pa'i sgo nas bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-8: bdag gis dge 'dun gyi zhal ta bya'o snyam du bsam nas pha ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-10: khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag la bskul te dge 'dun la 'bras chan dang thug pa btung ba dang skyo ma rnams dang gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-12: de bzhin du dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten rnams la'ang til mar gyis byug pa dang spos kyis byug pa dang mar me'i phreng ba dang sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba dang gdugs kyang phul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-13: sna ma'i me tog gi sil mas kyang gtor nas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-14: kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60a-15: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-0: bdag gi lus thams cad @60b nas kyang sna ma'i me tog gi dri'i ngad ldang bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-1: mngal du zhugs pa dang btsas pa'i tshe'ang bdag gi khyim du sna ma'i me tog gi char 'bab par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-3: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-4: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-5: shes rab kyang rno bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-9: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang thob ste snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba la myur bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-10: khab lan re 'dzugs pa'i yun tsam la'ang ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-11: gzhan dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-12: de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de mthong nas dris pa; bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-13: khyod kyis smon lam ci zhig btab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-14: des de gnyis la bdag gis smon lam 'di ltar btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-16: pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-17: khyod kho na bdag cag gnyis kyi bur gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:60b-18: bdag cag gnyis kyang khyod kyi pha mar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-0: khyod kho na la brten te bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par @61a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-2: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-5: de'i tshe dge slong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-6: sna ma'i me tog 'di nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-7: de der yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas chos bzhin du zhal ta byas te sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-9: dge 'dun la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-10: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-11: btsas ma thag tu'ang de'i lus thams cad nas sna ma'i me tog gi dri'i ngad ldang bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-13: btsas pa'i tshe'ang de'i khyim du sna ma'i me tog gi char bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-15: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-18: thabs mnyam pa rnyed par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-19: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61a-20: shes rab rno bar gyur te bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-0: @61b snyoms par 'jug pa rnams thob nas snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba la myur bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-1: khab lan re 'dzugs pa'i yun tsam la'ang ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-2: gzhan dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-3: de'i tshe pha mar gyur pa de gnyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-5: de gnyis kyis der smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-6: khyod kho na la brten nas bdag cag gnyis kyis sh'akya'i rgyal po mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-7: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-8: ces byas pas da ltar 'di kho na la brten te 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-9: nga la byin ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-10: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-12: der bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag cig gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i la du 'grangs tshad cig phul ba dang; de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'greng ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-13: bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag des ro brgya dang ldan pa'i la du 'grangs tshad cig phul ba bram ze'i khye'u des mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-14: mthong nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:61b-15: la du de la chags pa skyes nas de bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-0: @62a *// nga la byin cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-3: gal te khyod kyis 'di skad du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-4: la tu 'di bdag la mi dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-7: de nas des kye goo ta ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-8: la du 'di bdag la mi dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-10: de skad ces smras nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la la du de byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-11: de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-13: bsod snyoms gzhan bzhes mi srid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-15: gnas med cing skabs ma yin no snyam du rig nas bram ze'i khye'u de gud du bkar te bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-18: bcom ldan 'das la phyir phul cig dang bdag gis khyod la karsha pa na lnga brgya sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-21: khyod ci ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-22: zhes byas nas bram ze'i khye'u des la du de bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms de bzhes nas gtsug lag khang du gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-0: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis kyang bram ze'i khye'u de khyim du khrid de zan byin nas karsha pa na lnga brgya byin te @62b btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-1: de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-3: kye ma bram ze'i khye'u 'dis bcom ldan 'das las la du blangs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de ma stsal la; gang gi tshe des kye goo ta ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-4: la tu 'di bdag la mi dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-5: zhes smras pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de la la du stsal ba la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-8: tshe rabs stong phrag du mar blang ba'i 'du shes 'ba' zhig kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas nas 'di rtag tu gzhan 'ba' zhig la re bar gyur pas ngas 'di da ltar la dus brid nas blang ba'i 'du shes las bzlog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-10: phung po yongs su spong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-11: btsun pa; bram ze'i khye'u 'di'i phung po gang du yongs su spong bar 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-13: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri bo zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-14: de'i gsung rab la 'dis mir skye ba thob nas rgyu 'di kho nas rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-15: las brgya tham pa bam po bzhi pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:62b-17: gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-0: @63a *// de'i tshe yul takshe sh'a la na rgyal po padma'i snying po can zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-1: de'i ring la 'byor ba dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-2: rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-3: 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang mu ge dang nad rnams med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-4: 'bras s'a lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-5: bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-6: de nas de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-7: btsun mo la bu chags nas de'i yid la gzhung smra ba rnams dang lhan cig tu rtsod kyang ci ma rung snyam du yid la 'dod pa de lta bu zhig skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-8: de nas rgyal pos de thos ma thag tu ltas mkhan rnams la bstan te ltas mkhan rnams na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-10: lto na mchis pa'i sems can de'i mthu lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-12: bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par 'gyur la gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-13: de'i slad du 'di'i yid la 'dod pa de lta bu skyes pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-17: gal te btsun mo'i yid la 'dod pa skyes pa de ma bsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63a-19: ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-0: sras de yan lag ma tshang bar skye bar 'gyur lags @63b so; ;de nas rgyal pos bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-1: bdag gi bu yin la yan lag ma tshang bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas btsun mo yol ba'i nang du bzhag ste gzhung smra ba thams cad bsags nas gzu bo rnams kyang bskos te gzhung gis rtsod du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-2: de nas des gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad nas de'i yid la 'dod pa skyes pa de med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-3: de nas de zla ba dgu'a ma bcu lon pa dang bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-4: bu mo 'di'i ming ci skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-5: bu mo 'dis mas 'dus pa'i nang du gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-7: zhes gdags so zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-8: de nas bu mo 'dus mo pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-9: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-10: dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-11: rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de sred med kyi bu'i lag na thogs pa'i rma bya'i mdongs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-13: 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed ba sring te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:63b-14: de nas de gang gi tshe de chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe de rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du yol ba'i nang du bzhag nas yi ge bslabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-0: de yi ge byang nas des yol ba'i nang 'ba' zhig tu bstan @64a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-1: bcos thams cad bslabs nas yul taksha sh'i la der gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-2: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal pos bu mo de la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-3: khyod ngas su la sbyin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-5: sus gzhung brtsad pas bdag thub par nus la de la stsal bar gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-6: de nas rgyal pos de thos nas 'dis 'di lta bu'i tshig smras pa las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-8: ngas gzhung smra ba gang gis 'di thub pa de 'ba' zhig la sbyin par bya'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-9: byad gzugs bzang ba la'ang mi sbyin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-10: rigs mtho ba la rang mi sbyin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-11: dbang phyug dang ldan pa la'ang mi sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-13: de nas de'i sgra de kun tu grags nas de thos ma thag tu phyogs kun nas gzhung smra ba rnams lhag pa las bu mo des thams cad tshar bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-14: de nas de'i tshe lho phyogs na gzhung smra ba ri'u zhes bya ba bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-17: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-18: kha dog shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des yul taksha sh'i la'i rgyal po padma'i snying po'i sras mos gzhung sgra ba thams cad tshar bcad la de'i yab kyis kyang de lta bur dam bcas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64a-20: de thos ma thag tu de ya mtshan du gyur te bdag der song la de ci shes pa blta'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-0: de nas @64b de 'khor lnga brgya dang chas te grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang nags khrod kyi grong dang yul po che rnams su rgyu zhing gzhung smra ba rnams kyang tshar gcod par byed pa las mthar gyis yul takshe sh'a lar phyin nas des rgyal po padma'i snying po can gyi thad du song nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-1: bdag gis thos na lha'i sras mos gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad ces gda' na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-2: bdag gis kyang mkhan po las bstan bcos bslabs pa dag mchis pas bdag kyang de dang bka' mchid bgyi bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-4: khyod ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-5: zhes smras nas rgyal po des gzhung smra ba'i 'khor bsags te so so'i gzhung btsugs nas bu mo de yol ba'i nang du bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-6: bu mo des gzhung smra ba'i ri'u zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-7: kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa mthong nas de mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags kyi mdas phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-9: bdag gis khyim thab 'di 'dra ba ga las kyang mi rnyed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-10: 'di kho na bdag gi khyim thab tu bya dgos kyi gzhan ni mi 'dod do snyam du bsam nas des ci nas gzhung smra ba des bdag thub par 'gyur ba de ltar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-11: de nas rgyal pos bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:64b-12: bdag gis dam bcas pa la gzhung smra ba gang gis 'di thub par 'gyur ba de la bdag gis 'di sbyin par bya'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-0: bdag gis 'di byad gzugs bzang ba la'ang @65a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-1: mi sbyin; rigs mtho ba la'ang mi sbyin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-2: dbang phyug dang ldan pa la'ang mi sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-4: 'dis 'di thub par gyur la 'di'ang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-5: bdag gis 'di las lhag pa gud nas gzhung smra ba ches khyad par du 'phags pa mi rnyed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-6: ma la bdag gis 'di kho na la sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsam nas khyim pa rnams kyi khyim pa'i chos gang yin pa de bzhin du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-7: bu mo de de la byin nas dbang phyug chen por yang bskos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-8: de'ang de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-9: de nas phyi zhig na bu mo de la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-10: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-11: khye'u 'di rus k'a ty'a ya na yin la 'dus mo'i bu yin pas na 'dus pa'i k'a ty'a ya na zhes gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-13: de nas khye'u 'dus pa'i k'a ty'a ya na 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65a-14: de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-2: nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-3: mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-4: snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-5: srid srung gi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-7: mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-11: kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-12: de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-13: des lo bcu drug lon nas bstan bcos thams cad rtogs te gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad nas de'i blo 'di lta bu zhig skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-14: dzambu'i gling na bdag dang mnyam pa'ang med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-15: lhag pa lta ci smos snyam du rlom pa des skye bo phal po che la khyad du gsod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-16: de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-18: khyod bdag dang mnyam pa su'ang med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-19: lhag pa lta ci smos snyam du rlom pa 'dis rgyags par ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-20: khye'u yul dbus na sh'akya'i bu zhig skyes pa de bram ze ltas mkhan bye brag phyed pa rnams kyis lung bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-21: gal te khyim na gnas na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-22: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-23: gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos tshon can bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:65b-24: 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes sgra cher grags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-2: de skra dang kha spu bregs te chos gos tshon can bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-3: khyod kyi gzugs dang shes rab kyis kyang brgya'i char yang mi phod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-4: stong gi char yang mi phod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-5: 'bum gyi char yang mi phod; khrag khrig gi char yang mi phod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-6: grangs su bgrang du'ang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-8: de nas khye'u des sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas spu thams cad zing zhes byas te lta 'dod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-9: de nas des pha ma la gsol te yab yum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-10: bdag yul dbus su mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-11: bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal gyi; gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-12: de nas pha ma gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-14: bdag cag gis bzlog par mi nus so snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-15: sdod cig dang bdag cag gnyis kyis khyim gyi 'khor btang nas de'i 'og tu lhan cig tu dong la bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66a-16: zhes de skad smras nas de gnyis kyis khyim gyi 'khor btang ste sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas yul dbus su dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-0: de dag mthar gyis dong dong ba las rgyal po'i khyim du phyin nas de dag bcom @66b ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-1: khye'u de dang de'i pha ma gnyis kyis thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-2: me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-3: me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-4: mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-5: mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-6: blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-7: mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-9: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la'ang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-10: de ltar mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-11: dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:66b-15: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-0: de rnams kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po @67a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-1: nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom 'das rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-2: de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-4: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-5: bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-7: de gnyis la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-8: de gnyis kyis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-10: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-11: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-12: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-13: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67a-14: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-0: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa @67b dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-1: de nas 'dus mo'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta mi la gtad nas de'ang des rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-4: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-5: de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-7: 'dus pa'i k'a ty'a ya nas las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-8: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-9: bstan bcos thams cad rtogs te gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-10: 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-12: de'i pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-13: 'di nyid la brten nas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-16: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:67b-18: 'di rnams kyis gang du smon lam btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68a-3: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68a-6: skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68a-7: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68a-9: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na bram ze zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68a-10: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68a-11: de nas de cher skyes nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas pha ma gnyis la gsol te; yab yum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68a-12: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68a-13: de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68a-14: bu khyod bdag cag gnyis kyi bu gcig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong la phongs pa dang mthun par byed pa yin pas na bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang gnang bar byar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-0: 'on kyang de pha ma @68b gnyis thabs sna tshogs kyis bzlog ma nus nas de pha ma gnyis kyis gnang ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-1: des sde snod gsum bslabs nas rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-2: gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zong rnams rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-3: de nas des pha ma gnyis dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-4: skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas nas de gnyis sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' la btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-5: de nas phyi zhig na des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-6: bdag gis thos pa'i sgo nas bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-9: bdag gis dge 'dun gyi zhal ta chos bzhin du bya'o snyam nas des pha ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-11: sbyin pa po gzhan dag la bskul nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bshos gsol te dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten rnams la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-12: skye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-13: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:68b-15: de gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan po des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-0: lo bcu drug lon pa na bstan bcos thams cad rtogs nas gzhung smra @69a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-1: pa thams cad kyang tshar bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-2: de bzhin du de'i pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-3: de nas des smras pa; ji ltar na bdag gi mkhan pos lo bcu drug lon pa na bstan bcos thams cad rtogs nas gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-4: de bzhin du de'i pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-5: de gnyis kyis kyang gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar bcad pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang lo bcu drug kho na lon pa na bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-6: gzhung smra ba thams cad tshar gcod par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-7: de bzhin du bdag gi pha ma gnyis kyang gzhung smra ba thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-9: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-10: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-11: de nas de smon lam 'debs shing 'dug pa pha ma gnyis kyis mthong nas de gnyis kyis de la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69a-13: khyod kyis smon lam ci zhig btab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-0: de nas des pha ma gnyis la bdag gis smon @69b lam 'di ltar btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-2: pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-3: de'i tshe bdag cag gnyis khyod kyi pha ma gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur cig khyod kyang bdag cag gnyis kyi bur gyur cig khyod kho na la brten te bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-4: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-5: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-8: de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong du gyur ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-9: 'dus pa'i k'a tya ya na 'di nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-10: de'i tshe de'i pha mar gyur pa gnyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-11: pha ma 'di nyid kho na yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-12: des der sbyin pa dag byin cing bsod nams dag byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-13: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-14: bstan bcos thams cad kyang rtogs la gzhung smra ba thams cad kyang tshar bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:69b-16: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-0: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga @70a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-1: mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-2: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-3: pha ma de gnyis kyis der smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-4: bdag cag gnyis khyod kyi pha ma gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-5: khyod la brten te bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-6: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas pa des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-7: da ltar yang 'di gnyis gzhung smra ba'i mchog tu gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-8: 'di nyid la brten nas 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-9: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-10: tshem bu mkhan zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-11: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-12: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u zhig bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-13: khye'u de'ang 'phye bo 'gro mi nus pa zhig tu gyur te de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70a-14: khye'u 'di 'phye po yin pas na khye'u 'di'i ming 'phye bor gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-0: de nas khye'u 'phye bo 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar @70b dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-1: de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe phas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-2: bdag gis khye'u 'di ci nas 'dug bzhin du las byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-3: bzo des 'tsho ba rnyed par 'gyur ba'i bzo ji lta bu zhig bslab par bya snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-5: ma la bdag gis 'di tshem bu mkhan gyi las bslabs pa dang des 'di'i 'tsho ba rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam du bsam nas des khye'u de tshem bu mkhan gyi las slob tu bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-6: de nas de'ang de la slob dpon gyi mchog tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-7: de nas dus ston zhig byed pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis chung ma'i phyir gzhan gyi khyim nas gos dang rgyan g-yar bor blangs nas khyer te 'ongs te chung ma des kyang bgos nas dus ston la chas te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-8: de nas de bag med pas de'i zhu gcig gis dral to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-9: de nas de khyim thab kyis 'jigs nas su la'ang ma bstan te dus ston las phyir log nas khyim bdag de grong gzhan zhig tu song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-10: de song nas bud med des tshem bu mkhan de bdag gi khyim du blangs te sus kyang mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir sgo bcad nas zhu de drub tu bcug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-11: tshem bu mkhan khyim du blangs pa'i rjes la khyim thab rang gi khyim du 'ongs nas sgo rdung zhing 'dod do; ;de nas de'i chung mas skad las ngo shes nas tshem bu mkhan par [?] gi khyim du bzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:70b-12: zhu dral ba'i phyir shas cher 'jigs pa skyes nas de 'jigs shing skrag pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-1: de khong du chud par byas te gzeb kyi nang du bcug nas gzeb rgyas btab ste bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-2: de nas sgo phye ste khyim thab nang du 'ongs nas gsag byas te ci rigs par bsnyen bkur byas nas de dang lhan cig tu nyal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-3: de gnyis nyal ba dang rkun po dag cig gis khyim phug nas nang du 'ongs te thog ma kho nar gzeb de las zin nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-4: gzeb 'di 'di ltar rgyas legs par btab la lcid las nor bu rin po che chen po yod gor ma chag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-6: bdag cag mi rabs bdun gyi bar du'ang chog par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-7: 'di kho nas bdag cag chog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-8: bdag cag la rdzas gzhan mi dgos so snyam du bsam nas de dag gis gzeb de gcig pu khyer te phyir byung nas nags 'dabs su khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-9: de dag 'dong ba na zla ba'ang shar la mi des kyang de'i nang du 'dug bzhin du gcin shor nas gcin de gzeb las thar te phyi rol tu zags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-10: de nas rkun po de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-11: 'di ltar zla ba shar ba na 'di'i nang nas chu 'bab pa las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-13: nor bu chu shel bcug yang dag snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-14: lhag par yang snying dga' bar gyur to; ;de nas de dag sha thang ste gzeb de khyer nas nags 'dabs su lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71a-15: de nas mi rgod kyi sde dpon dang mi rgod gzhan dag gis dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-0: khyod kyis gzeb 'di'i nang @71b du ci zhig khyer te 'ongs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-4: bdag cag gis thams cad kyi dbul ba'i rgyun bcad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-6: deng bdag cag gis rin po ches gang ba'i gzeb rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-8: de nas de thos ma thag tu de dag kyang snying dga' bar gyur te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-9: gzeb phye zhig dang 'dir rin po che ji lta bu dag bcug pa blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-11: de nas de dag gis gzeb de dkrol nas kha phye ste bltas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-12: gzeb de'i nang du 'phye bo zhig bcug cing 'dug pa mthong nas mthong ma thag tu der song song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-13: gzeb de khyer khyer ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-14: 'phye bo 'dis bdag cag mtshan thog thag nyon mongs so snyam nas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-15: der ma dong ba gang yin pa de dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-16: mi rgod der song song ba de dag la gad mo chen pos btab nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-20: de nas bud med de sad de langs nas khang pa de'i nang du song ba dang khyim phug ste gzeb brkus pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-21: mthong nas kyang snying dga' nas chigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-22: khang pa phug nas gzeb kyang stor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-23: bdag ni phyed dga' phyed mi dga'; ;nags 'dabs song ba'i rkun po rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:71b-24: da ni rgod cing du [?] de gzeng de khyer te 'ongs pa gang yin pa de dag khros te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-1: 'dis bdag cag mi dga' bar byas mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-2: 'on kyang bdag cag gi gnod sbyin mchod dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-3: bdag cag gis 'di kho nas gnod sbyin la mchod pa bya'o smras nas de dag gis gnod sbyin de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-4: bdug pa dang me tog dang mchod pa'i cho ga dang bum pa gang pa rnams bzhag nas ral gri rnon po thogs te mi de gnod sbyin gyi mdun du bzhag nas mchod sbyin byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-5: de nas mi des kyang ji ltar bdag nyid gnod sbyin de'i mchod par dbul bar chad pa khong du chud nas shin tu skrag ste bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-6: bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs pa su zhig la da bdag skyabs su 'gro bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-7: su zhig bdag la srog phangs pa sbyin par 'gyur snyam du bsam nas des bcom ldan 'das la sems kyis gsol ba btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-11: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ci'ang mi gzigs pa dang mi mkhyen pa dang thugs su mi chud pa mi mnga' na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-14: dkos thag cing nyam nga la phongs par gyur pa lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-15: bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-16: srog phangs pa stsal du gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'grod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-0: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' @72b brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-1: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-3: 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-4: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-5: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-6: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-7: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa; stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-8: yang dag par sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-9: chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-10: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-22: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-30: ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-32: nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-34: 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-36: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:72b-38: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-0: @73a *// su ni; dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-2: sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-3: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-4: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-5: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-6: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-9: mi rgod lnga brgya po de rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab par thugs su chud nas lha'i sku gzugs de nyid las lha'i cha lugs su bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-10: de nas mi rgod lnga brgya 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-11: lhas bdag cag la rang gi sku bstan to snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-12: spu zing zhes byas nas thal mo sbyar te 'khod nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-16: nga la mis mchod mi dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:73a-19: mchod ba gsol ba thong la 'khod cig dang chos bstan par bya'o //
