K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:87b-21: de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:87b-22: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-0: @88a *// tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-1: mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-2: de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-3: nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-4: yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-5: rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-6: sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-7: rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-8: padma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-9: brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-10: dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams; ;thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-11: bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-12: rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-13: mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyi nar 'dzum mi ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-14: gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-15: de ni khyod la skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-16: 'brug sgra lta bu'i gsung ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-17: khyu mchog lta bu'i lta stangs can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-18: mi mchog mchod pa bgyid pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-22: rgyu mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88a-24: 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis @88b bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-8: rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-10: khyod kyis bram ze gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la shing rta bstabs pa mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-16: bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-17: mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-18: gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-19: des slob dpon med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-20: man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-21: rang sangs rgyas shing rta sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-22: de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-24: sgam po zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-25: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-26: de'i tshe sems can zhig sems can dmyal bar skyes te lus che zhing dmus long du 'dug la de'i lus ril gyis rmas zhu lub tu yog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-27: de'i spyi bo man chad rkang mthil yan chad srin zhugs pas de nad ma bzod nas phan tshun rgyug par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:88b-28: de gal te thang la 'gro na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-0: @89a *// de la de nyid nas sengge dang stag dang gzig dang dred la sogs pa lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-1: de dag gis de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-2: de ste chu la 'bog na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-3: de la de nyid nas chu srin ma ka ra lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-4: de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o; ;de steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-5: de la de nyid nas bya rog dang bya rgod dang chun lag lcags kyi mchu can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-6: de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-7: de ste nags stug po'i nang du 'gro na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-8: de la de nyid nas shing shal ma li'i tshal 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-9: de la der ral gri dang mdung thung dang mnga' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams rlung gis spags te de'i steng du 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-10: de ste rtsig pa'i gseb bam ri'i sul lam bya skyibs dag tu 'gro bar 'dod na'ang de la de nyid nas las las skyes pa'i mi dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-11: ral gri dang mdud thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig dang mdung kha leb rnams thogs nas de'i lus la 'debs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89a-12: de dag gis de'i lus thams cad gcod cing gtub par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-0: rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste nyam thag pa'i skad @89b 'byin cing du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'grod pa gcig pa'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-2: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-3: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-5: 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-6: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-7: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-8: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-9: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-10: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-11: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-12: chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-13: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi sbyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-24: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-31: ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-32: thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-34: nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:89b-36: 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed @90a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-7: sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-8: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-9: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-10: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-11: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-13: mnyan du yod pa'i skye bo phal po che 'dul ba'i dus lab bab nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ci tshar gcad pas 'dul bar 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-15: 'on te skyo ba bskyed pas 'dul bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas skyob ba skyed pas 'dul bar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas de dag skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can de rdzu 'phrul gyis bkug ste chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du bzhag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-16: der yang de nad mi bzod nas phan tshun rgyug par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-17: der yang de gal te thang la 'gro na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90a-18: de la de nyid nas sengge dang stag dang gzig dang dred la sogs pa lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-0: de dag gis de'i sha rnams bcad cing @90b bcad cing za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-2: de la de nyid nas chu srin ma ka ra lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-3: de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-4: de ste steng gi nam mkha' la 'gron ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-5: de la de nyid nas bya rog dang bya rgod dang chun lag lcags kyi mchu can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-6: de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o; ;de ste nags stug po'i nang du 'gro na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-7: de la de nyid nas shing shal ma li'i tshal 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-8: de la de nyid du ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams rlung gis spags te de'i steng du 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-9: de ste rtsig pa'i gseb bam ri'i sul lam bya skyibs dag tu 'gro bar 'dod na'ang de la de nyid nas las skyes pa'i mi dag 'byung bar 'gyur te ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams thogs nas de'i lus la 'debs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-10: de dag gis de'i lus thams cad gcod cing gtub par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-11: rgyu des na sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-12: de nas de'i ku co'i sgras mnyan du yod pa thams cad gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:90b-13: mnyan du yod pa'i skye bo phal po ches 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra de lta bu thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-0: thos nas kyang sems can stong phrag du ma mnyan du @91a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-1: yod pa nas byung ste sgra drag pa'i logs su chu klung khang ldan ga la ba der dong nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis thag ring po zhig gis sems can de de lta bu'i gnod pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-2: mthong nas kyang de dag gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-3: sems can 'di lta bu gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba nyams su myong ba 'di su zhig snyam mo; ;sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing gzhes la 'tsho ba rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-4: chos nyid kyis dus dus su gtsug lag khang dang dur khrod dang ri dang chu klung dag tu rgyu zhing gshegs te; don 'di'i phyir bcom ldan 'das chu klung du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-6: song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-7: chu klung du rgyu zhing gshegs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-8: su de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu rgyu zhing 'gro 'dod pa de dag chos gos dag chos shig ces sgos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-9: de skad ces bka' stsal te bsgos nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas chu klung khang ldan ga la der gshegs so; ;de nas skye bo'i tshogs kyis thag ring po nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-10: mthong nas kyang ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91a-11: dge sbyong goo ta ma ltad mo la dga' ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91b-1: de'ang ltad mo'i dbang du gyur te 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91b-3: dad pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91b-4: bcom ldan 'das sems can 'di la brten te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos shig lung ston par bzhed gor ma chag ces zer nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91b-7: bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91b-8: bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshags pa la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa; ma la bdag sems can 'di ci nas sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing bdag dang gtam zer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du dgongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das ci nas sems can des sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91b-11: bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:91b-20: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu myong ba yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-2: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu mi sdug pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-5: khyod kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-8: de nas skye po phal po che de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-9: 'di lta bu'i sems can sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-10: bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer ba 'di su zhig snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-13: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan du zhu ma nus nas de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-16: 'di lta bu'i sems can sdon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-17: bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer ba 'di su zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-18: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-22: snyan sleb par dka' zhing gzi byin bzod par dka' bas bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan du zhu mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-23: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92a-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-0: bdag gis kyang sleb par dka' @92b mod kyi; 'on kyang khyed la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhu bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-1: zhes smras nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-3: 'di lta bu'i sems can sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la mi'i skad du smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-4: bcom ldan 'das la bka' mchid gsol ba 'di su zhig lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-5: der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-8: sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-9: 'dis sdig pa'i las mang du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-11: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-15: skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-16: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:92b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93a-0: de'i tshe dgra bcom pa zhig dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu phyin nas de dag rgyal po de'i skyed mos tshal du song ste rgan rims bzhin du shing drung re rer rtsa bting @93a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93a-1: nas skyil mo krung bcas te bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93a-2: de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid na rgyal po sgam po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93a-3: rgyal po de nang par sngar langs nas bud med kyi 'khor gyis zhabs 'bring byas te skyed mos tshal der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93a-4: de der song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bud med de dag me tog dang 'bras bu la sred pas phan tshun du 'khyams shing dong ba las bud med de dag gis dge slong lnga brgya po de dag shing drung dag na klu'i rgyal po ltar lus bskyil te gnyid log pa bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93a-5: mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93a-6: de dag dga' ba skyes nas de dag gis zhabs la phyag btsal te de dag gi nang na ches rgan pa gang yin pa de'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93a-7: de nas rgyal po des skyed mos tshal de'i nang nas skyes pa'i sgra thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93a-8: thos nas kyang ral gri rnon po mgul du thogs te dge slong de dag ga la ba der song nas rgyal po des dge slong lnga brgya de dag thag ring po nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-0: mthong nas kyang dge slong rnams kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor mthong gis med do snyam ste khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen po skyes nas mthong ma thag tu rgyal po des rgyal po'i @93b zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-2: dge slong 'di rnams lcag gis bzhus shig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-3: de nas ra zhig na de dag lcag gis bzhus nas dge slong de dag gi lus ril gyis zhu lub tu sha snag pu bzhin du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-4: de nas des dge slong de rnams snying tshim par bzhus nas gshed ma rnams la gtad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-5: khyed deng la rab tu byung ba 'di rnams las kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-6: gson por gsal shing la tshugs la ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' po che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams kyis snun cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-8: gson por khyi rnams la byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-9: kha cig ni; lus dum bu drug tu chod la phyogs kun tu bor cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-10: de nas rgyal po'i mi de dag gis de bzhin du 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-11: zhes byas nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-12: gson por gsal shing la btsugs nas ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha lab rnams kyis bsnun to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-14: gson por khyi rnams la byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-16: lus dum bu drug tu bcad de phyogs kun tu bor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-19: de'i tshe rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-21: des der dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po de dag bsad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:93b-22: des dge slong de dag la sdang ba'i sems kyis bltas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-2: des dge slong de dag lcag gis bzhus pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-3: lus rim gyis rmas zhu lub tu yog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-4: spyi bo man chad rkang mthil yan chad du srin zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-5: des de dag gshed ma la gtad de kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-6: gson por gsal shing la btsugs nas ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams kyis bsnun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-8: gson por khyi rnams la byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-10: gson por lus dum bu drug tu bcad de phyogs kun tu gtor ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-11: gal te thang la 'gro na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-12: de la de nyid nas sengge dang stag dang gzig dang dred la sogs pa lcags kyi mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-13: de dag gis de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-15: de la de nyid nas chu srin ma ka ra lcags kyis mche ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-16: de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-17: de steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-18: de la de nyid nas bya rog dang bya rgod dang chun lag lcags kyi mchu can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-19: de dag gis kyang de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-20: de nags stug po'i nang du 'gro na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94a-21: de la de nyid nas shing shal ma li'i tshal 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-0: de la de nyid du ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse @94b gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams rlung gis spags te de'i steng du 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-1: de ste rtsig pa'i gseb pa ma ri'i sul lam bya skyabs dag tu 'gro bar 'dod na'ang de la de nyid nas las las skyes pa'i mi dag 'byung bar 'gyur te ral gri dang mdung thung dang mda' bo che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams thogs nas de'i lus la 'debs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-2: de dag gis de'i lus thams cad bcad cing gtub par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-3: rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang tsha ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin cing du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer can gyi ring tshun chad nas da ltar nga rang gi bar du sems can 'di sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos shing sems can dmyal ba rnams 'ba' zhig tu skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-6: 'dis 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-8: sems can 'di sdug bsngal 'di las nam thar bar 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-9: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas lnga brgya 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-10: de'i bar du'ang sems can 'di sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos shing sems can dmyal ba rnams 'ba' zhig tu skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-11: 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal sha stag rnyed nas de'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal zad nas mir skye ba thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:94b-12: des rigs ngan gyi khyim du nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-1: gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe ri dvags bshor du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-2: de der song ba na nags khrod me tog phun sum tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-4: bsil grib phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu phyin nas nges bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-6: ri dvags rnams 'du bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des der 'khrul 'khor dang rnyi dang gtor ba dang rnyod rnams btsugs nas 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-7: de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas shig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-8: de nags khrod der mtshan mo gnas 'cha' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-9: de'i dris ri dvags de dag de'i nyin par nags khrod der mi 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-10: rngon pa de'ang der song nas nags khrod der rang sangs rgyas de 'ba' zhig mthong ba las gzhan ci'ang ma rnyed nas des 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-11: rab tu byung ba 'di dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-12: gnas 'di lta bu la dga' bar skyed par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-13: 'di 'di na 'dug par gyur na bdag la gnod par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-14: ma la bdag gis 'di gsad gor ma chag snyam nas des rang sangs rgyas de bsad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-15: des de bsad nas rngon pa de shi ba'i 'og tu yang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-16: de der lo brgya phrag du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-17: lo stong phrag du ma'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95a-18: de nas de las zad nas yang mir skye ba thob par yang 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-0: de'i tshe @95b yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-1: de'i gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-2: des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-3: de rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal du gnas 'cha' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-4: rgyal po de'ang bud med kyi 'khor dag gis zhabs 'bring byas te skyed mos tshal der 'gro bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-5: bud med de dag kyang skyed mos tshal der me tog dang 'bras bu la sred pas phan tshun 'khyams shing 'gro ba las de'i thad du phyin te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-6: rgyal po de'ang skyes pa'i sgra thos nas de'i thad du 'gro bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-7: de mthong nas khros te lcag gis bzhus nas de'i lus dum bu drug tu bcad de gson por gsal shing la btsugs nas ral gri dang dung thung dang mda' po che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang mdung kha leb rnams kyis lus la bsnun nas khyi rnams la byin par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-8: de'i sdug bsngal gyi mtha' der thug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-9: de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag shas cher skyo ba skyes te de dag gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:95b-11: bdag cag gis kyang sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de lta bu rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag yid skyo bar gyur par thugs su chud nas @96a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-1: de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-2: stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du kha cig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-3: dro bar gyur pa bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-6: bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-7: 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-8: mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-10: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-12: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-14: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-16: rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-18: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-20: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-26: nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-28: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-29: kha cig gis ni; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-30: 'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96a-33: dge 'dun la bab par mdzad de bkod nas gtsug lag khang du gshegs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-0: gleng gzhi ser skya'i gnas na bzhugs @96b te; gang gi tshe lhas byin gyis autpa la'i kha dog ma bsad nas de rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis yul nas bskrad pa de'i tshe yul ser skya'i gnas su song nas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-1: bdag gis dge sbyong goo ta ma gsod kyang ma nus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-2: sangs rgyas kyi thabs kyang ma gos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-3: bdag song la don grub kyi btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kha drangs te de dag dang bsdongs la rgyal sa thob nas rgyal po bya'o snyam du bsam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-4: des grags 'dzin ma la 'phrin pa zhig btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-7: sdig pa la dga' ba des ci byas pa la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-8: bud med drug khri chung mar blangs nas sdug par byas pa 'dis gal te nges 'dod pa rnams yongs su spyad par mi 'dod na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-9: btsun mo blangs te gzhag kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-10: de yang gal te khyod dga' na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-11: bdag cag gis kyang rgyal po thob par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-12: khyod kyang sngon bzhin du dpal dang skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-14: de nas de thos ma thag tu grags 'dzin mas sa 'tsho ma la bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-17: bdag la 'di skad ces spring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-19: de nas sa 'tsho ma na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-20: 'u bu cag gis thabs shig gis de nang du bkug la dma' phab ste ma btang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-21: de tha mal bar 'dug par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-23: de nas de rnams kyis lhas byin la spring pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:96b-24: lhas byin rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang du sbyon cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-0: 'dir gshegs nas thabs ji lta bu zhig gis @97a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-1: bdag cag gis khyod rgyal sar bzhugs pa bka' gros mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-3: de nas lhas byin gyis de thos ma thag tu dga' ches nas da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-4: de dag dga' bar gyur pas rgyal srid ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-5: bdag gi 'chang ba kho na na 'dug go snyam du bsam nas rgyal po'i pho brang du song ste byang chub sems dpa'i gdan la 'dug par chas pa dang lha rnams kyis gdan de mi mthong bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-6: de nas sa 'tsho ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo logs kyi them skas kyi mgo la 'dug nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-8: khyed re zhig gdan la bzhugs ci 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-9: btsun mo'i 'khor nang du je gshegs dang bka' gros mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-10: de nas lhas byin gyis kyang sa 'tsho ma'i tshig nyan nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te de'i mdun du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-11: de nas sa 'tsho mas de'i thal mo sbyar ba bzung ste drag tu bcir nas de'i sor mo thams cad las khrag byung ste lhas byin de'i nad kyis nyam thag pas khus btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-12: de nas sa 'tsho mas skas de nyid la mgo thur kar bstan te mgo bor rdog pas bsnun nas skas mgo nas bor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-13: bud med gzhan rnams kyis kyang kha cig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-14: de'i lus ba lang gi lci bas gtor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-15: kha cig gis ni; 'bru mar tshan mos gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-16: de nas de'i lus snad cing rmas bzhin du de'i nang nas byung ste song nas de ko ka li ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-17: khan da dra ba bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97a-18: ka ta mor ti shya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-0: rgya mtshos @97b byin rnams kyi thad du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-1: de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-4: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnad chen khyod kyis btsun mo 'khor gyi bde ba dag legs par myong mod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-5: de nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-6: dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-8: sa 'tsho mas lhas byin mi mang sar ji ltar dma' phab pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-10: da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-11: 'das pa'i dus na'ang sa 'tsho mas lhas byin ji ltar dma' phab pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-13: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-14: yul bi de ha na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-15: rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-16: de gnyis phan tshun mi mthun pas dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-17: de nas phyi zhig na k'a shi'i yrgyal po tshangs pas byin blon po'i tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te 'khod pa'i nang du bud med kyi gtam gyi gleng bslangs nas khyed kyi nang na su dag gis bud med gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dag gang du mthong zhes dris nas der sus bud med ji lta bu mthong ba des rgyal po de la de kho na bzhin du gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-18: der gcig cig gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:97b-20: de dag thams cad lta zhog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-0: pi de ha'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa de dang byad gzugs 'dra ba @98a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-1: ni; bud med su'ang ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-2: zhes byas nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de 'dod chags kyi mngas po gnas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-3: bdag gis rgyal po dbang chen sde dang mi mthun bzhin du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-4: de dang phrad par bya mi nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-5: bdag gis sngar de dang mjal du ma byas nas de'i 'og tu sla bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsam nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis pi da ha'i rgyal po dang mjal dum byas pa'i 'og tu rgyal po dbang chen sde'i btsun mo la bud med po nyar btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-6: bdag gis dbang chen sde dang mjal dum byas ba ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-8: de shes par gyis la ci nas bdag khyod dang phrad par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig ces spring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-9: de nas dbang chen sde'i btsun mos rgyal po la spran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-11: rgyal po tshangs pas byin de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-12: bdag 'tshal zhes don sgrub cing mchis kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-13: gal te lhas bdag la bka' stsal na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-14: bdag gis de dma' dbab par 'tshal zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-16: khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du gyis la ci nas de nga'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ba de ltar dgyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-19: ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du mdzad du mchis par bdag gis bgyi bar 'tshal gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98a-20: thugs mi chung bar gsol zhes byas nas des de la pho nya'i lan spring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-0: rgyal po 'di gson por 'dug bzhin du @98b ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-1: bdag gis khyod dang mjal bar bgyi ba'i rngo mi thogs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-3: de'i 'og tu bdag dang mjal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-5: de nas tshangs pas byin gyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-6: mi mthun par ma byas kyi bar du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-7: bdag gis de gsad du mi rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-8: phyir yang bdag gis de dang mi mthun par bya'o snyam du bsam nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis rgyal po dbang chen sde dang phyir yang mi mthun par byas nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te yul pi de har song nas grong khyer dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis bskor te 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-9: de de na 'dug pas skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-10: de nas dbang chen sde'i btsun mos spring ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-11: khyod 'dir gshegs pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-12: bdag gi phyir du bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-13: skye bo mang po dgum ci 'tshal gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-14: da'ang mi phal ba'i cha lugs su zhugs la grong khyer gyi nang du gshegs te bdag dang mjal bar mdzad du gsol zhes spring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-15: de nas de thos ma thag tu k'a shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin thabs ji ltar bstan bzhin du rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang du 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-16: de 'ongs ma thag tu dbang chen sde'i btsun mo des bzung nas rgyal po la spran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:98b-19: lhas ci dgyes par mdzad du mchis par gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-0: de nas rgyal po dbang chen sdes rgyal po'i spas @99a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-1: dang blon po dang tshong dpon dang phyug po dang ded dpon thams cad bsags nas k'a shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi mgo bor rdog pas bsnun te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-2: 'di ci nas phyin chad gzhan gyi chung ma la byi pho byed par mi 'gyur bar sod cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-3: de nas rgyal po dbang chen sde la btsun mos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-5: 'di dma' phab pa 'di nyid gum pa bas ches thu ba ma lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-6: da 'di lhag par dgum du ci mchis kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-7: thong lags zhes gsol nas gson por btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-10: de'i tshe de'i dus na yul pi de ha'i rgyal po dbang chen sder gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-11: byang chub kyi spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-15: de'i tshe k'a shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-17: de'i tshe'ang des 'di mi mang sar rdog pas bsnun te shin tu dma' phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-18: skra ldan ma zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99a-19: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs tsam na yul ser skya'i gnas rgyal po sengge'i 'gram rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-0: de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las snga phyir bu pho bzhi dang bu mo bzhi btsas te zas gtsang dang @99b zas dkar dang bre bo zas dang bdud rtsi zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-1: gtsang ma dang dkar mo dang bre bo ma dang bdud rtsi ma rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-2: de'i tshe yul spod byed na rgyal po sh'akya rab sad gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-3: de'i btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' mgur spyod pa la bu mo gnyis btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-7: sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-8: de nas de gnyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-9: mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to; ;de nas de gnyis la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis bltas nas bu mo sgyu 'phrul las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-10: bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-11: sgyu 'phrul chen mo las ni; 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-13: de nyid kyi skra til mar gyi thigs pa chung blugs pa bzhin du rgyas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-14: de nas rgyal po sengge 'gram gyis thos nas rgyal po rab sad la pho nya btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-15: khyod kyi bu mo de gnyis bdag gi bu'i chung mar byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-17: sus kyang thabs zlar bab pa'i chung ma gnyis mi blang ba'i nang khrims de lta bu btsas mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:99b-18: gal te bdag gis sh'akya rnams kyis dad pa gnang bar byed nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100a-1: zhes springs nas sengge 'gram gyis sh'akya rnams la gsol ba btab nas de'i bu mo gnyis khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi khyim pa'i chos bzhin du byas te zas gtsang gi btsun mor blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100a-2: der rgyal po rab sad kyis de gnyis la bu mo skra ldan ma zhes bya ba skra mkhan du byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100a-3: de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100a-4: de btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu sgyu 'phrul shi nas de shi ba'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100a-5: bu mo skra ldan ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100a-6: de dang bral bas sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i skra la 'jus nas shin tu mya ngan byed cing dbugs 'dril la smre sngags 'don cing brang brdungs te sus kyang de'i mya ngan bsang ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100a-7: de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sku cher 'khrungs pa de'i tshe des rgan po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100a-9: shi ba gzigs nas nags kyi nang du rten bcas te lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100a-10: mthar gyis 'dul ba'i don mdzad cing yul ser skya'i gnas su gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100a-11: de der gshegs nas sh'akya rnams rab tu phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-0: skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'i'ang rab tu phyung @100b ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-1: skra ldan ma'ang rab tu phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-2: des kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-3: de bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-4: de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-6: skra ldan mas las ci bgyis na; de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i sh'akya'i rigs su skyes lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-8: des bran mo gzhan gyi mngag gzhug bgyid par gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-10: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-11: 'dis gang du smon lam btab lags; dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-12: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-15: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-16: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:100b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-0: de bla na med pa yang dag @101a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-1: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas grong khyer gnyer ldan du gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-2: de lcam gnyis kyis bshos gsol ba na der gcig gis smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-3: bdag las 'di lta bu'i skyes bu rin po che btsas te de mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-4: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so; ;bu mo gcig shos kyis smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-5: bdag kyang gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der khyod dang spun du gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-6: bdag 'di lta bu'i skyes bu rin po che de 'tsho bar gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-7: de spun gnyis kyi skra mkhan byed pa'i bu mo de'ang de na 'dug par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-8: bu mo des kyang de gnyis kyis smon lam de lta bu de btab pa thos nas thos ma tham tu des kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la bkur sti byas te smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-9: kye ma bdag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'di gnyis gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der bdag 'di gnyis kyi skra mkhan ma bsnyen bkur byed par gyur nas 'di gnyis kyi bu rin po che mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-10: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-11: der 'dis smon lam 'di lta bu btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-14: 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101a-15: mi mnyes par ma bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-0: @101b bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi mchog tu'ang bstan lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-2: 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-3: gang las rab tu byung ba'i mkhan mo de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-5: de nas de'i tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-6: 'di ltar bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-8: mi mnyas par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-9: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:101b-10: ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sh'akya thub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-0: sh'akya'i rgyal po des brtson 'grus brtsams @102a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-1: pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-4: de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong ma gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-5: skra ldan pa 'di nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-6: des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khang smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-8: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-9: de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-10: ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sh'akya thub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-11: sh'akya rgyal po des brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-13: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102a-16: thabs mnyam pa rnyed par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-0: nga nyid kyi bstan @102b ba la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas da ltar ngas brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-1: padma'i mdog ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-2: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-3: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye sde yul srung byed du ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-4: ri khrod cig tu phyin te de'i tshe ri khrod de na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-5: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-6: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-7: de dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang khyim bdag de bu med nas de lag pa la rkom btsugs bcas te bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-8: bdag gi khyim nor bu du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bdag la bu'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-9: bu mo'ang med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-10: bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang par 'gyur ro snyam ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-11: de nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang ltas mkhan dang mdza' bo dang gnyen dang rtsa lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-12: de nas de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir lha gu la dang [?] chu lta dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-13: gu be ra dang [?] brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:102b-14: tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-0: lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la'ang @103a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-3: kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-5: lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-7: gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-10: rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la'ang gsol ba 'debs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-11: 'jig rten na'ang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-12: zhes bgyi ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-15: gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-16: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la'ang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-18: gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-19: gsum gang zhe na; pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-20: ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-22: gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-23: de nas de'ang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-24: sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-25: bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-26: thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103a-28: skyes pa chags pa'ang shes la ma chags pa'ang shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-0: dus kyang shes @103b la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-1: bu chags pa shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-2: gang las bu chags par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-3: khye'u yang shes la bu mo'ang shes pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-4: gal te khye'u yin na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-5: lto g-yas logs su rten cing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-6: gal te bu mo yin na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-7: lto g-yon logs su rten cing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-8: de nas de dga' ches nas khyim thab la spran pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-11: bdag gi rum g-yas logs su rten cing gnas pa las na khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-12: dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas nas de'ang dga' ches te ro stod ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-14: lag pa g-yas pa ni; brkyang nas bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-15: bdag gi bu rung bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-16: mi rung bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-17: bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-18: gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-19: nor skal la spyod par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-20: bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-21: bdag cag 'das te shi ba'i 'og tu'ang bdag cag gi phyir mang yang rung nyung yang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:103b-22: sbyin pa dag byin la bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song zhig ces yon bsngo bar shog cig ces dga' ba'i tshig brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-0: de nas des bu chags par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzang gi steng du nyam rangs su bzhag ste grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams @104a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-2: tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-3: sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-4: ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-5: ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-6: ha cang lan tshva che ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-7: ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-8: ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-9: ha cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-15: bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing do shal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-16: se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-17: khri'u'i steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'ong gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-18: des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-19: de nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-20: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-24: lag pa ring ba dang dpral ba'i dbyes che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-27: smin ma sdug pa zhig btsas nas de'i tshe btsas ston rgyas par byas te khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-28: khye'u 'di padma'i snying po'i mdog 'dra bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104a-29: de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming padma'i mdog can zhes gdags so zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104b-0: de @104b nas khye'u padma'i mdog 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings te mcho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104b-1: de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang spa ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104b-2: yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104b-4: tshe dang ldan pa nye sde yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104b-5: khye'u padma'i mdog gis de la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104b-6: des pha ma la gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sde nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104b-7: de nas de phyi zhig na de mkhan po la ma zhus par don zhig la ri khrod de nas song nas de mthar gyis ljongs rgyu zhing song song ba las yul bcom brlag ces bya bar phyin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104b-8: bcom brlag na bong bu'i kun dga' ra ba na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:104b-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas yul bcom brlag tu bsod snyoms la song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-0: tshe dang ldan pa de spyod yul gyi rgyus mi shes bzhin du mthar gyis bsod @105a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-1: snyoms byed pa las smad 'tshong ma'i khyim du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-2: smad 'tshong ma de'ang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-4: ro rtsal g-yem pa zhig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-5: de nas bud med des tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog rgyang nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-6: mthong nas kyang 'dod chags kyi mda' drag pos 'og ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-7: de 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur nas chem tshom med par langs te tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog ga la der song ste phyin nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-8: 'phags pa gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog gi bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-10: ci 'di dge bsnyen ma zhig yin nam snyam nas stan bshams pa la 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-11: bud med des 'dod chags kyis mi bzod ches nas padma'i mdog la smras pa; btsun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-12: khyod kyang gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa lags la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-13: bdag kyang yan lag thams cad sdug pa lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-14: bdag dang gzims par gsol zhes byas so; ;de nas de thos ma thag tu tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog gis rna ba gnyis bkag ste 'dug nas bdag 'di lta bu mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa nyams par byed mi phod do; ;zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-18: gal te khyod 'dod pa rnams mi bzhed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105a-19: smad 'tshong ma'i khyim du byon te ci bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-1: bdag gsar du 'ongs pas spyod yul gyi rgyus mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-4: 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-5: bdag gi bya ba ma yin pa 'di ltar byar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-7: khyod mi bzhed na'ang bdag gis khyod mthu gar bor te nyal du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-8: de nas de thos ma thag tu tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog dang ngas nas stan las langs te phyir byung nas bsod snyoms ma byas par gtsug lag khang du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-9: de'i phyir byung ste song nas smad 'tshong ma de 'dod chags kyi mes yongs su gdungs te rigs ngan mo sngags kyi mthu yod pa zhig bkug nas de la gtam rgyas par bsnyad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-10: bdag dge slong de dang phrad par gyis shig dang bdag gis khyod la gser mang du sbyin no; ;zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-11: de nas des de ltar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-12: zhes smras nas rigs ngan mo des bud med de rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te khyim de lha khang bzhin du byas te bzhag nas dkyil 'khor ba lang gi lci bas byugs te bdug spos dang me tog dang lha bshos kyi cho ga rnams bshams nas me spar te yungs kar la sngags kyis btab cing me'i nang du 'debs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-13: tshe dang ldan pa de'ang sngags kyi mthus drangs nas phyir smad 'tshong ma'i khyim de nyid du 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:105b-14: de nas rigs ngan mo des tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog khyim der 'ongs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-2: khyod khyim 'dir 'ongs pa la bya ba gnyis yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-4: smad 'tshong ma 'di dang lhan cig tu nyol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-8: de nas de thos ma thag tu tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-10: 'jig rten du brgya lam brgya lam na 'byung bar zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-12: au dum wa ra'i me tog dang 'dra la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-13: mir skye ba thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-14: yul dbus su skye ba'ang rnyed par dka' bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-15: me'i nang du mchod ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-16: legs pa yin gyi; 'di dang phrad par bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-18: snyam du bsam nas gos rnams phud de rigs ngan mo la gtad nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-20: gos 'di rnams gtsug lag khang du khyer la bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la phul cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-25: me'i nang du mchod bar chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-26: des de'i tshig de thos nas rigs ngan mo mi dga' bar gyur te bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106a-27: kye ma bdag dbul bas bdag gis 'di lta bu'i yon gnas dag la nyes pa byed cing 'dug ste bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sems can dag pa mi dga' bar bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106b-0: bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam nas des chog thams cad btang ste gus par bsgrims pas rkang pa la phyag btsal nas sems @106b can dag pa bzod par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106b-1: bdag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106b-5: khyod bdag gi las rnams kyis mi bzod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106b-6: de nas smad 'tshong ma de'ang mthong ma thag tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas de la dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106b-7: dga' ba skyes nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te smras pa; skal pa chen po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106b-8: bdag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur pas khyod mi dgyes par bgyis pa bzod par gsol ces smras nas bu mo smad 'tshong ma de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106b-9: rigs ngan mo de gnyis chos mnyan pa'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog gi mdun du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106b-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog gis de gnyis la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan nas de gnyis kyis stan de la 'dug bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106b-11: de gnyis kyis bden pa mthong nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:106b-13: bdag cag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-0: bdag cag gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo; ;de nas tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog gis de gnyis dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du khrid de dge slong ma rnams la gtad nas dge slong ma rnams kyis de gnyis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen @107a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-1: par rdzogs par byas nas de gnyis la lung yang phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-2: de gnyis kyis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-4: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-5: de gnyis dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-6: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-7: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-8: rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-9: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-10: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-11: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mched cing rjed par dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-13: 'di ltar bdag gis gzhan gyi rgyud ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mang du thos pa la phan yon rnam pa lnga yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-18: phung po la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-20: skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-21: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-22: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107a-24: bdag gis kyang nyon mongs bzad par bya ba'i phyir brtsam par bya'o snyam nas des brtson pa dag sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-0: 'bad pas @107b nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-1: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang song bar mnyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-2: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-3: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-4: rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-5: rigs dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-6: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-7: dbang po dang nye dbang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to; ;des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas yul bcom brlag tu ji srid dga' ba'i bar du 'dug 'dug nas mnyan du yod par song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-8: de der song nas gtam de rgyas par dge slong rnams la bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-9: de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-11: bu mo smad 'tshong ma 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog ji ltar mi dga' bar bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-12: slar de nyid brten nas rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-15: tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du 'di'i chung mar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-16: de'i sngon gyi bag chags kyi gzhi yod pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:107b-17: mthong ma thag tu kun tu chags par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:108a-1: tshe dang ldan pa padma'i mdog gis las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:108a-2: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:108a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
