K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124a-4: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124a-7: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124a-8: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124a-9: der de dag khros pas dge slong mang po la ba lang rdzi zhes bya ba'i tshig smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124a-10: sbyin pa'ang ma byin ba des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124a-11: ba lang rdzi dbul po gzhan gyi tshal za bar byed pas 'tsho bar gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124a-12: mdza' sde rnams zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124a-13: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124a-14: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na mdza' sde bo lnga brgya tsam 'khod pa rnams dus dus su me tog gang rgyas par de dag longs spyad pa'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi nang du song nas rol mo byed de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124b-0: de nas phyi zhig na me tog autpa la dang padma dang ku mu da dang padma dkar po rnams rgyas par gyur nas de dag longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ta me tog autpa la dang padma dang ku @124b mu da dang padma dkar po rnams kyis phreng ba dang thod dang rna rgyan dang chun po rnams rgyan du thogs shing autpa la chang pa re re thogs nas sil snyan sna tshogs dang pheg rdob cing mnyan du yod pa nas byung ste skyed mos tshal gyi nang du chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyang de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124b-2: mdza' sde bo de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing sba bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124b-3: me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124b-4: me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124b-5: mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124b-6: mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124b-7: blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam pa dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:124b-8: mthong nas kyang de dag bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes so; ;dga' bskyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la autpa la dang padma dang ku mu da dang padma dkar po rnams kyis gtor nas sil snyan dang pheg rdob bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-4: de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-8: 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-9: sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang du 'bod dang du 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-10: chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so tham tham dang kyi hud zer ba dang aa chu zer ba dang autpa la ltar gis pa dang padma ltar gas pa dang padma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-12: grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-14: des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-15: de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-16: kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-17: 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-18: de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-19: de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-21: 'di nas kyang shi 'phos bar ma gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125a-22: gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-0: 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba @125b 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-1: de nas de dag sprul pa la soms mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-2: lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-3: steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-4: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-5: tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che ba rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-8: bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-9: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-10: nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-11: sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-12: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-13: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:125b-15: bag yod spyod par byed pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-2: sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-4: de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-5: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-7: ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-8: mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-9: sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-10: zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-11: dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-12: zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-13: yi dvags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-14: zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-15: mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-16: pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-17: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal bor lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-18: phyag g-yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-19: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-20: phyag g-yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-21: lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-22: lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-23: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126a-24: zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-0: rang sangs rgyas kyi @126b byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-1: smin mchams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-3: dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-4: de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-6: tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-7: mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-8: de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-9: nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-10: yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-11: rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-12: sangs rgyas 'gro bdag gi ngam pa'i rgyur gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-13: rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-14: padma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-15: brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-16: dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyid 'tshal ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-17: thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-18: bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-19: rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-20: mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi nar 'dzum mi ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:126b-21: gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-0: de ni khyod la skye bo phal cher nyan @127a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-10: rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-12: khyod kyis mdza' sde po 'di dag gis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-16: mdza' sde bo 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-18: sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-19: bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-20: gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob nas rab tu byung ste slob dpon med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-21: lung med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-22: thams cad kyang rang sangs rgyas smon pa med pa zhes bya ba sha stag tu 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-24: de dag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-25: de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-0: las de'i rnam par smin pas mdza' sde bo lnga brgyas autpa la @127b dang padma dang ku mu dang padma dkar po dag gis 'di ltar bkur sti bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi las de lta bu byas shing bsags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-5: las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-6: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-9: rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-10: las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-13: skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-14: lus can dag gi las rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-15: bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-16: tshogs shing dus la bab pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-19: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nga bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis la bab pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-22: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-23: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-25: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-26: rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan zhes bya bar byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:127b-27: de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan na rgyal po mar me zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-1: dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-2: rtsod pa dang 'thab bzhi ba dang 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang nad dang mu ge med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-3: 'bras s'a lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-4: gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid byed do; ;de nas rgyal po mar mes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad grong khyer gyi nang du zhabs sa la reg par bya ba'i phyir spyan drangs nas rgyal po mar me'i 'dabs na rgyal po nor can gyi bu zhes bya ba 'dug pa de la des pho nya btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-5: ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad grong khyer gyi nang du zhabs sa la reg par bya ba'i phyir spyan drangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-6: de la mchod pa bya dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-8: de'i tshe rgyal po nor can gyi bus kyang lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mchod sbyin byas nas mchod sbyin gyi mjug tu 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-12: rin po che sna bzhis spras pa'i mal khri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-13: karsha pa na lnga brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-14: bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te rab tu sbyin pa chen po lnga dngar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128a-15: de'i tshe ljongs gzhan zhig na bram ze'i khye'u gnyis shig gnas pa de gnyis kyis mkhan po las rig byed 'don pa bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-0: chos lugs kyis mkhan po la'ang @128b mkhan po'i yon dbul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-1: slob dpon la'ang slob dpon gyi yon dbul dgos par shes nas sems shing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-2: de nas de gnyis kyis rgyal po nor can gyi bus mchod sbyin gyi mjug tu rab tu sbyin pa chen po lnga bshams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-3: bram ze gang kha ton rdzogs par lobs pa de dbang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-4: zhes zer ba thos nas de gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-5: blang bar bya ba de len du der 'dong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-6: bdag cag gnyis kyi nang na mang du thos pa'i rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-7: kha ton lobs pa'i rab gang yin pa nges par bya'o snyam nas rgyal po nor can gyi bu'i grong khyer chen po ga la ba der chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-8: rgyal po de'ang lhas sbran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-9: bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-10: blo gros zhes bya ba gnyis 'dir 'ong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-11: de gnyis kyi nang na blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba de la rab tu sbyin pa chen po 'di dag phul cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-12: rgyal po chen po khyod kyis lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mchod sbyin byas pa de'i 'bras bu bas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po de la rab tu sbyin pa chen po byin pa de'i 'bras bu ches che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-14: de nas rgyal po des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-15: de gnyis kyi phyir lhas kyang spran pa las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-17: bdag nyid che ba yin gor ma chag snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:128b-18: de nas rgyal po des thag ring po zhig nas bram ze'i khye'u byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa de gnyis 'ong ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-0: de gnyis kyang mchod sbyin byed pa'i gnas der @129a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-1: 'ongs nas bram ze'i gral du skabs phye ba'i sar stan la 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-2: de nas rgyal po nor can gyi dus de gnyis mthong nas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-3: bdag la lhas spran pa'i blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-4: 'di yin gor ma chag snyam nas rgyal po de gral dpon gyi mdun du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-5: bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-6: khyod blo gros bzang po yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-9: de nas rgyal po nor can gyi bus bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po gral dpon du bzhag ste zan byin nas rab tu sbyin par bya ba chen po rnam pa lnga po de dag byin pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-10: bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos rab tu sbyin pa chen po'i gser gyi 'khar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-11: ril ba la sogs pa bzhi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-13: rab tu sbyin pa'i nang nas bu mo gcig pu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-16: tshangs par spyod pa yin no zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-17: de nas bu mo des bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa mthong nas chags shing snying du sdug par gyur te khye'u blo gros bzang po de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129a-21: bdag gis blangs du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-0: de nas bu mo de rgyal pos kyang rab tu sbyin pa'i bsam pas yongs su btang ste phyir ma khyer la bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos kyang ma blangs nas rgyal po mar me'i grong @129b khyer mar me ldan du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-1: de der song nas rang gi rgyan rnams lus las bkrol te me tog phreng ba rgyud pa la byin nas rgyan 'di rin che ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-2: nga la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i mchod par autpa la sngon po byin cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-3: de nas des de'i lung bzhin du gser gyi rgyan de byin te lha'i rim gro byed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-4: bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po de'ang rab tu sbyin pa chen po bzhi po de dag khyer te mkhan po'i thad du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-5: song nas kyang rab tu sbyin pa chen po rnams pa bzhi po de dag mkhan po la phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-6: mkhan pos kyang de rnams kyi nang nas rnam pa gsum ni; blangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-7: karsha pa na lnga brgya ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-8: blo gros bzang po de nyid la byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-9: blo gros bzang pos de kho na'i nub mo rmi lam rnams pa bcu rmis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-10: rgya mtsho chen po btung ngo snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-11: nam mkha' la 'gro'o snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-12: nyi ma dang zla ba mthu che ba 'di gnyis lag pas reg cing gzung bar bya'o snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-13: rgyal po rnams shing rta khyer du gzhug go snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-14: drang srong rnams dang glang po che dkar po rnams dang ngang pa rnams dang sengge rnams dang brag chen po la bzhon par bya'o snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-15: des rmi lam de rnams rmis nas sad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-17: bdag gi rmi lam 'di rnams lung ston par nus pa su yod snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:129b-18: de nas thag mi ring ba zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-0: de nas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros @130a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-1: bzang po the tshom gcad pa'i phyir drang srong de'i thad du song nas blo gros bzang pos drang srong de la kun tu dga' ba'i gtam byas nas rmi lam de rnams bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-2: khyod kyis rmi lam rnam pa bcu po 'di rnams kyi don nges par gyis shig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-3: de nas drang srong des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-4: bdag gis rmi lam 'di rnams lung ston mi nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-5: rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan du song zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-6: de na rgyal po mar mes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad zhabs la reg par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi nang du spyan drangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-7: des rmi lam 'di rnams lung ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-9: de nas rgyal po nor can gyi bu des rgyal po mar mes spring pa bzhin du mnyan te blon po brgyad khris zhabs 'bring byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan du phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-10: rgyal po mar mes kyang zhag bdun lon nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad zhabs sa la reg par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi nang du spyan drangs bar bya'o snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-11: yul dang grong khyer thams cad nas me tog thams cad bsdus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130a-12: der gang gi nyin par rgyal po mar mes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad zhabs la reg par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi nang du spyan 'dren pa de'i nyin par blo gros bzang po'ang der 'ongs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-0: des rgyal po des me tog thams cad bsdus par @130b gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-1: bu mo lha'i rim gro byed pa de'ang me tog phreng ba rgyud pa'i thad du song nas lha'i mchod pa bya dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-2: bdag la autpa la sngon po byin cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-3: me tog phreng ba rgyud pas smras pa; deng rgyal po sangs rgyas spyan drang ba'i phyir me tog thams cad bsdus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-5: me tog gi rdzing der song la yang ltos shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-6: gal te bdag gi bsod nams kyis autpa la sngon po ma gtogs pa rnyed kyang srid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-7: de nas me tog gi rdzing der blo gros bzang po'i bsod nams kyi mthus autpa la sngon po bdun byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-8: de nas me tog gi phreng ba rgyud pa de song nas des mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-9: mthong nas kyang bu mo des me tog phreng ba rgyud pa la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-11: me tog phreng ba rgyud pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-12: bla nas bdag la gyod rmas su 'ong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-13: bdag gis btog tu mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-15: khyod kyi sngar me tog thams cad btogs te rgyal po lam phul lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-16: me tog phreng ba rgyud pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-18: de nas bu mo des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-20: bdag gi bsod nams las skyes pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-21: 'di rnams thogs la bdag la byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-22: me tog phreng ba rgyud pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-23: bla nas ma tshor bar 'di dag ji ltar 'khyer bar bya; bu mos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-24: bdag gi bsod nams kyi mthu las byung ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:130b-26: bdag gis chu'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste nang du bkur bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-1: tog phreng ba rgyud pas de skad ces thos nas de dag btogs te bu mo de la byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-2: des kyang blangs nas chu'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste dum pa de tshus bkang nas grong khyer gyi nang du chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-3: blo gros bzang po yang grong khyer gyi nang der phyin nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-4: bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa mi byar ga la rung snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-5: des me tog phreng ba rgyud pa'i khyim rnams bskor te me tog go cog btsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-6: me tog gcig kyang ma rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-7: de nas grong khyer gyi nub sgo nas byung ste kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra bar bskor te me tog rnams btsal kyang me tog gcig kyang ma rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-8: de nas 'khor 'khor te skyed mos tshal der phyin nas bu mo de'ang skyed mos tshal de nas byung ste bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po dang thad kar phrad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-9: de nas blo gros bzang po'i bsod nams kyi mthus me tog autpa la de dag chu'i bum pa de'i nang nas gyen du thon to; ;de nas blo gros bzang pos me tog de dag mthong nas bu mo de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-10: nga las rin karsha pa na lnga brgya longs la autpa la 'o ni rnams nga la byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-12: de'i tshe khyod kyis bdag bzhes su gnang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131a-13: da autpa la rnams bzhed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-0: zhes de skad smras nas yang bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po la smras @131b pa; 'di rnams kyis ci zhig bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-1: blo gros bzang pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-3: de'i 'og tu bu mo des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-4: bdag la karsha pa na cang mi 'tshal gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-5: gal te khyod la autpa la 'di dag phul ba'i 'bras bus tshe rabs thams cad du bdag khyod kyi btsun mor 'gyur bar bzhed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-6: gal te sbyin pa 'di byin pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-7: tshe rabs thams cad du khyod bdag gi chung mar gyur cig ces de skad du smon lam 'debs na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-8: bdag gis yi dbul bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-9: blo gros bzang pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-11: sbyin pa la dga' ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-12: bdag gi chung ma dang bu'ang yongs su gtong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-13: bdag gi sh'ang yongs su gtong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-15: je smon lam de ltar thob pa la slad kyis su ci 'dod pa de la bdag stsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-16: de skad ces smras nas bu mo des blo gros bzang po la autpa la lnga byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-18: bdag nyid kyis khyer nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-19: khyod kyis gang du smon pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-20: 'dran pa sangs rgyas rnyed pa der //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-21: rtag tu mthun par chos spyod pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-22: khyod kyi btsun mor bdag gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-23: de nas rgyal po des grong khyer de dag thams cad rngo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo med par byas nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dang dang rta babs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-25: dar gyi lnga ldi rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:131b-27: spos chab dang phye ma rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-1: khyer gyi sgo nas gtsug lag khang gi bar du'ang rngo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams med par byas nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rta babs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-5: spos chab dang phye mas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-7: rgyal po de nyid kyis kyang gdugs rtsibs brgya ba thogs nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad bsu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-8: de bzhin du blon po rnams kyis kyang bsu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-9: de bzhin du rgyal po nor can gyi bu blon po dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang bsu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-10: de nas rgyal pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs su gsol zhes gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te grong khyer logs su chas te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-11: rgyal po mar me'ang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi steng du gdugs rtsibs brgya ba thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-12: de bzhin du blon po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-13: rgyal po nor can gyi bu blon po dang bcas pa rnams kyang gdugs thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas re re nas da bdag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi gdugs thogs so snyam du sems par 'gyur pa blta bur rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i mdzes pa dang ldan pas grong khyer gyi sgor gshegs nas der bcom ldan @132b 'das kyis ched du mdzad de sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag pa de kho na'i mod la sa rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-1: 'gul rab tu 'gul; kun tu rab tu 'gul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-3: kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-4: chos nyid kyis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang gi tshe ched du mdzad de sgo'i them pa la zhabs 'jog pa na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-6: rang bzhin gyi sems thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-15: bud med bu 'byung du mi btub pa rnams ni; bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-16: shing mig gi gdos dang rkang sgril dang aan pan btags pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-17: bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-18: chung du nas 'khon byung ba rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-19: de ma thag tu byams pa'i sems thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-21: be'u gdang bcad de ma'i thad du 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-22: glang po che rnams kyang skad 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-24: khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-25: ne tso dang ri skeg dang khu byug dang shang shang te'u rnams kyang skad snyan pa 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:132b-26: rgyan snod du bcug pa rnams kyang sgra snyan pa 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-5: rngo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams kyang med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-6: lha rnams kyang bar snang las lha'i me tog autpa la dang padma dang ku mud dang padma dkar po rnams 'thor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-7: aa ga ru'i phye ma dang rgya spos kyi phye ma dang tsandan gyi phye ma dang ta ma la'i phye ma rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-8: lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba rnams kyang 'thor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-9: shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-10: nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-11: lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho; ;byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-13: mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-14: rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan de na srog chags 'bum phrag du ma me tog dang bdug pa dang spos rnams kyis bkur sti byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-16: bu mo de'ang padma khyer te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ga la ba der dong ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-17: de dag skye bo phal po che mchod pa byed pas gtams nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ma chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133a-19: skye bo phal po che 'di rnams las bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po bsod nams ches 'phel bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas rdzi char drag po chen po zhig sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-0: de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis go skabs phye nas bram @133b ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos skabs thod de bcom ldan 'das blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin tu dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-1: dga' ba skyes nas autpa la lnga po de dag bcom ldan 'das la gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-2: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis de dag shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag tu bla brer chags shing 'dug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-4: gzhes na ni sdong par byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-5: de nas bu mo des de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-6: autpa la gnyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas de gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi snyan gyi gong du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi bla brer chags shing 'dug par byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-7: sa phyogs de dag kyang rdzi char drag po chen pos 'dam rdzab tu gyur nas de'i 'og tu sa phyogs 'dam rdzab can der bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa na bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos sa phyogs 'dam rdzab can der bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skra bting nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-8: blo ldan sad mdzad gal te bdag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-9: byang chub tu ni 'tshang rgya na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-10: skye rga med mdzad zhabs gnyis kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-11: myur du bdag skra brdzi bar gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-12: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po'i skra'i steng du zhabs gnyis bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:133b-13: de nas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'dug pa de khros nas kye ltos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-1: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'dis bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po'i skra phyugs la bya ba bzhin du brtsis so zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-2: de nas de'i 'og tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po lung bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-3: khyod ni sa 'dir 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-4: stan pa mnga' bdag 'jig rten gsum las rnam grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-5: sh'akya'i sras po sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gsum gyi snying po 'gro ba'i sgron du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-7: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po lung bstan ma thag pa de'i mod kho na la nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-8: de nas de'i sgra byi nas skra gsar khyad par du 'phags pa byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-9: de nas de nam mkha' la 'dug pa skye bo phal po ches mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-10: mthong nas kyang smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-11: gang gi tshe 'dis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag cag 'di'i nyan thos su gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-12: bu mo des smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-13: khyod kyis gang du smon pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-14: 'dren pa sangs rgyas brnyes pa der //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-15: rtag tu mthun par chos spyod pa'i; ;khyod kyi btsun mor bdag gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-16: gang tshe khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-18: de yi dus bab khyod kyi ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134a-19: nyan thos mar yang bdag gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-0: @134b mkha' gnas bram ze'i khye'u mthong nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-1: brgya phrag dang ni stong phrag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-2: thams cad ma 'ongs dus rtag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-3: nyan thos nyid du smon par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-4: gang tshe khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-6: de yi dus bab khyod kyi ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-7: nyan thos pa dag cag 'gyur bar shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-9: de nas gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po lung bstan pa de'i tshe rgyal po mar mes de'i skra blangs nas rgyal po nor can gyi bus smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-10: skra 'di dag bdag la byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-11: de nas rgyal po mar mes skra de dag de la byin nas des blangs te bgrangs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-12: skra nyag ma brgyad khri byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-13: de nas rgyal po de'i blon po rnams kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-15: bdag cag la skra nyag ma re re stsal bar gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-16: 'on kyang bdag cag gis de rnams mchod rten du bgyi bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-17: de nas rgyal po des blon po de dag la skra nyag ma re re byin nas blon po de dag rang rang gi yul du song ste mchod rten brtsigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-18: gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe rgyal po mar me dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-19: rgyal po nor can gyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-21: yul mi du mas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi yon tan la bltas te mo byad thams cad bstabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-22: de nas blo gros bzang pos bram ze'i khye'u blo gros la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:134b-24: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-5: bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-6: khyod kyis ci zhig byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-9: gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zhabs kyis khyod kyi skra brdzis pa de'i tshe bdag khros te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i skra phyugs la bya ba bzhin du rkang pas brdzis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-12: de nas blo gros bzang pos de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-15: de nas blo gros bzang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-16: blo gros gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab la rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-17: blo gros bzang po rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te chos bzhin du 'khor bsdus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-18: de nas bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-19: bram ze'i khye'u blo gros ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-20: shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas sems can dmyal bar skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-23: de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang por gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-24: ngas der sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la autpa la sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'khor ba na bde ba chen po myong bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135a-25: dge ba'i rtsa ba des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-0: @135b nga'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-2: tshogs tsam du gyur la da lta'i bar du'ang las de'i rnam par smin pas mdza' sde bo lnga brgya pa rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa yin no ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-6: bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs pa las ri khrod cig tu byon nas de der gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-7: shing gi grib ma la skad cig mnyel bsos nas chas te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-8: lam de'ang sengge'i 'jigs pa chen po dang ldan pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lam kha gnyis su gyes pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-14: drang la 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-16: 'khyog la 'jigs pa ma mchis pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-18: shul gang du gshegs par mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-21: gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa de na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-24: bag tsha ba ci'ang med kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-25: lam drang po logs su gnas shig ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:135b-26: grong mi'i byis pa gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas thag mi ring ba zhig na rtse zhing 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-4: de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing spa bar byas ba rgyang nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-5: mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-6: dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-11: bdag cag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bsel bgyi bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-14: khyod gnyis kyis sengge'i 'jigs pa byung na ji ltar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-17: bdag gis rol mo'i sgras skrag par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-20: mda' gzhu'i sgras skrag par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-21: de skad ces gsol nas khye'u de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun logs su chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-23: 'di gnyis kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin to snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136a-25: khyed gnyis kyis sems dga' ba bskyed pa de tsam gyis bsel byas zin te chog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-0: de nas khye'u de gnyis phyir log nas bcom ldan 'das @136b 'dzum pa mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-3: de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser bo dang dmar po dang dkar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-4: 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-5: sems can dmyal ba yang nas kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-9: 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-10: sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang du 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-11: chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so tham tham dang kyi hud zer dang aa chu zer dang autpa la ltar gas pa dang padma ltar gas pa dang padma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-13: grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-15: des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-16: de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-17: kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-18: 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo; ;de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-19: de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-21: 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:136b-23: 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-1: dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-2: lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nyid mtshams 'dzin par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-3: steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-4: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'phrul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-5: tshangs ris rnams dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa dang tshangs pa chen po dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che rnams dang mi che rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-8: bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-9: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-10: nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-11: sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-12: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin; ;'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-14: bag yod spyod par byed pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-15: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137a-16: sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-1: de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-2: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-4: ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-5: mdun legs su ma snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-6: sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-7: zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-8: dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-9: zhabs kyi rting bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-10: yi dvags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-11: zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-12: mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-13: pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-14: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-15: phyag g-yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-16: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-17: phyag g-yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro; ;lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-18: lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-19: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-20: zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-21: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhad na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-22: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:137b-24: dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-1: nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-3: tshon sna stong gi spel ba sna tshogs can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-4: mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-5: de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-6: nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-7: yang tshigs su bcad pa gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-8: rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-9: sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-10: rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-11: padma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-12: brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-13: dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams; ;thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-14: bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-15: rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur bstan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-16: mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi nar 'dzum mi ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-17: gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-18: de ni khyod la skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-0: rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad @138b de; kun dga' bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-1: khyod kyi khye'u 'di gnyis kyis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur sti byas pa mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-5: khye'u 'di gnyis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-7: sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-8: bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-9: mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyar cing 'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-10: gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-11: des slob dpon med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-12: man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-14: rang sangs rgyas rnga sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-17: de gnyis kyi sbyin pa'i chos ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-19: dbyig mtsho zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-20: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-21: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-22: yongs su 'dzin pa dag yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-23: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:138b-24: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-0: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de gang gi tshe bu @139a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-1: chags par gyur pa de'i tshe de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-2: khang bzang thams cad du gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-3: me tog sna tshogs ni; bkram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-5: chag chag btab pa'i nang na mal khri la 'dug ste bud med kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-6: de nas khyim bdag des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-7: ma la bdag gi chung ma 'di 'byung po 'ga' zhig gis thebs par ma gyur grang snyam nas ltas mkhan rnams la bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-10: 'byung pos thebs pa ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-11: sems can lto na 'dug pa de'i mthu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-13: de nas zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-14: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-15: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-16: mngal gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang khrag gi dri mas ma gos pa zhig btsas nas de bud med de dag gis bkru bar 'dod de rgyan bkrol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-17: de'i rgyan gzhan byung ste bkrol te bor yang gzhan byung bar gyur nas mas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-19: 'di'i bsod nams las skyes pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-20: ma bkrol bar rgyan dang bcas par khrus shig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-21: de nas bud med de dag gis rgyan dang bcas te bkrus nas mal khri'i steng du bzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139a-22: des mi'i mal khri mi snang bar gyur nas lha'i mal khri byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-0: khang bzang de nyid du'ang de'i lha'i khang @139b pa brtsegs pa gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang pa dan bsgreng pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-1: me tog sna tshogs bkram pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-2: spos chus chag chag btab pa byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-3: khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang gi mal khri'i sngas su'ang lha'i mchod sdong ril gyis gser las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-4: rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-5: mchod sdong de'i drung nas kyang gter chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ba kha bye ba bzhi byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-6: gal te de dag las brgya'am stong phyung du zin kyang de dag 'grib pa'am gang bar yang mi mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-7: de nas phan gnyis kyis mthong ma thag tu shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-8: de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-9: khye'u 'di btsas pa na khyim 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyis mtsho bzhin du gang bar gyur pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-10: de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dbyig mtsho zhes gdags so zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-11: de nas khye'u dbyig mtsho pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-12: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-13: dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-14: rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-15: bud med rma bya'i mdongs chang pa na thogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:139b-16: srung ba'i srad bu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-0: de gang du 'gro ba der mi ma yin pa rnams kyis de la ras gsar @140a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-1: pa ma spyad pa tshar tshar ring ba rnams la gding bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-2: me tog sna tshogs kyang sa la 'grem par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-3: de nas gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-4: yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-5: de nas de'i phas dgun dang sos ka dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-6: skyed mos tshal rnams byas nas de dag kyang lha rdzas su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-7: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-13: de nas de dag gi tshe 'dod pa la longs spyod par nus par gyur pa de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dag byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-14: de khang bzang gi steng du 'dug nas bud med 'ba' zhig dang rol mo byed de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-15: de nas de phyi zhig na sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140a-16: chos la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-0: dge 'dun la mngon par dga' bar gyur @140b nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-1: bdag gis lha dang mi'i longs spyod ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-2: yongs su longs spyod zin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-4: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste chu bo rnams las yang dag par brgal bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-5: sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-7: 'bad par bya gor ma chag snyam du bsam nas sbyin pa dag byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-8: bsod nams dag kyang byas te dbul po du ma phyug par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-9: de rab tu byung nas de phyogs gang du gnas par dam bcas pa'i phyogs der lha'i mal khri 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-10: de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi ma yin pa rnams kyis ras gsar pa ma spyad pa tshar tshar ring ba rnams sa la 'ding bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-11: me tog sna tshogs kyang sa la 'gram par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-12: de de lta bus ngo tsha bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-14: snying thag pa nas de la mi lta ba'i sems skyed cig dang thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-15: de nas des thos ma thag tu thams cad la mi lta ba'i sems bskyed nas thams cad med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-16: de nas des brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-18: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:140b-19: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-1: lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-2: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-3: rig pas sgo pa'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-4: rig pa dang mngon par shes dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-5: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-6: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-7: de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-9: dbyig mtshos las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-10: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-11: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-12: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mngal gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang khrag gi dri mas ma gos par btsas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-13: skyes ma thag tu 'ang lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang lha'i mal khri dang lha'i mchod sdong byung bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-14: de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi ma lags pa rnams kyis ras gsar pa ma spyad pa cher tshar ring ba dag 'ding bar bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-15: me tog sna tshogs kyang sa la 'grem par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141a-16: cher skyes pa na'ang lha dang mi'i dpal byung bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-0: 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid @141b mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-2: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-4: 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-6: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-9: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-10: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-12: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-13: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-14: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de phyi zhig na sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-15: chos la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-16: dge 'dun la mngon par dga' bar gyur nas dos phyi zhig na rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang ba rtsigs nas gtsug lag khang de nyid du bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:141b-17: bshos la spyan drangs nas de'i mtshan mo cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142a-0: zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa bshams te bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la chog dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi @142a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142a-1: dge 'dun zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang sen mo bdag nyid kyis khyer nas gtsug lag khang de nyid du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142a-2: las byed pa rnams bsags nas des ring po ma thogs par mchod rten de rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142a-3: de nas des bltas nas mchod rten de bya rnams kyis mi gtsang bar byas pa mthong nas des yang mchod rten de nyid dgab pa'i phyir gtsang khang phyur po lan kan dang rta babs dang skar khung khol ma can dang skar khung dra ba can dang char khab kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142a-4: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams bsgreng ba zhig byas nas mchod rten de'i nang gi sa gzhi la'ang gzhi bting ste bdug pa dang phye ma dang spos dang me tog dang rol mo'i sgras bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142a-5: kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142a-6: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142a-7: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142a-8: mngal gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang khrag gi dri mas mgos par skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-0: bdag skyes ma thag tu lha'i mal khri dang lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang @142b lha'i mchod sdong ril gyis gser las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-1: rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'byung bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-2: de'i drung nas kyang gter chen po kha phye ba mchod sdong de dang 'brel ba zhig byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-3: de las gal te brgya'am stong blangs su zin kyang de dag 'grib pa'am gang bar yang mi mngon par shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-4: cher skyes pa na'ang lha dang mi'i dpal 'byung bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-6: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-7: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-10: de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-12: des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti byas nas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-13: gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:142b-14: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-1: gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang khrag gi dri mas ma gos par gyur la btsas ma thag tu 'ang lha'i mal khri dang lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang lha'i mchod sdong byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-2: cher skyes pa na'ang lha dang mi'i dpal byung bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-4: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-7: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-8: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-9: dbyig dga' zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-10: bcom ldan 'das yul k'a shi'i phyogs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las w'a ra n'a sir byon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-11: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi gnas na dge slong lnga sde rnams gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-12: de nas dge slong lnga sde rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-13: mthong nas kyang phan tshun nas 'dus te nang khrims bcas nas 'di skad du kye dge sbyong goo ta ma de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-16: mang du ga sog cing 'tsho ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143a-17: spong ba las nyams pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143b-0: nga kha zas mang du za zhing 'bras can dang tsang bye za la zhun mar dang til mar gyis lus rnams skud par byed cing chu dron @143b pos lus 'khru bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143b-1: de 'u bu cag gi thad du 'ong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:143b-3: stan dag yod kyi gal te 'dod pa lta na 'dug cig ces de skad tsam dag smra bar bya'i /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:150a-27: byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams kyi skal shas stsal nas g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:150b-6: de'i ring la 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:150b-7: rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:150b-8: 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang nad dang mu ge med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:150b-9: 'bras s'a lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:150b-10: gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du tshes bzhin du rgyal srid byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:150b-11: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a s'i na ded dpon dbyig ces bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:150b-13: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:150b-14: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing dag la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:150b-15: de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-1: pa; smin ma stug pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-2: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-3: khye'u 'di dbyig gi bu yin gyi; khye'u 'di'i ming dbyig dga' zhes gdags so zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-4: de nas khye'u dbyig dga' 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-5: de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-6: yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-7: khye'u de'ang byams pa'i rang bzhin can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-10: sbyin pa la dga' ba zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-11: des pha ma la gsol nas dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-16: sdug cing phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag bya ba la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151a-17: de nas phyi zhig na ded dpon dbyig nad kyi thebs nas de rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-0: 'bras bu'i sman @151b rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang sos par ma nus te shin nas de ras sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-3: dkar po rnams kyis brgyan pa'i khyogs la khyer te rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas yun mi ring ba zhig tu mdun byas pa las mdun bor te 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-4: de nas de'u bu dbyig dga' de rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis ded dpon chen por dbang bskur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-5: de'i nor gyis tshong pa dmang po nyo tshong byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-6: de'ang pha shi nas sbyin pa rgya chen po byed pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-7: de nas phyi zhig na des bsam pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-10: bdag gis 'di las sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-11: 'di'i phyir bdag la gzhan dag 'phya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-13: gzhan gyis bsags pa'i rdzas rnams kyis sbyin bdag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-14: 'di la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod ces zer bar 'ong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:151b-15: mal bdag nyid kyis nor bsgrubs te rang gi zho shas bsgrubs nas sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag bya gor ma chag snyam nas des dril bsgrags te /
