K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197a-8: ma thogs pa kho nar bag ma longs longs la khyed cag gi khyim du khrid cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197a-9: de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag des bu chas su bcug ste khye'u de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas 'byor pa chen po dang ldan pas gyos po'i khyim du btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197a-10: de nas khyim bdag des kyang khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi khyim ba'i chos bzhin du byas nas bu mo khyim thab la btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197a-11: de nas bag ma blangs zin pa'i 'og tu bu mo de bros te dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du song nas rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197a-12: mkhan mos kyang de la lung phog nas des brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197a-14: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-0: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis @197b mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-1: khye'u des kyang chung ma bros pa thos nas thos ma thag tu g-yog 'khor mang po dag dang bcas te tshol zhing dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-2: khye'u des bdag gi chung ma skra bregs te chos gos tshon can bgos te skyil mo krung bcas nas bsam gtan byed pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-3: mthong ma thag tu de'i thad du song nas des lag pa nas bzung bar byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-4: de steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-7: glog 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan nas de mthong ma thag tu khye'u de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-8: skye bo mang po de dag shas cher dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-9: dga' bar gyur nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-10: skal pa chen mo mar spyon mar spyon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-11: bdag cag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang du gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-12: de nas de sa la babs nas khye'u des rkang pa la phyag btsal te bzod pa gsol nas yo byad thams cad kyang bstabs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-13: des kyang de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:197b-17: rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-0: skye bo mang po de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye @198a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-1: shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong nas khye'u des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-2: bud med kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-3: bdag gis kyang khyim na gnas pa btang la bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas chu bo rnams las brgal bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-4: sbyor ba rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-6: 'bad par bya'o snyam nas pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas des kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-8: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-9: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-10: de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-12: dge slong ma 'dis las gang dag bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-13: bag mar mchis pa'i 'og tu nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-14: dge slong 'dis kyang 'di kho na la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198b-0: smon @198b lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198b-2: 'di gnyis kyis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198b-5: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198b-8: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198b-9: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198b-11: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag gcig gi bu mo thabs snga ma kho na ltar rab tu byung nas de'i khyim thab kyis kyang de kho na la brten te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas dge slong ma des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad de 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198b-12: 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:198b-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la thabs 'di kho na bzhin du bag mar song ba'i 'og tu rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-0: de nas de sngon gyi khyim thab kyis mthong nas @199a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-2: khyod kyis smon lam ji lta bu zhig btab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-3: de nas des de la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-4: de nas dge slong des kyang smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-6: ji ltar khyod la brten nas bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed pa de bzhin du de kho na'i tshe'ang nga nyid khyod kyi khyim thab tu gyur te khyod kho na la brten nas bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-7: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-8: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-11: de'i tshe dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-12: dge slong ma 'di nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-13: des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199a-14: 'di ltar bdag bag mar song ba'i 'og tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la bdag da lta bzhin du bag mar song ba'i 'og tu rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum @199b du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-2: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-5: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas da ltar 'di bag mar song ba'i 'og tu rab tu byung nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-6: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-7: de'i tshe khyim thab tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-9: des der smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-10: de'i tshe nga nyid khyod kyi khyim thab tu gyur nas khyod kho na la brten te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-11: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-12: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-13: da ltar 'dis 'di kho na la brten nas nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-14: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-15: bag ma gtong ba phyi ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-16: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:199b-17: de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po'i gtso bo gnyis yod pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-0: de gnyis mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs @200a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-2: de gnyis kyis thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de gnyis chung ma dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-3: de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis lhan cig tu tshogs te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-5: bdag cag gnyis kyis ci nas mdza' ba 'di las ji srid 'tsho'i bar du cung zad kyang 'bye bar mi bya'o zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-6: de nas ri dvags 'dzin gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-7: 'o na bdag cag gnyis kyis ji ltar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-11: khyed la bu khye'u'am bu mo lta yod dam; byin gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-14: 'o na bdag la bu khye'u yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-16: khyod la'ang bu khye'u yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-18: bdag cag gnyis gnyen du ji ltar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-20: gnyen du bya ba la rnam pa gnyis yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-22: da dung ma skyes pa'i gnyen no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-23: bdag cag gnyis la bu khye'u yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-25: da dung ma skyes pa'i gnyen byar rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-26: gal te bdag gi bu khye'u btsas la khyod kyi bu mo btsas na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-27: de bdag gi bu la byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-28: de ste khyod kyi bu khye'u btsas la bdag gi bu mo btsas na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-29: bdag gi de khyod kyi bu la sbyin par bya'o zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200a-31: zhes smras nas de gnyis song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-0: de nas @200b phyi zhig na ri dvags 'dzin gyi chung ma la bu chags par gyur nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu khye'u zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-1: de'i ming sa ga zhes btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-3: tshva chu dang 'dra ste; ji tsam du bstan pa de tsam du phyir zhing skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-4: snga phyir de'i bu bdun byung nas de rnams kyi btsas ston rgyas par byas te rigs dang mthun par ming btags nas bskyed bsrings so; ;de nas phyi zhig na byin pa'i chung ma la'ang bu chags par gyur nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-5: bu mo de rang bzhin gyis du bar gyur nas pha ma gnyis kyis de thabs cis kyang dgag par ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-6: de nas phyi zhig na skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'i khyim der song nas khyim bdag de la chos bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-7: bu mo de'ang chos thos nas kha rog ste 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-8: de nas gang gi tshe skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'is khyim bdag de la chos bshad nas phyir song ba de'i tshe'ang bu mo de ngu ba la zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-9: khyim bdag des 'khrigs te bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-11: chos nyan pa 'dod pa zhig yin gor ma chag snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-12: de nas de'i tshe btsas ston byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-13: bu mo 'di chos 'dod pa byin pa'i bu mo yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:200b-14: bu mo 'di'i ming chos byin ma zhes bya bar gdags so zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-1: chos byin ma 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings nas de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma gnyis la gsol te dus dus su dge slong rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-2: dge slong ma rnams la bshos gsol nas de rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste chos nyan par byed do; ;de nas des chos thos nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-3: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas des khyim na gnas bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rdzu 'phrul yang bsgrubs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-4: des bden pa mthong nas pha ma gnyis la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-6: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol; pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-8: khyod ma skyes pa'i snga rol nas bdag cag gnyis kyis khyim thab la byin zin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-9: bdag cag gnyis kyis gnang bar byar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-12: 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-14: pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-15: bdag cag gnyis kyis khyod la gnang bar byar mi rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201a-16: 'on kyang khyod nyid la brten te bdag cag gnyis kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201b-0: ri dvags 'dzin la'ang bzlugs @201b la khyod bdag nyid kyis khyim thab la gsol te rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201b-1: ces byas nas khyim bdag byin pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201b-2: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po bshams te nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te chu ra bkang ste bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201b-4: gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham bas dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag byin pa'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byin nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201b-7: de nas khyim bdag byin pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201b-8: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te gsang sder ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:201b-12: bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-0: de nas des bu mo chos byin ma rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa @202a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-1: las bzlog ma nus nas khyim bdag ri dvags 'dzin la sbran te khyod nyid 'dir shog la zlog cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-2: de nas de thos ma thag tu ri dvags 'dzin g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa lhags nas khyim bdag byin pa'i khyim phyi bskor te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag byin pa g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-6: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las gzhengs te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-7: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs nas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun yang dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-8: bu mo chos byin ma'ang de dag dang thabs cig tu song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-9: khye'u sa ga dang ri dvags 'dzin g-yog 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bu mo chos byin ma khyim de nas byung ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-10: mthong nas kyang khye'u sa gas bu mo chos byin ma gzung zhes byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-11: de steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-14: glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-15: de mthong nas khye'u sa gas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-16: 'dis chos 'di lta bu thob pa las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-17: 'di bdag dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa rnams longs spyod par ga la 'gyur snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-18: so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202a-19: de mthong ma thag tu rkang pa la phyag btsal nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-0: @202b skal pa chen mo mar sbyon mar spyon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-1: bdag cag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-2: de nas de nam mkha' las babs nas khye'u sa gas kyang rkang pa la phyag btsal te bzod pa gsol nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-3: bdag gis khyod de bzhin du gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-4: yo byad thams cad kyang sbyar bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-5: khyod la ci dgos pa de dag thams cad bdag gis sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-6: zhes byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-7: de nas chos byin mas de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-10: yang dag par dga' bar byas nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-11: de nas dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du song ste rab tu byung nas dge slong ma rnams kyis de la dge tshul ma'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang phog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-12: chos drug gi bslab pa'i sdom pa'ang phog nas de gang gi tshe lo gnyis kyi bar du chos drug la bslabs nas bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de'i tshe dge slong ma rnams kyis de la tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas kyi sdom pa phog ste bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-13: de'ang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-14: kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa; yul na bzang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-15: byad gzugs dpe med pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:202b-16: btsas ma thag tu skye bo mang pos bslangs na'ang khyim bdag byin pas sngon gzhan la byin zin pa'i phyir su la'ang ma byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-0: @203a *// de gang gi tshe rab tu byung ba de'i tshe gzhan dag gi sems skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-1: 'di khyim na gnas pa'i tshe ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-2: bdag cag gis ma thob na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-5: bdag cag gis ci dga' mgur byar yod do snyam nas bskor bar chad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-6: thabs ji ltar byas na 'di bdag cag gis dbrog nus par 'gyur snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-7: kha cig song ste dge slong ma rnams la sbrin nas dge slong ma rnams kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-9: 'di bdag cag gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid de bsnyen par rdzogs par byed kyang mi nus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-10: dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang 'dir yang gzhag par mi nus so snyam ste pha'i khyim du khrid nas der bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-11: de nas dge slong ma rnams kyis de'i gtam rgyas par bcom ldan 'das la gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-13: bdag cag gis dge slong ma chos byin ma ji ltar bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-15: 'o na dge slong ma chos byin ma 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-16: phyin chad gzhan zhig phyi rol tu 'byung ba la 'di kho na dang 'dra ba'i nyes dmigs 'byung bar 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203a-17: de'ang 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas de thos ma thag tu dge slong ma rnams kyis de 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-0: gzhung las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin @203b du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-1: de nas 'phrin gyis zlug pa'i dge slong ma chos byin ma'i thad du song nas bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-3: khyod bsnyen par rdzogs zin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-4: bag yod par nan tan gyis shig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-5: de nas de thos ma thag tu chos byin mas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-6: de dgra bcom ma khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-7: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-8: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-9: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-10: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-11: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-12: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-13: de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-15: chos byin mas las ci zhig bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:203b-16: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis; bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis nas 'di kho na la brten te bcom ldan 'das @204a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-1: kyis dge slong ma rnams la 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang bar mdzad lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-3: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to; ;btsun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-4: 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-6: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-9: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-10: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-11: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag cig gnas pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-12: phyi zhig na de'i bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-14: byad gzugs dpe med pa zhig btsas nas de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204a-15: de'i tshe des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des pha ma la gsol te rab tu byung nas de bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir phyi rol tu byung ba las nyes dmigs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204b-0: gang gi tshe 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur ba de'i tshe 'phrin gyis zlug pa'i dge slong ma de'i thad du song nas bsgo @204b ba; ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod bsnyen par rdzogs zin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204b-1: bag yod par nan tan gyis shig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204b-2: de nas de'i tshe des nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204b-3: dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204b-7: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mkhan mos de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas te sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas bdug pa dang phye ma dang spos dang me tog gis bkur sti byas te tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204b-8: 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan ci'ang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204b-9: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:204b-10: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205a-0: ji ltar bdag gi slob ma la brten nas yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ba de bzhin du bdag kyang sh'akya thub pa sh'akya'i rgyal po'i mchog des 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa gnang nas de'i @205a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205a-1: bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205a-3: ji snyam du sems; de'i tshe dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205a-4: dge slong ma chos byin ma 'di nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205a-5: des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205a-6: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205a-7: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205a-8: ji ltar bdag gi slob ma la brten nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ba de bzhin du sh'akya thub pa sh'akya'i rgyal po'i mchog des kyang bdag la brten te 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang bar gyur cig ces byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205a-10: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205a-13: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205b-0: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab @205b tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas 'di nyid la brten te ngas dge slong ma rnams la 'phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205b-1: de nas yang dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205b-3: dge slong ma chos byin ma 'di skye bo mang pos bstod nas tshegs chen pos tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas ji ltar bsrungs pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205b-5: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205b-6: 'das pa'i dus na'ang 'di skye bo mang pos bstod nas tshegs chen pos tshangs par spyad pa'i gnas ji ltar bsrungs pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205b-8: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205b-9: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag gcig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205b-10: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:205b-11: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te rigs dang mthun par ming btags nas 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-0: de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod dang lag rtsis dang 'byung ba dang spa ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po @206a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-1: che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-2: yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-3: de nas de'i phas thabs zlar bab pa las de'i chung ma blangs nas de'ang de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-4: khye'u de bu mo de la shas cher chags nas de med kyi bar du 'dug mi 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-5: des zong bzhag pa dang tshong khang bor nas de 'ba' zhig dang lhan cig 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-6: de nas khyim bdag des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-7: 'di 'di la chags na nor zas thams cad zad par 'ong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-8: 'di nor 'di dang dbral dgos so snyam nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-11: gal te khyod 'di bzhin du 'dug ste las mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-12: rgas pa'i tshe phongs par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-14: ji srid kyi bar du khyod kyi 'byung ba chen po rnams la mthu yod kyi bar du nor sgrub par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206a-15: phyis chung ma dang sdug par gyur ta re zhes smras nas khyim bdag des le'u glon pa'i zong sta gon byas nas khye'u de yul gzhan du btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-0: khye'u des kyang rnga mo dang bong bu la sogs pa la zong bkal nas grong dang grong khyer dang nags khrod kyi grong dang yul chen po rnams bgrod de rgyad chad pa zhig tu phyin nas de chung ma'i phyir rtsa sngon po brdas pa bskams pa @206b bzhin du 'dug ste des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-1: bdag de dang myur du phrad par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam ste de'i thabs sems shing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-2: de nas de'i tshe ri khrod kyi grong de na shing mkhan bzo thabs mkhan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-3: shing gi bzo thabs kyi nam mkha' lding nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed shes pa zhig 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-4: de nas khye'u des kyang thos nas thos ma thag tu bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-5: der 'gro ba'i thabs bdag gis rnyed do snyam ste bzo thabs mkhan gyi thad du song nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-7: mi khyod kyis bzo thabs kyi nam mkha' lding 'di bdag la byin cig dang bdag gis khyod la karsha pa na lnga brgya sbyin no zhes byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-9: bdag gis khyod la gtan sbyin du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-11: nyi ma re re bdag gi thad nas longs la don gnyer du song nas phyir khyer te 'ongs nas bdag la phul cig ces zer ro; ;de nas khye'us smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-12: khyod ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-13: zhes byas nas mi des nam mkha' lding de bcos te 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-14: phyir ldog pa'ang bslabs nas byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-15: de nas de de la zhon nas rang gi khyim du song ste chung ma dang lhan du dga' ba nyams su myong nas phyir yang ri khrod kyi grong de nyid du 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:206b-16: de nas phyi zhig na de'i chud ma de la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon te bu btsas la thug pa dang bzo thabs kyi slob dpon de don zhig la yul gzhan du song nas phyin chad khye'u de rang gi khyim du 'gro mi nus par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-0: bu mo de'ang gyo sgyug gnyis kyis smras te nyes dmigs @207a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-1: 'di lta bu khyod kyis ji ltar byas zhes byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-3: jo bo nyid kyis byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-6: nga'i bu song nas lo du ma lon na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-8: de nas bu mo des de gnyis la gtam de rgyas par bsnyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-10: khyod ji skad zer ba de lta ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-12: de nas 'khang bzhin du nyes pa byas so snyam ste khyim nas bskrad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-13: de nas de w'a ra n'a si nas byung ste pha'i khyim logs su chas te de song song ba las ri khrod kyi grong zhig tu phyin nas de der song ste lam po cher bzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-14: de'i nub mo bu byung nas de na tsha mi bzod de myos shing 'dug pa la thag nye ba zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-15: de'i khyim na khyi'i ming 'byung po zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-16: khyi de lam po cher song nas khye'u de mthong ste des bud med de myos shing 'dug pa'i bar du khye'u de sos bzung nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-17: khyim bdag des kyang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa de mthong nas mthong ma thag tu bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-18: bu ma rungs pa bas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-19: gzhan gyi bu'ang bur byar rung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-22: khye'u 'di kho na blangs te gsos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-23: 'di bdag gi bur 'gyur ro snyam du bsam nas chung ma la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-26: bu ma rungs pa bas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207a-27: gzhan gyi bu'ang bur byar rung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-0: @207b bdag cag gnyis la bu'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-1: bu mo'ang med pas khye'u 'di bdag cag gis gsos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-7: zhes byas nas bud med de'i pang du zhugs te 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-9: rnga brdungs nas khye'u de'i btsas ston byed pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-10: de nas bu med snga ma de gang gi tshe na tsha zhi bar gyur pa de'i tshe langs te bu blang zhes byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-11: bu mi snang nas des nang par skye bo mang po nye 'khor na gnas pa rnams la khyed kyis byis pa lta ci mthong zhes dris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-12: der sus mthong ba de dag gis de la smras pa; khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi khyi 'byung po zhes bya ba des khye'u zhig khyer te khyim der song ngo zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-13: de nas bud med des bud med gzhan zhig la brtsad de khyim der btang nas khyod song la khye'u de shi'am ma shi ltos shig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-14: de nas bud med de der song nas bltas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-15: khye'u khyim bdag des blangs te bur byas pa mthong nas bud med de phyir log ste bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-17: khye'u de dang bdag cag gnyis ka sdug par 'gyur na mi rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:207b-18: re zhig khye'u de 'di nyid na 'dug kyang rung ngo snyam du bsam nas song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-0: de 'gron po dag cig dang phrad nas de 'gron po rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa las 'gron po de dag mi rgod kyis bcom nas bud med de mi rgod kyi sde dpon gyis rang gi khyim du khrid de chung mar bya bar byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo @208a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-1: de dang lhan cig tu nyal bar byas pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-3: ji ltar byas na 'dis bdag gi lag nas gzung bar mi nus pa'i thabs shig bdag gis bya'o snyam nas skra ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-10: thogs nas khang phugs su zhugs te 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-11: mi de'ang khang phugs der song ste bud med de dang lhan cig tu dga' ba nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-12: bud med des ral gri thogs bzhin du de'i steng du brgyugs nas khyod dgar yang thar du ma re zhig ces byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-13: mi de 'jigs shing skrag nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-15: bdag la srog gi sbyin pa mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-16: de nas bud med de na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-17: khyod gson por 'dug tu rung ba'i thabs gcig cig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-18: gal te khyod kyis deng phyin chad nga la 'dod pa dang ldan pas sgrub par mi byed la nga su la'ang sgrog par mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-19: khyod gson por 'dug tu rung ngo zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-20: mi rgod kyi sde dpon gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-21: khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-22: zhes byas nas yid ches pa'i mnas bsgags te bud med de khyim de nyid du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-23: de nas mi rgod kyi sde dpon gyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-24: bdag gis 'di nam du gso zhing 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208a-25: bdag gis 'di thabs kyis btsong bar bya'o snyam nas de des smad 'tshong ma zhig la btsongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-0: @208b smad tshong mas de la bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-2: deng phyin chad 'dir 'dug la smad tshong ma gyis shig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-3: de nas bud med de na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-4: bdag la smad tshong ma ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-6: skyes pa gzhan la reg mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-8: bdag gis de'i phyir nor yongs su btang ste khyod nyos pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-11: de nas bud med des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-12: 'dir yang thabs de nyid bya dgos so snyam nas de kho na bzhin du srin mo'i cha lugs su zhugs nas smad tshong ma'i thog tu brgyugs te nags khung gi srin mo ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod kyi khyim du zhugs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-13: khyod da dung gson zhing 'dug gam zhes byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-14: bud med de 'jigs shing skrag nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te bdag la srog gi sbyin pa mdzad du gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-15: de nas bud med de na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-16: khyod gson por 'dug tu rung ba'i thabs gcig cig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-17: gal te khyod kyis nga 'di nyid na 'dug na las 'di lta bu byed du ma bcug lang su la'ang sgrog par mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-18: khyod gson por 'dug tu rung ngo zhes zer ro; ;smad tshong mas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-19: khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-20: zhes byas nas yid ches pa'i mnas bsgags te btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-21: de nas smad tshong ma che ge mo'i khyim na nags khung gi srin mo gnas so zhes kun tu gtam grags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-22: des 'jigs nas phyin chad su'ang khyim der mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:208b-23: de nas smad tshong mas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-0: bdag gis 'di khyim nas bskrad pa'i thabs lta ci yod @209a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-1: snyam mo; ;de nas de'i bu de'ang cher skyes nas de'i ming yang khyim bdag des 'byung po zhes btags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-2: de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-3: yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-4: de nas phyi zhig na khye'u de gsos pa'i pha de shi nas khye'u des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-6: pha shi bas na khyim 'di'i 'tsho tshis bdag gis bya dgos so snyam nas zong khyer te yul gzhan du song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-7: de mthar gyis gang na de'i ma de 'dug pa'i gnas der phyin nas de grong khyer der song ba las smad tshong ma de'i khyim dang thag nye ba zhig tu zong gzhag pa'i sar zong rnams bzhag nas 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-8: bud med de'ang gar song bar tshong ba rnams la 'dri bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-9: khyed kyis gnas ga ge mo zhig na tshong dpon che ge mo zhig 'dug pa'i bu shes sam zhes dri bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-10: de nas de dag na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-11: ded dpon 'byung po zhes bya ba yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-14: de nas phyi zhig na khye'u de nyid kyi g-yog 'khor rnams la dris na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209a-16: ded dpon 'byung po zhes bya ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-1: de nas bud med des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-2: ci'i phyir phas 'di'i ming 'byung po zhes btags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-3: byas pa rnams kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-4: khyim [?] bdag de la khyi 'byung po zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-5: des 'di lam po che nas khyer te 'ongs nas de la byin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-6: 'di'i ming yang 'byung po zhes btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-7: de nas bud med des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-9: 'di kho na yin no snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-10: de khye'u de'i thad du song nas khye'u de la gtam de dag thams cad bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-11: de lta bas na bu khyod ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-14: khyod kyi ma yin no zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-15: de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u des ma de smad tshong ma las nor gyis blus nas bdag gi khyim du khrid de khyim du bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-16: khye'u de'i pha yang rgya mtsho'i gru'i don grub nas rang gi khyim du 'ongs te pha ma gnyis kyi mgul nas 'jus nas rdzas rnams nang du bzhag pa'i 'og tu rang gi gnas su song na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-17: chung ma de mi snang nas des pha ma gnyis la dris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-18: bu mo de'i pha'i ming ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-20: des de'i ming las chung ma smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-22: rlangs pa'i bu mo de mi gda' na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-23: gar mchis zhes byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-26: khyod la chu gang ma byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-27: des nyes pa byas pas nged kyis khyim nas bskrad de btang ngo zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-29: de lto na bu 'dug pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-30: bdag gi bu kho na lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:209b-31: khyod kyis de bskrad pa nongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-0: zhes byas nas de de dang bral bas smyos te rlangs pa'i bu mo gar song zhig gu zhes bla zhing @210a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-1: song ste su la'ang 'dri zhing khyed kyis rlangs pa'i bu mo lta mthong ngam zhes zer nas de pha ma gnyis kyis thabs ji ltar byas kyang zhi bar byed ma nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-2: de sgren mor byung nas bla zhing gang na de'i chung ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-3: bu de 'dug pa'i gnas der phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-4: de nas de sgren mor byung la bla zhing phan tshun 'khyams pa las khye'u de'i khyim gyi sgor byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-5: khye'us mthong nas ma la bsnyad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-7: mi zhig smyos te rlangs pa'i bu mo gar song zhes bla zhing 'khyams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-8: zhes byas nas de thos ma thag tu bud med de dogs pa skyes te ma la de nyid jo bo ma yin nam snyam nas bdag nyid de'i thad du song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-9: mthong ma thag tu des mi de ngo shes nas des de rang gi khyim du khrid de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-12: rlangs pa'i bu mo de lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-13: zhes byas nas de thos ma thag tu mi des dran pa rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-14: de nas bud med des mi de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-21: bdag cag gi khyim du bzhud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-22: zhes byas nas bud med des mi de khrus byed du bcug nas kha sbu dag bcos te gos bskon nas mthar gyis rang gi khyim du dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-25: de'i tshe bud med du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-26: chos byin ma 'di nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210a-27: de'i tshe'ang 'di skye bo mang pos bstod nas tshegs chen pos tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-0: da ltar yang @210b 'di skye bo mang pos bstod nas tshegs chen pos tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-3: gcod pa rnam pa gnyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-5: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-6: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-7: lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-8: yi dvags kyi nang du rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-9: dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-10: mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-11: lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de phyir 'ong nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi bcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-14: btso ba la sogs ba'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-15: phyir 'ongs nas yi dvags rnams kyi bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-19: btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-20: dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-21: mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-22: lha rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-23: de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-24: skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:210b-25: de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-2: de na rgya mtsho chen po la byings rim pa gsum yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-3: chu'i byings dang po la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-4: dpag tshad nyi khri brgyad stong yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-6: chu srin nya zhes bya ba rnams gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-7: de dag gi lus la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-8: dpag tshad bdun brgya yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-9: gang gi tshe de dag bkres pa na de dag chu'i byings dang po nas gyen du thon cing kha gdangs te 'khod nas de'i nang na de dag pas ches chung ba'i srog chags gang yin pa de dag chu dang bcas par de rnams kyi kha'i nang du 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-10: de nas gang gi tshe de rnams kyi lto gang bar gyur pa de'i tshe chu de dag sos btsags nas phyir pho'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-11: lton srog chags 'khod pa de dag gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-12: zas kyi bya ba byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-13: chu'i byings gnyis pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-14: dpag tshad nyi khri lnga stong yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-16: chu srin nya mid ces bya ba rnams gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-17: de dag gi lus la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-18: dpag tshad stong bzhi brgya yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-19: de rnams gang gi tshe bkres pa na de dag chu'i byings dang po dang gnyis pa'i nang nas gyen du thon te zas kyi bya ba byed do; ;chu'i byings gsum pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-20: dpag tshad nyi khri lnga stong yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-22: chu srin nya mid mid ces bya ba rnams gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-23: de dag gi lus la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-24: dpag tshad nyis stong chig brgya yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211a-25: gang gi tshe de rnams bkres pa na chu'i byings dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i bar nas thon te kha zas kyi bya ba byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-0: de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen por chu srin nya mid ces bya ba zhig skyes nas de bas @211b ches chung ba'i chu srin gzhan rnams de'i drung du lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-1: de'i lus la dum bu dum bu rgyang grags gcig tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-4: dpag tshad brgya tsam gyi bar du bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-5: rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-8: yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-9: de sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas skyabs 'dod pa'i phyir thang la byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-10: de thang la byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-11: de'i las las skyes pa'i gnod sbyin lnga brgya byung nas de dag gis zhag lnga brgya'i bar du sta re lnga brgyas rtsib ma zhe gcig gcod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-12: de nas gang gi tshe de dag gis thabs de lta bus de'i rtsib ma thams cad bcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-13: de na tsha mi bzod pas skad po che phyung ste phyir yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gres nas 'gres pa'i khrag gis rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs shing 'dres la khrag gi mtsho bzhin du snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-14: de de'i nang du song nas yang srog chags de dag gis bza' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-15: de thang la byung yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-16: chu'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos sems can 'di las ci zhig byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:211b-18: las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong zhig gu snyam ste sems pa la zhugs nas der ba gyi mtha' las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi bar du snyoms par zhugs kyang de'i tshe rabs kyi mtha' ma rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-1: dud 'gro 'ba' zhig tu skyes shing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnams rnyed pa tsam zhig shes par zad nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-2: bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par 'di'i las bdag la lung ston par nus pa gzhan su zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-4: ye shes gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-5: ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa yin no snyam nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-6: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bus bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-9: bdag gis skye bo mang po skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-10: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-12: 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-13: yi dvags kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-14: dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-15: mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-16: lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-17: slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212a-20: btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-0: slar @212b mchis nas yi dvags rnams kyi bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-4: brtso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-5: dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-6: mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-10: rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-11: rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la de dag skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-13: bdag dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du mchis pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-15: bdag de na mchis pa nas sems can lus dpag tshad nyis stong chig brgya mchis pa de lta bu zhig mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-16: de bas ches chung ba'i chu srin gzhan rnams de'i drung du lhags nas de'i lus dum bu rgyang grags gcig tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-19: dpag tshad brgya tsam gyi bar du bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-21: des sdug bsngal drag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-24: yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:212b-25: de na tshas nyam thag nas skyabs 'tshal ba'i slad du thang la byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-0: de thang la byung ba dang de'i las las skyes pa'i gnod sbyin lnga brgya byung nas de dag gis zhag lnga brgya'i bar du sta re lnga brgyas rtsib @213a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-1: ma zhe gcig gcod par bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-2: de nas gang gi tshe de dag gis thabs de lta bus de'i rtsib ma thams cad bcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-3: de na tsha mi bzod pas skad po che phyung ste phyir yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'gres nas de 'gres pa'i khrag gis rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs shing 'dres la khrag gi mtsho bzhin du gda'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-4: de de'i nang du mchis nas yang srog chags de dag gis za bar bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-5: de skam la mchis kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-6: chab kyi nang na mchis kyang rung ste sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-8: sems can des las ci zhig bgyis na; las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro'i nang du skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-9: de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnyed par gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-13: sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-14: des sdig pa'i las mang du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-16: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-17: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri bo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-18: de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri bo'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas des de nyid las chos thos te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213a-20: gzugs bzang blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-0: khyim thabs kyis de la smras @213b pa; bzang mo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-2: bcom ldan 'das las tshangs par spyod pa'i gzhi lnga mnos zin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-3: gal te khyod 'di nyid na 'dug na'ang ngas khyod la zas dang gos sbyin par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-4: 'on te skyes pa gzhan 'dod na'ang bdag gis khyod de la sbyin par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-7: bdag la skyes pa gzhan cang mi 'tshal gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-9: jo bo nyid kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-11: byad gzugs bzang ba'i phyir skye bo mang pos yid smon du bya ba zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-12: gnas de nyid na sna la gtogs pa zhig 'dug pa des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-13: ma la bdag bud med de dang phrad par bya ba'i thabs lta ci yod snyam nas phyi zhig na des gser dngul mang po khyer te dbang po dag dang chas te dge bsnyen de'i thad du song nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-15: kho bo rgyal po'i sku don zhig la gzhig tu 'gro dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-16: rdzas 'di dag bdag gis der bskur mi nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-17: bdag de nas phyir ma log gi bar du re zhig khyod la gtams so zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-19: rang bzhin gyis drang po zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-20: des rdzas de dag dbang po'i mdun du blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-21: de nas sna la gtogs pa des de'i lag tu rdzas de dag gtad de rang gi khyim du song nas thang gcig tsam lon pa dang dge bsnyen de'i thad du song ste smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-23: ngas khyod la rdzas gtams pa de dag phyir byin cig ces byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:213b-24: dge bsnyen des de'i rdzas dbang po med bzhin du phyir byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-1: rdzas de dag rang gi khyim du bzhag nas phyir yang dpang po rnams khrid de dge bsnyen de'i thad du song nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-3: kho bos rgyal po'i dkor [?] khyod la gtams pa de dag phyir byin cig ces byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-6: bdag gis khyod la phyir byin zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-7: sna la gtogs pa des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-8: ngas khyod las cung zad kyang blangs pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-9: zhes byas nas sna la gtogs pa des dpang po de rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-10: khyed dge bsnyen 'di'i byed stangs la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-11: bdag gis dpang po rnams kyi mdun du 'di la rdzas gtad nas 'dis bdag gcig po'i lag tu ga la sbyin zhes smras nas des de rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid de shags kyis pham par byas nas rang gi khyim du khrid de 'breng rlon gyis bzhus nas dam rab tu byas nas de'i rtsib ma thams cad bcom nas de de kho na'i rkyen gyis shi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-12: de nas sna la gtogs pa des mi de bu'ang med pas khyim rdzas thams cad kyang bsdus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-13: chung ma de'ang rang gi khyim du khrid nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-15: khyod kyi phyir bdag gis bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-18: khyod kyi khyim thab yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-20: nga'i chung ma yin no zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-21: de nas dge bsnyen gyi chung mas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214a-22: bdag gis 'di'i rus bu'i mchod pa'ang ma bgyis par khyod dang lhan cig tu ji ltar 'du bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-0: re zhig bdag gis sngar 'di'i rus bu la mchod @214b pa bgyis la de'i 'og tu gdod jo bo ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-1: zhes byas nas de thos ma thag tu sna la gtogs pa des dge bsnyen de'i rus bu dur khrod du khyer te rus bu bsregs nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-2: bud med des me 'bar ba'i nang du mchongs nas de'ang de nyid du shi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-3: de nas sna la gtogs pa de rgyu des sems khong du chud de bdag gis bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu ci dang ci bya bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-4: bdag bud med dang phrad pa la'ang ma phan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-5: 'di la'ang bdag gis mi rigs pa 'di lta bu byas kyis med do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-8: de'i tshe sna la gtogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-9: chu srin de nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-10: des dge bsnyen de 'breng rlon gyis bzhus te rtsib ma rnams bcom nas de'ang de'i rkyen gyis shi bar gyur pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sna la gtogs pa de sems can dmyal ba'i nang du skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-12: lo stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas dud 'gro'i nang du skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-13: dud 'gro'i nang nas shi 'phos shing dud 'gro'i nang 'ba' zhig tu skyes nas sdug bsngal de lta bu sha stag rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-16: sems can de sdug bsngal de las nam thar par 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:214b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-1: 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid bzang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-3: de'i ring la sems can 'di'i las de zad de mir skyes nas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur te; der 'di'i sdug bsngal mthar thug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-4: de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur bar thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-5: des na stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du kha cig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-6: dro bar gyur pa bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-9: bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-10: 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-11: mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-13: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-15: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-17: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-19: rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-21: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215a-23: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-5: nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-8: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-9: 'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-12: dge 'dun la bab bar byas te bkod do ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-14: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-15: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-16: lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-17: yi dvags kyi nang du rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-18: dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-19: mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-20: lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-21: phyir 'ongs nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-24: btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-25: phyir 'ongs nas yi dvags rnams kyi bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-29: btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-30: dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-31: mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-35: rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:215b-36: de dag gis de thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-0: @216a *// skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-1: de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po yi dvags kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-2: de rgya mtsho'i 'gram du 'greng ba dang des der yi dvags lus che ba la ro smad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-6: de'ang 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te phan tshun du rgyu la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-7: de'i las las skyes pa'i lcags kyi mche ba can gyi sengge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-10: dred la sogs pa de'i drung du lhags nas de'i sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-11: las las skyes pa'i mi dag kyang lhags nas ral gri rnon po dag gis ro stod gcod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-12: de'i ro stod gcig bcad na gcig shos 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-13: gcig shos bcad na'ang gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-14: rgyu des na sdug bsngal drag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-17: yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong la skad po che 'don cing phan tshun du 'bros te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-18: las las skyes pa'i mi de dag kyang de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba zhig mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-19: sems can 'dis las ci zhig byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216a-20: las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong zhig gu snyam nas des bltas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs @216b rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ste dge slong zhal ta byed par gyur nas des dge slong dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dgun gnas bcas pa rnams la phul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-1: dgun gnas bcas pa rnams kyi gos dang rnyed pa rnams bcad de dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams la phul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-2: gnyis ka las bcad de kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-5: gzhan dag la phul ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-8: bdag gis kyang yang dag par mngon sum du mthong mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-9: 'on kyang skye bo phal po che skye ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-10: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma la chos ston pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-12: mthong nas kyang des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-14: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la yi dvags kyi lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus yin no snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:216b-15: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:217a-0: 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal @217a *//
