K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:226b-10: btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:226b-11: slar mchis nas yi dvags rnams kyi bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:226b-15: btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:226b-16: dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:226b-17: mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:226b-21: rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-0: rgyu des na de dag skyo bar 'gyur la de ltar skyo bar gyur nas kyang gang du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur @227a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-3: bdag yi dvags kyi nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-5: bdag gis der sems can sha'i snag bu 'dra ba la gtsang khang phyur po tsam zhig mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-6: de sa la mchis na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-7: de la thog thag nas srog chags khab kyi mchu can sha stag 'tshal zhing mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-8: srog chags de drag 'tshal ches pas de gal te nam mkha' la 'phags na'ang de'i lus thams cad zhugs su 'bar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-9: rgyu des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-12: yid du ma 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-14: sems can des las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-15: las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu rnyed par gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-19: sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-20: des sdig pa'i las mang du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227a-22: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sems can de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste sde slong zhal ta byed par gyur nas des der dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor gang zag gcig bus spyad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-0: bsags te bzhag pa las de phyi @227b zhig na nad kyis thebs nas des nor de dag nye du rnams la sbyin par byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-1: de dge slong dag gis mthong nas bkag pa las de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-2: gal te 'di dag gis bkag pa lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-3: bdag gis ci nas de dag la'ang mi phan la bdag la'ang mi phan par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-4: de nas de khros bas nor de dag thams cad mes bsregs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-5: de'i 'og tu de de nas shi 'phos te shi nas yi dvags su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-6: des der dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor gang zag gcig pus spyad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-7: lus sha'i snag bu 'dra la gtsang khang phyur po tsam du gyur nas srog chags khab kyi mchu can dag gis bza' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-8: des der dge 'dun gyi dkor dang mchod rten gyi dkor dang 'tsho ba nar ma dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor mes bsregs pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-9: gal te steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags na'ang lus mer 'bar bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-10: sems can des las de lta bu byas pas na las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal de lta bu nyams su myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-11: de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi yid skyo bar gyur pa thugs su chung nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:227b-13: des na der kha cig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-4: bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-5: 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-6: mthong ba la snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do; ;kha cig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-7: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-9: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-10: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-12: rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-16: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-22: nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-24: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-26: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-27: 'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-30: dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-31: bur 'du shes zhes bya ba ni; gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228a-32: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa zhig 'dug pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-0: de don zhig la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi @228b tshal du song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-1: bram ze des bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-2: mthong nas kyang bram ze de bcom ldan 'das la bu'i 'du shes skyes te; de bu'i 'du shes kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul nas 'jus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-3: de nas dge slong dag gis bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul nas 'jus ba mthong nas bkag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-4: de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-7: bu la byams pa'i phyir nga'i mgul nas 'jus pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-9: gal te bram ze 'di nga'i mgul nas 'jur ma bcug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-10: kha nas khrag dron po byung ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-11: de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyi mgul nas 'khyud zin nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-16: shes pa thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:228b-17: des na bram ze des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-0: des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la @229a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-1: ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-3: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-4: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-5: de nas de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis dge slong tshur shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-6: tshangs par spyod cig ces bka' stsal nas tshig de skad ces bka' stsal ba'i mod la skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-8: bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur 'dug par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-10: lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-12: de bzhin gshegs pas tshur zhes bka' stsal pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-13: des na skra bregs lus la snam sbyar gyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-14: sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bgos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-15: mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lung phog nas des brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-18: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229a-19: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-0: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems @229b dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-1: tsandan na spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-2: rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-3: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-5: chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-6: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-7: de nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-10: mi stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das mthong yang sus kyang bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das la bu dang phrad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-11: zhes mchi zhing brgyugs te mgul nas 'ju ba ma bgyis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-14: nga 'das ma thag pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar phar gyur pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-15: sngon gyi bag chags de kho nas 'di nga la bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis bu dang phrad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-16: zhes zer zhing nga'i mgul nas 'jus pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-17: dge slong dag gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-18: btsun pa; gal te bram ze 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi 'das ma thag pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar yab tu gyur pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-19: ci'i slad du da ltar yang yab tu ma gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-21: sbyin pa la sred pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:229b-22: nges par 'byung ba la sred pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-0: tshe rabs thams cad du 'dis nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad byas nas der ngas smon @230a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-2: phyin chad 'di nga'i phar ma gyur cig ces byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-3: gzhan yang zas gtsang gis kyang kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yab tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-4: dge slong dag gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-6: zas gtsang gis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-9: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-10: der tshong dpon zhig gis bshos gsol nas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-12: skyes bu rin po che 'di lta bu'ang bdag gi bur gyur nas bdag gis de kho na mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces des der smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-13: zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-15: bram ze 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-16: las de'i rnam par smin pas dbul por yang gyur la rgas nas gdod rab tu byung lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230a-19: sbyin pa la sred pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-0: nges par 'byung ba la sred pa yin @230b na; 'dis dus thams cad du nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-1: rab tu 'byung ba'i bar chad byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-2: 'dis dus thams cad du nga'i sbyin pa'i bar chad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-3: rab tu 'byung ba'i bar chad byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di dbul por gyur la rgas nas gdod rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-6: bram ze 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-7: las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-11: der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-13: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:230b-14: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-0: de'i tshe de'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab @231a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-1: tu byung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-3: des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-5: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-6: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-8: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-11: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-12: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-13: zhing pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-14: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-15: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze dbul po zhing las kyis 'tsho ba zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-16: bram ze de'i zhing rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-17: bram ze de'ang sgrub phod pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231a-18: de nang par sngar thong gshol thogs nas zhing gi steng du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-0: de'i chung ma bram ze mo @231b de'ang bram ze de'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams khyer te zhing gi steng du song nas de gnyis ka zan zos te bram ze mo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-3: zhing de nyid na zhing las byed cing 'dug pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-4: de phye ma red khyim du 'gro ba na bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-5: bram ze mo de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-6: nyan thos chen po rnams mnyan du yod pa nas yang dang yang du phyi nang du gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-7: mthong nas kyang de gnyis bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-8: nyan thos chen po rnams la shin tu dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-9: de gnyis dga' bar gyur nas phan tshun gcig la gcig smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-10: bdag cag gnyis da ltar sdug bsngal bar gyur ba ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-11: sngon bsod nams ma byas pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-12: gal te da ltar yang bdag cag gnyis kyis dge ba'i las ci'ang ma byas na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-13: bdag cag gnyis 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang dbul po 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-15: de nas bram zes smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-17: bdag cag gnyis nor gang gis sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byed par 'gyur ba'i nor de lta bu bdag cag gnyis la cing bar yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:231b-21: dge sbyong goo ta ma 'di ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:232a-16: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:232b-0: mthar gyis gnas @232b pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:232b-1: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:232b-2: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:232b-3: chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:232b-4: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:232b-29: 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:232b-40: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:232b-41: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233a-1: nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233a-2: bram ze de dang bram ze'i chung ma gnyis gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgongs nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod pa logs su chas te gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233a-4: bram ze mo de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233a-5: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233a-6: bcom ldan 'das zhing 'di nyid du bdag cag gnyis kyis phul ba'i bshos zhal gcig gsol du ci gnang zhes byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gza' bran gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233a-7: de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das cad mi gsung pas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te bram ze de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233a-9: bram ze mo de gnyis kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233a-10: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas ci bzhed pa bstabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233a-11: rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-3: bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis kyi rkyen du 'tsham pa'i chos bstan nas gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-5: bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas ring po ma lon par bram ze de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-6: bram ze mo de gnyis kyis smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-7: kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gnyis kyi dbul ba'i rgyun chad par gyur cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-9: gzhan du ma gyur cig ces byas nas bram ze dang bram ze mo de gnyis kyis de skad ces brjod pa'i mod la zhing de las skyes pa'i nas kyi myu gu thams cad gser du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-10: mthong nas kyang bram ze mo des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-12: bdag cag gnyis kyi smon lam ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-14: rgyal po la ma gsol bar bdag cag gnyes kyis longs spyad par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-16: de nas bram ze des de thos ma thag tu rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po la gsol pa; lha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-17: bdag cag gi nas zhing las gser gyi myu gu skyes kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-18: lhas sku skal bzhes par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:233b-19: zhes byas nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:234a-0: ma la bram ze 'di ma smros sam @234a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:234a-3: mthong nas kyang yang bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:234a-4: ma la de ltar gyur kyang srid dam snyam nas des rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba rnams btang ste de dag der dong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:234a-5: gser gyi myu gu ma mthong nas de dag phyir log ste rgyal po la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:234a-7: sems la dbang ma mchis te; de na gser gyi myu gu ga la mchis byas so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:234a-12: lhas sku skal bzhes par gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:234a-13: de nas rgyal pos bsam pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:234a-19: khyod kyis ji tsam yongs su btang ba nga la byin cig ces byas so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-4: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-6: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dang 'tsham pa'i chos bstan nas gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-8: de nas phyi zhig na bram ze de nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gror byas kyang sos par byed ma nus nas shi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-9: de shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-10: de nas bu des kyang pha'i rus bu de bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las thag mi ring bzhig tu phyung ste bsregs nas de dur khrod de nyid na 'dug cing mya ngan byed la sdug bsngal zhing smre sngags 'don te brang rdung zhing pha gcig pha gcig ces cho nges 'debs te phan tshun du 'khyams shing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-11: lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-12: chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-15: las gang gis skyes snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-16: de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237a-17: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhar skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237b-0: bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bkur sti @237b byas te skyabs su song ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs par des mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237b-1: de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237b-2: bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang bsnyen bkur byed du 'gro ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237b-3: bdag gi cha ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237b-4: bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237b-5: de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237b-6: lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237b-7: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237b-10: sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog autpa la dang padma dang ku mu da dang padma dkar po dang mand'a ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang nas mi snang bar gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog autpa la dang padma dang ku mu da dang padma dkar po dang mand'a ra ba rnams kyi gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:237b-14: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238a-1: zer gyur ba'i lha'i bu des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te des bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas mi snang bar gyur te des bltas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238a-2: bu de dur khrod na 'dug cing shin tu mya ngan byed la sdug bsngal zhing smre sngags 'don te brang rdung zhing pha gcig pha gcig ces tshe de 'don te phan tshun du 'khyams shing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238a-3: mthong nas kyang bu'i thad du song ste smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238a-6: mya ngan byar med par gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238a-7: nga'i phyir ha cang mya ngan ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238a-18: khyod kyis las ci zhig byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238a-19: lha'i bus smras pa; sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bkur sti byas te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238a-20: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238a-22: de las khyod kyi legs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238b-0: zhes byas nas lha'i bu de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te @238b sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238b-1: bram ze'i khye'u des kyang pha'i ngag mnyan nas pha'i mya ngan spangs te bcom ldan 'das la yang dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238b-6: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238b-7: des na bram ze des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238b-8: des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238b-10: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238b-11: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:238b-12: de nas de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-0: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs @239a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-1: nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-2: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-3: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-4: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-5: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-6: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-7: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-8: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-9: de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-12: bram ze'i khye'u ma dad pa 'di phas dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-13: 'di rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-15: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-16: 'das pa'i dus na'ang bram ze khye'u 'di ma dad pa las phas ji ltar dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la bzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239a-17: 'di rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-0: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la @239b skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi shu khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-3: skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa; lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-5: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na bram ze zhig gnas pa las /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-7: gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-16: nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-17: mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-18: snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-19: srid srung gi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-21: mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-25: kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-26: de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-27: de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-28: chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dga' bar gyur nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:239b-29: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240a-0: de nas phyi zhig na de shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas lha'i nang du @240a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240a-2: bram ze'i khye'u de ni shin tu mya ngan byed cing smre sngags bton te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240a-6: nga ni mya ngan byar med par gyur gyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240a-19: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240a-21: de las khyod kyi legs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240b-0: 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang bdag gis yon tan @240b gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240b-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240b-2: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240b-3: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240b-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u'i phar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di nyid yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240b-8: de'i tshe'ang 'dis pha la brten te dad pa rnyed nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240b-9: da ltar yang 'dis pha de nyid la brten nas dad pa rnyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240b-10: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:240b-13: ko ka li ka zhes bya ba ni gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241a-0: gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang nad gsos dang sman zod rnams rnyed par gyur nas des der @241a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241a-9: moonggal gyi bu gnyis kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241a-10: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong ko ka li kas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241a-11: moonggal gyi bu gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241a-12: bdag gis btsun pa khyed gnyis la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi'i //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241a-19: bdag cag gnyis ni; dgon par rab tu dben pa'i gnas ga ge mo zhig tu song ste gnas par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241a-20: ko ka li kas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241b-0: der bzhud na'ang bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur @241b bgyi'i; khyed gnyis kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241b-1: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241b-5: zhes sab kang ri 'dir su la'ang mi zer na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241b-7: gal te khyod kyis 'ga' zhig la byas na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241b-8: bdag cag gnyis kyis khyod la ma spran par gnas de nas gud du 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241b-9: ko ka li kas smras pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241b-14: de nas de'i tshe sab kang ri de nyid na khyim bdag cig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:241b-15: khyim bdag de dge slong ko ka li ka la mngon par dga' bar gyur nas de de la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242a-0: @242a *// bdag khyim na gnas pa btang la bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo snyam ste tshe dang ldan pa ko ka li ka ga la ba der song nas smras pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242a-16: song la pha ma gnyis la gsol cig dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242a-18: de nas 'phags pa ji ltar dgyes pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242a-19: zhes byas nas de pha ma'i thad du song ste smras pa; yab yum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242a-20: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242a-21: pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242a-23: khyod shi ste 'bral bar 'gyur yang srid kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242a-24: khyod gson bzhin du gnang bar ni mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-0: de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa ko ka li ka ljongs dag tu don bsgrub ba zhig byung nas des lhan cig gnas @242b pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-1: nye gnas rnams tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-2: moonggal gyi bu gnyis la gtad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-5: ljongs dag tu bgyi ba cung zad cig la mchi'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-6: dge slong 'di dag btsun pa gnyis kyis lung dbog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-7: yid la bgyid pa'i lung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-8: zhu ba'i gnas stsal du gsol zhes byas nas des de gnyis la 'khor rnams gtad de ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-9: de song nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-10: moonggal gyi bu gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-11: dge slong 'di dag la nges par 'byed pa'i cha bzhi'i dge ba cung zad yod dam med cig gu snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-12: de gnyis kyis bltas na yod par gyur te bdag cag gnyis kho na la rag lus par mthong nas dge slong de dag la tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bus ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-14: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-15: rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis bskul nas de dag gis brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-17: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-18: de dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas khyim bdag gi bu des kyang pha ma la gsol te gtsug lag khang du song nas de dge slong de dag gi thad du song ste smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-19: btsun pa ko ka li ka gar mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-23: bdag de las rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:242b-24: dge slong de dag gis des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-0: khyod la ko ka li ka ci @243a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-1: dgos; tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-5: de gnyis las rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig ces byas so; ;de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de dga' ches nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-6: moonggal gyi bu gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de gnyis kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-7: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus kyang de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-11: rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-12: des na khye'u de stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthong po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-13: des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-15: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-16: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243a-17: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-0: zhes byas nas btsun pa sh'a ri'i bus @243b smras pa; bu; khyod la pha ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus khye'u de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-8: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-9: des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas pha ma gnyis bden pa rnams la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-10: sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsh'a la'ang btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-11: de nas phyi zhig na lha rnams kyis sab kang ri la sgra bsgrags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-12: kye khyed kyi grong 'dabs na dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-13: moonggal gyi bu gnyis 'khod bzhin du khyed bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir de gnyis kyi thad du ma dong na khyed kyis ci rnyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-14: ci zhig ni; legs par rnyed ces byas so; ;de nas sab kang ri la gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams kyi sgra thos nas sde tshan nas sde tshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-15: pha tshan nas pha tshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-16: dga' sde nas dga' sder 'dus shing tshogs te sab kang ri las byung nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-17: moonggal gyi bu gnyis ga la ba der song ste lhags nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te bkur sti byed pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-18: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-19: moonggal gyi bu gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-20: bdag cag gnyis kyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti byung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:243b-22: bdag cag gnyis kyis kyang ko ka li ka la dam bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-0: @244a *// gal te khyod kyis bdag cag gnyis dgon pa 'di na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-1: zhes su la'ang ma bsnyad na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-2: bdag cag gnyis dgon pa'i gnas 'dir gnas par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-3: de ste bdag cag gnyis kyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti zhig byung bar gyur na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-4: bdag cag gnyis kyis khyod la'ang ma sbran par dgon pa'i gnas 'di nas 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-5: zhes byas zin to snyam nas dgon pa'i gnas de nas dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-6: ko ka li ka'i slob ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-7: nye gnas de dag gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-8: bdag cag kyang slob dpon gnyis dang thabs cig tu mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-9: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa; khyed ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-10: rgyal po'i khab tu dengs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-12: logs shig nas 'dul bar bya ba'i don byed cing 'gro dgos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-13: thams cad der dong na zas kyis kyang brel bar gyur na mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-15: de nas de thos ma thag tu dge slong de dag lam gud nas rgyal po'i khab tu dong ste 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-16: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-17: moonggal gyi gyi bu gnyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-18: lam gzhan zhig tu zhugs te de gnyis chas pa na char ba khad kyis dal nas bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-19: ri sgab de na ri'i phug cig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-20: der ma he rdzi mo zhig sngar nang du song ba las de mi gnyis kyis nyal po byas nas de gnyis de nas phyir song ba'i 'og tu dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244a-21: moonggal gyi bu gnyis der 'ongs nas phug sgo na 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-0: de nas de dag @244b dgon pa'i gnas de nas dong ba'i 'og tu dge slong ko ka li ka'ang rang gi gtsug lag khang der 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-1: de der 'ongs na slob ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-2: nye gnas rnams mi snang nas des dge slong gzhan dag la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-4: nye gnas de dag gar dong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-6: dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-7: moonggal gyi bu gnyis dang lhan cig tu dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-8: de nas de thos ma thag tu dge slong ko ka li ka shas cher khros te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-9: de gnyis kyis bdag la ma bzlugs par song ba'i steng du bdag gi 'khor rnams kyang kha drangs te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-11: de de na 'dug pa na khyim bdag de'ang thad du 'ongs nas ko ka li kas khyim bdag de la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-13: khyod kyi bu de gar song /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-16: su'i thad du rab tu byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-18: sh'a ri'i bu'i thad du rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-19: de nas de thos ma thag tu de lhag par yang de gnyis la rab tu khros so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-20: gzhan yang sab kang ri la gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyis snying na ba'i tshig gis zher btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-21: btsun pa ko ka li ka /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-22: dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-23: moonggal gyi bu gnyis 'dir byon pa lta zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-24: khyod kyis bdag cag la ma sbran to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-26: de nas de yul yul por gyur nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:244b-27: de gnyis kyis bdag gi 'khor khrid de song mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-0: bdag gis kyang rang gi 'khor yal bar @245a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-2: bdag song la rang gi 'khor rnams bkug ste phyir 'ong bar bya'o snyam nas sham thabs bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-3: moonggal gyi bu gnyis gar na dong ba'i lam de nyid du chas nas de mthar gyis phug de kho na'i sgor phyin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-4: dge slong ko ka li kas dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-5: moonggal gyi bu gnyis phug sgo de nyid na 'khod pa mthong nas de de gnyis kyi thad du song ste rkang pa la phyag btsal nas kun dga' ba'i gtam byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-6: de nas de rnams kyi skad ma he rdzi mo des thos nas phug nas phyir byung ste song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-7: de nas de la ko ka li ka khu 'phrig zos nas tshe dang ldan pa de'ang mtshan brtag pa la mkhas pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-8: des bltas na ma he rdzi mo de la mi gnyis kyis nyal po byas par rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-9: de nas de mthong ma thag tu de la 'di lta bu'i sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-12: sdig pa'i chos dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-13: zhes tshig rtsub cing brlang bas zhe bcad nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ste 'od ma'i tshal du zhugs nas lhung bzed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-14: chos gos bzhag ste dge slong mthong ngo cog la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245a-17: sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-0: de nas skabs de dge slong dag gis thos @245b nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-1: de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ko ka li ka la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-2: ko ka li ka ko ka li ka /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-3: khyod dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-4: moonggal gyi bu gnyis shin tu des ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-6: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la sems dga' bar gyis sdig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-7: khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-9: sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-12: bcom ldan 'das la dad cing glo ba ches kyis kyang dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-15: sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-16: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ko ka li ka la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-17: ko ka li ka ko ka li ka /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-18: khyod dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-19: moonggal gyi bu gnyis shin tu des pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-21: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la sems dg'a bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-22: khyod yun ring por gnod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-24: sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re; des gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-26: bcom ldan 'das la dad cing glo ba ches kyis kyang dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-29: sdig pa'i dbang du gyur pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:245b-30: de nas dge slong ko ka li kas lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das gyis bka' stsal pa ltar ma byas nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246a-1: thag tu dge slong ko ka li ka de'i lus thams cad 'bras yungs 'bru tsam sha stag gis gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246a-2: de nas de'i 'og tu 'bras rgya sran tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246a-6: ka pid ta'i 'bras bu tsam sha stag gis gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246a-7: de nas dge slong ko ka li ka'i kha nas khrag dron po skyug cing bdag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246a-11: zhes zer te lus thams cad nas rang khrag 'dzag cing 'bab bzhin du lus dang bral te shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba chen po padma ltar gas pa chen por skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246a-12: de der skyes nas cher gyur te lus dpag tshad mang po dang ldan pas khyab par 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246a-13: de nas de'i las las skyes pa'i mi dag gis kha nas lce phyung ste lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar ba'i steng du lcags kyi phur pa 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag gis brgyangs nas de'i lce de la rmon pa dor lnga brgya byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246a-14: thams cad kyang 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246a-15: las las skyes pa'i rmon glang de dag gi rmig pa'ang spu gri'i so 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-0: 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar @246b ba sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-1: de dag gis phyogs gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba'i phyogs de dang der kun tu gcod cing kun tu gtub la kun tu dmyal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-2: de'i kho ra khor yug nas kyang lcags kyi mche ba can gyi khyi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-7: dred la sogs pa dag lhags nas lus las sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-8: steng gi nam mkha' las kyang lcags kyi mchu can gyi bya rgod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-10: chun lag rnams lhags nas sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-11: gzhi des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-13: tsha ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ste skad dan chen po 'don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-14: de nas lha kha dog 'phags pa gsum nam sros pa na bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-15: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas lha gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-17: lhas byin gyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i dge slong ko ka li ka ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-23: moonggal gyi bu gnyis la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po padma ltar gas pa chen por skyes lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:246b-25: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-2: kha nas sta re byung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-3: nyes par smra ba'i tshig brjod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-4: des ni bdag nyid gcod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-5: gang zhig smad 'os skye bo bsngags pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-6: bsngags bar 'os pa'i skye bo smod byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-7: des ni kha nas rtsod pa de bsags te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-8: rtsod pa des ni bde ba myong mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-9: 'di na cho los bdag skugs pham pa'i tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-10: rtsod pa gang yin de ni chung ba yin; ;bde bar gshegs pa la sems sdang ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-11: rtsod ba gang yin de ni shin tu che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-12: ngag dang yid kyis sdig byas 'phags la smad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-13: des na lo grangs dung phyur phrag 'bum dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-14: bye ba phrag ni sum cu rtsa lnga'i bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-15: sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:247a-16: lha gsum gyis de skad ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252a-9: bdag gis sems can la phan pa byed mi nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252a-10: ma la bdag grong khyer rdul ldan du rten bcas te 'dug par bya gor ma chag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252a-11: bdag der 'dug pa dang skye bo phal po che la phan pa byed nus par 'gyur ro snyam nas dgon pa'i gnas der ji srid du dga' ba de srid du gnas nas g-yog 'khor lnga brgya dang chas te ri dvags kyi pags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252a-16: blugs gzar rnams khyer te grong khyer rdul ldan du phyin nas de nags khrod cig tu gnas bcas te yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil po phubs nas 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252a-17: de nas grong khyer rdul ldan na gnas pa'i skye bo mang pos de lus mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252a-20: mthong nas kyang skye bo phal che ba de dag drang srong de la shas cher dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252a-21: de dag dga' ba skyes nas drang srong de la bkur sti byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-0: yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bsnyen bkur @252b byed do; ;drang srong des kyang der 'ong ba de dag la dus dus su chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-1: de dag gis kyang de las chos thos nas kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-2: drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-3: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-5: khyim na gnas bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas la drang srong de'i thad du'ang dus dus su blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-6: de phyin chad dka' thub can de dag gi thad du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-8: de nas phyi zhig na dka' thub can de dag gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-10: grong khyer rdul ldan du gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams bdag cag la bkur sti byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-15: grags pa'i mchog dang shin tu ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-16: drang srong 'di 'ongs nas bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti chad par gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-17: bdag cag gis ci nas kyang drang srong 'di g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa yul 'dir mi 'dug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-18: 'di med na bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti phyir yang snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-21: drang srong 'di 'ongs nas bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti chad par gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:252b-22: bdag cag gis grong khyer thog thag tu 'dir yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-0: @253a *// tshangs par spyod pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-1: khyed 'di la bkur sti byed par ma sems shig ces byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-2: de skur ba btab pas 'jigs shing skrag nas yang na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-5: bdag cag 'chi bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-6: 'di med na bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti phyir yang snga ma kho bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-7: zhes byas nas de gnyis g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa grong khyer rdul ldan du dong nas lam po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-10: sum mdo dag tu 'khod nas drang srong der yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka gtong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-13: sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-14: 'dod pa la spyod pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-16: tshangs par spyod pa ma yin te; 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-17: khyed la sgyus 'drid pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-18: khyed 'di la ha cang bkur sti byed par ma sems shig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-19: de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag drang srong de la mi dga' bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-23: tshangs par spyod pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-24: zhes mi dga' bar gyur nas de phyin chad de la bkur sti mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-25: bla mar me byed; ri mor mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-26: mchod par mi byed la blta ba'i phyir yang 'gro bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253a-27: de nas drang srong gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-0: skye bo mang po 'di dag bdag la bkur sti @253b byed; bla mar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-4: 'di dag bdag la bkur sti mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-9: ci las gyur snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-10: des bltas na dka' thub can de gnyis g-yog 'khor dang bcas pas grong khyer rdul ldan thog thag tu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar ka btang bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-11: mthong nas kyang yang bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-12: grong khyer rdul ldan 'dir bdag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyar kas phog pa ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-14: bkur sti'i gcugs las byung ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-15: ma la bdag gis 'di na ci yod pa thams cad spangs te sngon gyi dgon pa'i gnas de nyid du gnas bca' bar bya'o snyam nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag khrid de sngon gyi dgon pa'i gnas de nyid du song ste 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-16: de nas drang srong de song nas dka' thub can de dag gi rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-17: bkur sti snga mkho bzhin du gyur te gzhi des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-18: de dag shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-21: de'i tshe dka' thub can g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-22: dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-23: moonggal gyi bu gnyis kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-24: der de gnyis rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:253b-25: bkur sti'i dbang du gyur nas drang srong de la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skur pa btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-1: can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-2: de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang dag ba ma yin pa'i skur pa btab pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-3: da ltar srid pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-4: gnas tha mar gyur te dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i bar du'ang dge slong ko ka li kas mang po'i nang du mi bden pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-5: yang dag pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-7: rdzun gyi tshig gis skur pa btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-8: dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-10: dge slong ko ka li kas las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-11: las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba padma ltar gas pa chen por skyes la der skyes nas kyang de'i lce la rmon pa dor lnga brgya byung bar gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-12: de bzhin du de'i glo g-yas g-yon nas lcags kyi mche ba can gyi khyi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-16: dred la sogs pas sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-17: de bzhin du steng nas kyang lcags kyi mchu can gyi bya rgod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-19: chun lag rnams kyis sha rnams bcad cing bcad cing za bar bgyid lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-20: de bzhin du glo g-yas g-yon nas lcags kyi shing shal ma li'i tshal grub par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-21: gal te de na tsha mi bzad de glo bsgyur na'ang steng nas lcags kyi mdud thud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254a-23: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-0: mdung rtse gcig pa rnams 'bab @254b lags; bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-2: moonggal gyi bu gnyis la sems sdang bar byas pa'i phyir ro ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-3: thang bcad ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-4: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-5: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-6: lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-7: yi dvags kyi nang du rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-8: dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-9: mi'i nang du rgyu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-10: lha'i nang du rgyu bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-11: phyir 'ongs nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyis gcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-14: btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed do; ;phyir 'ongs nas yi dvags kyi bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-18: btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-19: dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-20: mi rnams kyi tshol khros sha thang ba'i sdug bsngal rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-24: rnam par 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-25: de dag gis thos nas skyo bar 'gyur la skyo bar gyur nas kyang gong du khyad par 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:254b-26: de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po sems can dmyal ba'i nang du rgyu bar chas nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te sems can dmyal ba mnar med par phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255a-0: @255a *// de der sems can lus che la lus kyis dpag tshad mang po khyab par 'dug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255a-1: de'i las las skyes pa'i mi rnams kyis de'i kha nas lce phyung ste lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba'i steng du brgyangs nas lcags kyi phur pa 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba dag gis thang bcad nas de'i lce de la rmon pa dor stong byung ste rmon pa de dag thams cad kyang dngar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255a-2: rmon glang de dag kyang las las skyes pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255a-3: de rnams kyi rmig pa de dag thams cad kyang spu gri'i so 'dra la 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu 'bar ba sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255a-4: de dag gis sa phyogs gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba'i phyogs de dang der kun tu gcod cing kun tu gtub la kun tu dmyal bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255a-5: gzhi des na des sdug bsngal drag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255a-7: tsha ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba zhig mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255a-8: mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255a-9: sems can 'dis las ci byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255a-10: las de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu rnyed par gyur cig gu snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-0: des rab kyi mtha' las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi bar du snyoms par zhugs @255b kyang sems can de'i sdug bsngal gyi mtha'i rtsad mchod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-1: sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos shing sems can dmyal ba rnams 'ba' zhig tu skyes pa nyi tshe zhig mthong bar zad do; ;mthong nas kyang bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-3: bcom ldan 'das ye shes gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-4: ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas pa mnga' ba ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam nas mnar med pa nas mi snang bar gyur te mnyan du yod par phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na bzhugs te chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-7: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te; bdag bcom ldan 'das la sems can de'i lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-8: 'di yin no snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-9: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-11: 'di na bdag gi lugs kyis dus dus su sems can dmyal bar rgyu bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-12: yi dvags kyi nang du rgyu bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-13: dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:255b-14: mi'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:256a-0: @256a *// lha'i nang du rgyu bar bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:256a-1: slar mchis nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:256a-4: btso ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gang lags pa de dag mi rnams la rjod par bgyid lags so //
