K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-9: bdag cag gi lus la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-11: pha mas de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-13: che bar grags pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-14: che bar grags pa yin pas na de dag la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-16: de nas des bltas na rgya mtsho chen po de'i nang na klu bdag cag pas ches ngan pa de dag gi lus la'ang klu'i bye ma mi 'bab par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-17: mthong nas kyang pha ma la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-21: che bar grags pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-22: che bar grags pa yin pas na 'di dag gi lus la klu'i bye ma mi 'bab bo zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-23: 'di na bdag cag pas ches ngan pa gzhan dag kyang yod na; ci'i phyir de dag la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-24: klu'i phye ma mi 'bab la bdag cag la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-26: pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-28: bdag cag pas ches ngan mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-31: bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-32: de'i phyir de dag gi lus la klu'i bye ma mi 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:282b-33: de nas de thos ma thag tu bu de shin tu dga' bar gyur te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-1: yum; de dag gi skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-2: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams ga las byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-4: yul dbus 'dir sangs rgyas byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-7: de las de dag gi skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-8: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-11: bdag mchi bar gnang bar mdzod cig dang; gang dag gi mthus bdag gi lus la klu'i bye ma 'bab par mi 'gyur ba'i skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-12: bslab pa'i gzhi de dag bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i bye ma'i sdug bsngal 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-18: bslab pa'i gzhi de dag blangs pa las ma bsrungs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-19: gzhi de las sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-21: yi dvags su skyes nas sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-23: sdug bsngal de'i brgya'i char yang mi phod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-24: stong gi char yang mi phod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-25: 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283a-28: bdag gi lhan cig skyes pa'i bye ma'i sdug bsngal 'di zhi bar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig gi phyir yang ci nus kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-0: zhes smras nas klu'i bu des lha'i me tog autpa la dang padma dang ku mu da dang padma dkar po rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste rgya mtsho @283b chen po'i nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-1: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na chos ston cing bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-2: de nas klu'i bu des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mdzes shing yid du 'thad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-5: thugs dul zhing rnam par zhi ba'i mchog dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-6: gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dbal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-7: mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-8: dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das pa lha'i me tog autpa la dang padma dang ku mu da dang padma dkar po rnams kyis gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-9: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-10: de nas de'i klu'i bye ma med par gyur nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-12: bdag gi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po sel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-13: bde ba dang yid bde ba rnam pa du ma thob par mdzad pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-14: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin ji ltar bsab par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:283b-15: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-0: bdag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad @284a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-1: kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-2: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams sbyar 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-6: gzhan dag la'ang phan gdags dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par dbyar bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-10: song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa yul ma ga dhar ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro 'dod pa de chos gos dag dang chos shig ces sbron cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das ji srid dgyes pa'i bar du mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs bzhugs nas rgyal po'i khab ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-14: de nas klu'i bu des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284a-15: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284b-0: bdag gis @284b lam 'dir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284b-1: mnyan du yod pa nas rgyal po'i khab kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol; de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu de la cang mi gsung bas gnang nas klu'i bu des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas mnyan du yod ba nas rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi lam thog thag tu rdo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams bsal te stor khung dang phyi sa'i 'dam dang phyag dar nyal nyil dang shing dang bong ba rnams med par byas nas sa gzhi gsing ma sngon pos khyab par 'dug la spos chab kyis chag chag btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284b-3: ngos g-yas g-yon nas me tog gi shing dang 'bras bu'i shing dag gis khyams 'dra bar dkris te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:284b-4: ne tso dang ri skegs dang rma bya dang shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-0: bkod ma dang mtshe'u dang lteng ka dang rdzing rnams me tog padma dang autpa la dang ku mu dang padma dkar po @285a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-1: rnams kyis gang bar 'dug la ngang pa dang dur pa dang zal mo rnams skad 'byin pa dag sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-2: lam thog thag tu bum pa gang ba dang chu shing gi sdong bu dang phreng ba'i mchog rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-4: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-11: gzims khri kha dog sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams bshams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-12: dar gyi bla bre rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-14: zla ba dang zla ba tshes pa dang me long rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-16: mgul gdub dang gdu bu rgyan cha dang dpung rgyan dang rgyan phreng dang se mo do rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-18: me tog sna tshogs kyis chun po rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-19: khebs par byas te sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-20: der mi mang po dag kyang sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-22: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la gdugs rtsibs brgyab dag 'dzin par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-23: la la ni; bla bre 'dzin par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-25: rnga yab gser gyi yu ba can dang nor bu'i yu ba can dag gis g-yob par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-27: autpa la dang padma dang ku mu da dang padma dkar po rnams 'thor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285a-29: bcom ldan 'das la bdug pa dang phye ma dang spos dang me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'brang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-0: des phyogs gang dang gang @285b du bcom ldan 'das mnyel bso ba'i phyogs de dang der gdan rnams sprul par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-1: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la sbyar ba'i btung ba dang hvags dang 'dam bu kha ra dang kha ra rnams kyis kyang tshim par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-2: phyogs gang dang gang du bcom ldan 'das gshegs dgongs mdzad pa'i phyogs de dang der ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-3: rnam pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang sprul par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-4: dge slong rnams la'ang rkang ba bkru ba'i spos chu dang rkang pa bsku ba'i til mar spos can 'bul bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-5: de nas phyi de nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-6: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-7: bla mar byed; rim gro byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-8: mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gshegs gshegs pa las rgyal po'i khab tu byon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-10: rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka landa ka gnas par bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:285b-11: de nas klu'i bu des yang bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-0: 'od ma'i tshal 'di nyid du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong @286a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bu de la cang mi gsung bar gnang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-4: klu'i bu des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas 'od ma'i tshal de nyid du zla ba gsum gyi yo byad thams cad sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-5: sangs rgyas la sogs ba dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'bum ri ba'i na bza' phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-6: dge slong gzhan rnams la'ang so sor yo byad thams cad phul nas sems dad par byas te gral dpon gyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-7: de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i chos nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-10: de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams byung nas kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-14: 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286a-15: sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang du 'bod dang du 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-0: chu bur can dang chu bur rdol dang so tham tham dang kyi hud @286b zer dang aa chu zer dang autpal ltar gas pa dang padma ltar gas pa dang padma ltar gas pa chen por song nas tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-1: bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo; ;grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni do bar gyur te 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-2: de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-3: de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-4: kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-5: 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-6: de nas de dag dad pa skyes pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-7: de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-9: 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-10: 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-11: de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar gyur ba'i las de zad de lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:286b-12: steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-0: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams dang 'brul dga' rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang tshangs ris rnams @287a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-1: dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang tshangs pa chen po rnams dang 'od chung rnams dang tshad med 'od rnams dang 'od gsal rnams dang dge chung rnams dang tshad med dge rnams dang dge rgyas rnams dang sprin med rnams dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che ba rnams dang mi che ba rnams dang mi gdung rnams dang gya nom snang rnams dang shin tu mthong rnams dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-2: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-3: nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-4: sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-5: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-6: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-8: bag yod spyod par byed pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-9: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-10: sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-12: de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-13: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-15: ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287a-16: mdun logs su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-0: sems can @287b dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-1: zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-2: dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-3: zhabs kyi rting bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-4: yi dvags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-5: zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-6: mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-7: pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-8: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-9: phyag g-yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-10: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-11: phyag g-yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-12: lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-13: lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-14: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-15: zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-17: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-18: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-19: dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-20: de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur mi snang bar gyur to; ;de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-21: tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:287b-22: mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-1: rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-2: nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-3: yang tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-4: rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-5: sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gis ram pa'i rgyur gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-6: rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-7: padma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-8: brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-9: dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-10: thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-11: bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsal bar gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-12: rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-13: mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi nar 'dzum mi ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-14: gang gi don du dba' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa; ;de ni khyod la skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-23: rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288a-25: khyod kyis klu'i bu 'dis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la lam dang rgyal po'i khab 'dir bkur sti 'di lta bu byas pa mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-0: klu'i bu 'di dge ba'i @288b rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa brgya'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-1: bskal pa brgya'i bar du lha dang mi'i nang du nyid mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor bar gyur nas srid pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-2: gnas tha ma la mir skye ba thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-3: rab tu byung nas slob dpon med pa dang man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos mngon sum du gyur te rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas nas rang sangs rgyas smon lam legs par btab pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-5: de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos yin no ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-7: gleng gzhi yangs pa can na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-8: de'i tshe sde dpon sengge zhes bya ba chung ma dang rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas bud med de'i lus thog thag nas phyi sa'i dri 'byung la phyi sa za ba'i sems skyes nas chung mas sde dpon sengge la bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-9: de nas sde dpon sengge bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-10: ma la bdag gi chung ma 'di lus srul po 'ga' zhig gis brlams grang snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-11: des ltas mkhan rnams la bstan na ltas mkhan rnams na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-12: 'di lus srul pos brlams pa ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-14: sems can lto na 'dug pa de'i mthu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:288b-15: sems can de nam btsas pa de'i tshe 'di'i skyon de med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-0: de nas zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang de'i bu mi sdug pa'i sna grangs bco brgyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas de btsas ma thag @289a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-1: tu khyim de thog thag tu phyi sa'i dris gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-2: de nas bud med de dag gis spos sna tshogs kyis byugs te mal du bzhag kyang de'i lus las phyi sa'i dri med par ma gyur nas chung mas sde dpon sengge la bu de bstan par mi 'dod pa las bud med gzhan dag gis de la bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-3: jo bo khyod kyi sras ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-5: mi sdug pa'i sna grangs bco brgyad dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-6: lus thog thag nas phyi sa'i dri byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-7: des khyim thog thag phyi sa'i dris gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-9: de nas de thos ma thag tu sde dpon sengge shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-11: 'di ltar bdag gis bu btsas su zin kyang 'di kho na ltar skyon can du gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-12: bu 'di lta bu bdag la ci dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-13: mun sros pa'i 'og tu khyim nas byung ste khyi rnams la sbyin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-14: de nas de'i bar skabs su sde dpon sengge dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas bden pa rnams mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-15: des bden pa rnams mthong nas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-18: sngon mi dge ba'i las rnams kyis lus 'di lta bur skyes par gyur nas ngan ngon zhig gsos la cher skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289a-19: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289b-0: 'on kyang tshe rabs gzhan du lus 'di lta bur skye bar mi 'gyur ro snyam @289b nas 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus gsos nas de cher skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289b-3: khyod sngon gyi las mi dge ba rnams kyis lus 'di lta bur skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289b-5: bsod nams kyi zhing rkang gnyis pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289b-7: bkur sti cung zad cig byas kyang 'bras bu chen po zhing phan yon che bar 'gyur gyis; de la bkur sti byos la smon lam legs par thob cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289b-8: khyod kyis las de yang bar 'gyur yang srid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289b-9: zhes byas nas des kyang pha'i ngag mnyan te sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bkur sti byed pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289b-10: de nas phyi zhig na khye'u des pha ma la gsol te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas bshos gsol zin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289b-14: bcabs par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:289b-19: rang bzhin thugs su chung nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-0: des na khye'u des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du @290a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-1: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-2: des bden pa mthong nas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-3: gal te bdag lus 'di lta bur ma gyur na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-4: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas chu bo rnams las rgal bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-5: sbyor ba rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-7: 'bad par bya ba zhig na snyam du sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-8: sems bskyed ma thag tu khye'u de'i byad bzhin mi sdug pa de dang dri mi zhim pa de med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-9: de nas de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-10: de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-12: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-13: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290a-17: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-0: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar @290b mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-1: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-2: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-3: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-4: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-5: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-6: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-7: de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-9: dge slong 'dis las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-10: las de'i rnam par smin pas mi sdug pa'i sna grangs bco brgyad dang ldan par skyes la lus thog thag nas phyi sa'i dri 'byung bar gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-12: rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu mi sdug pa ma mchis par gyur te bzang por gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-16: 'di nyid kyis las 'di lta bu byas shing bsags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:290b-18: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri khrod kyi grong zhig na bram ze gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig gnas pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-0: lang tsho'i rgyags pas dregs nas @291a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-1: dge sbyong dang bram ze du ma la brnyas par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-2: de nas phyi zhig na de khang thog tu song ste bram ze'i khye'u dag gis bskor cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-3: sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-4: bas mtha'i gnas mal gyis 'tsho ba'i bse ru lta bu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-5: rang sangs rgyas shig ri khrod kyi grong khyer der bsod snyoms la song nas des bza' ba dang bca' ba bzang po dag rnyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-6: de khyer zhing bram ze de'i khyim gyi sgo drung nas lam po che'i logs su chas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-7: de bram ze des mthong nas bram ze de'i mdun na'ang gyo mo phyi sas gang ba zhig 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-8: des mtho brtsam pa'i bsam pas rang sangs rgyas de'i steng du gyo mo de rkang pas phul nas de'i gos rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-10: lhung bzed rnams gos par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-11: rang sangs rgyas des yar bltas pa dang bram ze de dga' ches nas bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur te lus kyi las kyis mtho brtsams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-12: de nas rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291a-15: 'di'i ra mda' bya dgos so snyam nas stong gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-0: glog 'gyu ba'i cho @291b 'phrul rnams bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-2: rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad ba skye bar 'gyur bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-3: de shing sog les bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag btsal te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-4: skal pa chen po mar sbyon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-5: bdag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i ra mda' mdzod ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-6: de nas rang sangs rgyas des kyang de la snying brtse ba'i phyir sa la babs nas de bram ze das khyim gyi nang du spyan drangs nas gos de rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-9: spos kyis byugs te spos chus khrus byed du bcug nas chos gos bzhan dag phul te rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas zhabs la phyag btsal te bzod pa gsol nas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-10: bdag gis yon gnas kyi mchog 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa'i las 'di'i skal ba can du bdag ci nas kyang ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-11: 'di la bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-12: ci nas bdag gang dang gang du skyes par 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-13: 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-14: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:291b-15: yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-0: brgya la las mi dge ba 'di gdon mi za ba kho nar 'bras bu smin par gyur na @292a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-1: yang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu bdag gi mi sdug pa med par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-2: bzang por gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-5: de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-6: sengge'i bu 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-7: des rang sangs rgyas de la gnod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-8: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der mi sdug pa'i sna grangs bco brgyad dang ldan par skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-9: lus thog thag nas phyi sa'i dri byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-10: des der slar bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-12: 'di bas kyang ches khyad par 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-13: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-14: yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292a-15: brgya la las mi dge ba 'di gdon mi za ba kho nar 'bras bu smin par gyur na'ang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu bdag gi mi sdug pa med par gyur te bzang por gyur cig ces byas pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-0: 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bas kyang lhag par ches khyad par du 'phags pa mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas nas nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs @292b nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas la rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu'ang mi sdug par med par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-2: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-4: sde dpon sengges las ci zhig bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-5: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-6: 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dge bsnyen du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-9: der 'dis sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-10: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te 'chi khar smon lam btab pa; kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-12: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so; ;dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-14: de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dge bsnyen du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:292b-15: sde dpon sengge 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:293a-1: sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:294b-23: de nas de'i blo skyes pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-1: 'dun 'byed pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyi rnal 'byor yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-4: kha don byed pa'ang med la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-8: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad mdzad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-11: 'phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas dge 'dun bye bar gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-13: nga nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-14: dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-17: las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-18: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-21: rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-22: las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-25: skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295a-26: lus can dag gi las rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295b-0: bskal pa brgyar @295b yang chud mi za //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295b-5: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na drang srong gi gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295b-8: bram ze de yang rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295b-10: bdag cag la'ang phan gdags par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295b-12: khyed la ci zhig gis phan gdags par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295b-13: bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295b-14: kha ton bslab pas phan gdags par gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295b-17: gzhan gyi slob ma la slob par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295b-18: de nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:295b-19: bdag cag gi mkhan pos kyang gos zas kyis ni; sdud par byed mod kyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296a-2: bdag cag gi mkhan po bor te khyod kho na la bdag cag brten par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296a-5: gal te de lta na bdag gis khyed gos zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296a-6: kha ton bslab pas bstang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296a-7: de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis drang srong de gcig pu grogs med par bor nas bram ze de la brten to; ;des kyang de dag gos dang zas dang kha ton bslab pas bsdus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296a-10: de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296a-12: der ngas drang srong de'i 'khor gyi dbyen byas pa de'i las de'i rnam par smin pas nga lo grangs mang po dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296a-15: de nas nga shi 'phos nas kyang gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der ngas 'khor dang phye ba myong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296a-16: da ltar gyi bar du'ang las de'i rnam par smin pas lhas byin gyis nga 'khor dang phye ba yin no ////

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-4: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-7: 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-8: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-9: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-10: rnam par thar ba brgyad la bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-11: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-12: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-13: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-14: chos nyid kyi nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-15: nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-24: su ni; gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-26: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-34: ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:296b-36: nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-0: 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags @297a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-1: pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-9: sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-10: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-11: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-12: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-13: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgongs nas mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te nags khrod der gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-15: drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-16: mthong nas kyang gcig la gcig smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-17: kye dge sbyong goo ta ma g-yel ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-18: mang du len cing 'tsho ba spong ba btang ba de 'dir 'ongs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-19: de 'ongs kyang bdag cag gis lag brdas spyil po bstan pa ma gtogs par de la smra bar mi bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-20: kun tu smra bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297a-21: zhes smras nas drang srong lnga brgya po rnams cang mi zer bar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gis de dag gi @297b thad du gshegs te thams cad la bka' stsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-1: de dag gis lag brdas spyil po bstan pa ma gtogs par bcom ldan 'das kyi lan ma gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyil po de'i nang du gshegs te rtsva stan bshams pa la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag drang ba'i phyir bkod ma 'khyil ba'i mtshe'u de bskams par byin gyis brlabs so; ;de nas drang srong lnga brgya po da dag gis mtshe'u de na chu med par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-3: mthong nas kyang de dag sdug bsngal chen po skyes te lha la gsol ba 'debs shing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-4: 'on kyang de dag gi mtshe'u der chu ma byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-5: de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir lhas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag la rang gi lus bstan nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-7: khyed bdag cag bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-8: skom pas gdungs te ci bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-10: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-11: bcom ldan 'das nyid la skyabs su deng zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus chu'i mtshe'u 'di snga mkho bzhin du 'ong ngo zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-13: de nas drang srong lnga brgya po de rnams kyis lhas bsgo ba thos nas bcom ldan 'das sla shin tu dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:297b-14: dga' ba skyes nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la bzod pa gsol te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam @298a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-5: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-6: de nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de nyid la 'dug cing 'khod bzhin du bden pa rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-7: de dag gis bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-9: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-10: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po rnams dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-12: de rnams kyis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-14: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-15: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-16: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298a-17: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-0: rig pas sgo @298b nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-1: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-2: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-3: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-4: bcom ldan 'das ni de dag rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas nags khrod de nas mi snang bar gyur te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-5: de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de rnams nags khrod de nyid na 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-7: khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-8: thos nas kyang nags khrod der rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-9: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-11: dge slong lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-12: des de'i rnam par smin pas 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-14: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:298b-16: 'di rnams kyis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-1: na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-2: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-3: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-4: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-6: de'i gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung nas der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-7: 'di ltar bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-9: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-10: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par shog cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-13: de'i tshe rab tu byung ba'i dge slong lnga brgya po de dag ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299a-14: de rnams kyis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-0: yang dag par rdzogs @299b pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-1: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-2: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-4: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-7: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-8: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-9: thos pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-10: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-11: de'i che mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-12: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-13: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa; rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:299b-14: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300a-5: smin ma stug pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300a-6: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags te 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khus bskyed bsrings nas rdzing gi nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300a-7: de nas gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300a-8: yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300a-9: de nas de'i phas de'i dgun sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300a-11: dbyar sa'i khyim kha gsum du brtsigs te skyed mos tshal yang kha gsum du bcas nas chung ma chen ma dang 'bring ma dang chun ma gsum yang blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300a-12: de khang bzang gi steng na 'dug cing bud med 'ba' zhig gi rtsed mos rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300a-13: de nas phyi zhig na de dpyid kyi dus su shing ljon pa mang po me tog rgyas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-0: ne tso dang ri skegs dang khu byug dang rma bya dang shang shang te'u @300b rnams skad 'byin pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi nags khrod du g-yog 'khor dang bcas par dong nas pheg rdob pas rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-1: bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-2: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-3: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-5: 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-6: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-7: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-8: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-9: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-10: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-11: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-12: chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-13: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-25: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-33: ngas ngan song nas phongs [?] mtho ris dang thar ba dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:300b-35: nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las la gnas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-0: 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las @301a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-1: 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-9: sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-10: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-11: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-12: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-13: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu de gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyed mos tshal de dang nye ba zhig tu skyed mos tshal gcig sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-15: skyed mos tshal der skye bo phal po che la tshangs pa'i gsung gis chos ston par brtsams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-16: de nas khyim bdag gi bu des skyed mos tshal de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi gdangs grag pa thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301a-17: thos nas kyang bdag gis sngan chad mir gyur pa'i skad kyi gdangs 'di lta bu ma thos so snyam ste ngo mtshar du bzung nas bdag der song la skad kyi gdangs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa su yin pa brtag go snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-0: de nas sgra gar grags pa logs su skyed mos @301b tshal gcig shos kyi nang du song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-1: khyim bdag gi bu de g-yog 'khor dang bcas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing sba bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-2: me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-3: me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-4: mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-5: mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-6: blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-7: mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-9: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la'ang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-10: de ltar mthong nas kyang khyim bdag gi bu de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-11: dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:301b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-0: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te de thos nas khyim bdag gis bu des stan de kho na la 'dug bzhin du 'jig @302a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-2: des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-9: khyod kyis pha ma la byas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; gzhon nu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-14: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams ni pha mas ma gnang bar rab tu 'byin par mi mdzad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-15: pha ma la gsol te phyir shog cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-16: de'i 'og tu khyod kyi sla bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-19: zhes gsol nas khyim bdag gi bu de pha ma'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-21: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302a-22: de nas pha ma gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-0: bdag cag gis 'di bzlog @302b mi nus so snyam nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-3: khyod kyis gang gi tshe cung zad khyad par 'ga' zhig thob par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag cag la bltar shog cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-4: de nas de ltar bgyi'o; ;zhes smras nas khye'u de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-6: bdag pha mas gnang ba lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-7: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-8: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-9: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu de dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-13: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-14: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-15: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-16: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:302b-17: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:303a-1: par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:303a-2: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba /
