K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:379b-17: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-0: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze'i rigs che @380a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-2: phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-3: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-4: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-5: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa lus 'phags zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-6: des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las; phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-7: de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-8: mdog bzang la gser gyi kha dag can; mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-13: smin ma stug pa zhig btsas te de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes rigs dang mthun par ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-14: khye'u 'di bram ze lus 'phags kyi bu yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-15: de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming lhag 'phags zhes gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380a-17: de nas khye'u lhag 'phags 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-0: de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang aom zhes bya ba dang bho zhes bya ba dang gtsang sbra dang @380b cho ga dang thal ba blang ba dang ril ba thogs pa dang nges brjod kyi rig byed dang mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang snyan tshig gi rig byed dang srid srung gi rig byed dang mchod sbyin bya ba dang mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang sbyin pa dang blang ba dang kha ton bya ba dang kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnams drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-1: de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad la byang bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-2: gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad kyang tshar bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-3: de nas phyi zhig na bram ze lus 'phags kyi sems skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-4: mchod sbyin bya'o snyam mo; ;de'i 'og tu yang sems skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-5: dge sbyong goo ta ma 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-7: thams cad gzigs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-10: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ci'ang mi gzigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-12: thugs su mchud pa ci'ang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-13: bdag gi mchod sbyin yan lag 'ga' tsam gi sgo nas kyang nyams par gyur na mi rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-14: bdag dge sbyong goo ta ma'i thad du song la dri bar bya'o snyam nas rgod ma dkar mo dang sbyar ba'i shing rta la zhon te gser gyi 'kha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:380b-15: gser gyi ril ba thogs shing bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis bskor nas mnyan du yod pa nas byung ste rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-0: ji srid du bzhon bas 'gro bar bya ba'i sa de srid du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa @381a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-1: las babs te rkang pas kun dga' ra bar song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang mngon sum du yang dag par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-2: yang dag par mgu ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te mjug brtul nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-3: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze lus 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-5: 'dir bdag gis mchod sbyin chen po brtsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-6: mchod sbyin chen po bgyi ba'i slad du khyu mchog lnga brgya yang sdong po la btags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-7: ba lang dang ma he dang ma he mo dang bzhon pa dang be'u dang be'u chung ngu dang ra dang lug dang srog chags phra mo rnams kyang sdong po la btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-8: mchod sbyin bgyi ba'i slad du bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag kyang bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-9: nyi 'og gi dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyang phyogs gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-10: ljongs gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi mchod sbyin de lta bu nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du mnyan du yod par lhags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381a-11: bcom ldan 'das goo ta mas ci nas bdag gi mchod sbyin yan lag 'ga' tsam gyi sgo nas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mchod sbyin de kho na las @381b brtsams nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-1: des na bram ze lus 'phags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-2: bram ze'i khye'u lhag 'phags gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-3: de nas lhag 'phags kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-4: phyin chad bdag cag bram ze rnams ston mo stsal ci 'tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-5: bram ze lus 'phags kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-8: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol te yon phul ba'i 'og tu de'i lhag ma las bram ze rnams la'ang sbyin par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-9: de nas lhag 'phags kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-11: ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-12: de nas bram ze lus 'phags stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:381b-13: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su bshos gsol bar ci gnang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze lus 'phags la cang mi gsung bas gnang nas bram ze lus 'phags kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom @382a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382a-1: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382a-2: de nas de mchod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin nas phyu mchog thams cad kyang btang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382a-3: ba lang dang ma he dang ma he mo dang bzhon pa dang be'u dang be'u chung ngu dang ra dang lug dang srog chags phra mo sna tshogs kyang btang nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382a-4: phyogs bzhi nas rlung bsil bar ldang gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382a-5: khyed song la deng phan chad rtsi mchog ma nyams pa la zo zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382a-6: chu ma glongs pa rnyog pa med cing drangs pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382a-8: des srog chags phra mo sna tshogs de dag kyang bkye nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382a-9: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chur bka' ste bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382a-10: btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsos lags na; bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bder te bram ze lus 'phags kyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te @382b byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-1: de nas bram ze lus 'phags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-2: bram ze'i khye'u lhag 'phags kyis sangs rgyas la sogs ba dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-3: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-4: rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-5: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas re re la ras zung re phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te gsang sder ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-9: bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-13: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so; ;bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas der bram ze thams cad khros te 'di skad du ltos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:382b-14: bdag cag gi phyir mchod sbyin brtsams pa las dge sbyong goo ta ma la byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-0: de nas bram ze lus 'phags kyis bram ze thams cad bdag cag la ji ltar khros pa de thos nas thos ma thag tu bram ze lus 'phags @383a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-1: bram ze de dag gi thang du song ste smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-2: khyed la dge sbyong goo ta ma ci gnod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-3: bdag gis khyad kyi yon bshams pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-5: bram ze rnams kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-6: nged la phyin chad khyod kyi yon mi dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-7: zhes smras nas de spad gnyis gsad par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-8: de nas de spad gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-9: 'di rnams kyis bdag cag gsad du 'ong ngo snyam nas bros te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la gtam de rgyas par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-12: bdag cag gnyis khyim na gnas pa gtang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-14: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-15: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-16: bdag cag gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'chal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de gnyis la lung yang phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-18: de gnyis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383a-20: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-0: de nas dge slong rnams @383b kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-3: bram ze'i khye'u lhag 'phags bram ze de dag gis dgum par bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-4: de kho nas skyo bar gyur nas rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-6: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-7: 'das pa'i dus na'ang 'di gnyis bram ze 'di rnams kyis gsad par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-8: de dag kho nas skyo bar gyur nas rab tu byung ste tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-10: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-13: skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-14: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-16: de'i tshe bram ze zhig gis mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-17: mchod sbyin byed pa der bram ze gzhan zhig gis 'thab mo brgal te de khros pas bram ze de la lag chas bsnun nas bram ze de'ang lag chas bsnun pa des shi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:383b-18: gzhi de las bram ze thams cad khros te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384a-1: sbyin pa longs spyod par mi byed do zer zhing bram ze ma yin par brtsis nas dmod pa la zhugs te gsad par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384a-2: de nas bram ze de spad gnyis bram ze de dag gis 'jigs nas bros te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384a-3: de gnyis drang srong smra ba'i gnas su song nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384a-4: de nas de gnyis kyis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384a-5: yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob nas de gnyis kyis 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384a-6: 'di ltar bdag cag gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du rab tu byung ste tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci'ang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384a-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384a-8: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384a-9: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so; ;dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384b-0: de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du bram ze spad gnyis rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de gnyis @384b ni; bram ze lus 'phags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384b-1: lhag 'phags 'di spad gnyis kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384b-2: de'i tshe'ang 'di gnyis bram ze rnams kyis gsad par byas nas 'chi pas 'jigs shing skrag ste rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384b-3: da ltar yang 'di gnyis bram ze rnams kyis gsad par byas nas 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag ste rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384b-4: de gnyis der rab tu byung ste tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384b-5: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384b-6: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384b-8: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:384b-11: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-0: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra @385a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-1: bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-3: bam po nyi shu gnyis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-4: ston pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-5: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-6: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-7: des thabs zlar babs pa las chung ma blangs nas de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-8: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-9: de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de'i bu snga phyir gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-11: de bzhin du bu bdun btsas nas des de dag gi btsas ston rgyas bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385a-12: rigs dang mthun par ming btags nas 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas gang gi tshe de dag cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang shod dgod pa dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang sba ba dang dgram pa dang gos brtag pa dang nor bu brtag pa dang rin po che brtag pa dang spos brtag pa dang sman brtag pa dang glang po che brtag pa dang rta brtag pa dang go mtshen brtag pa la bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-0: yi ge mkhas pa dang klog mkhas pa dang mdzangs pa dang bya ba la gsal pa dang yid gzhungs pa dang @385b brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-1: phyi zhig na phas de dag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-2: nga'i tshig gis khyed khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la rten chos shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-4: tshe phyi ma'i phan pa la 'dzung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-6: de'i bu drug gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-7: bdag cag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la rten bca' ci dgos zhes zer nas de'i tshig ma mnyan te bu gcig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-8: 'od srung rdzogs byed la dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-10: kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-12: smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-14: mi pham skra'i la bcan la dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-16: k'a tya'i bu nog can la dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-18: gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu la dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-20: pha'i ngag nyan nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la rten bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-21: des de la brten pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-23: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-24: de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de'i bu che bas 'od srung rdzogs byed g-yar drangs te zan phyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:385b-26: kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu g-yar drangs te zan byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-0: smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can g-yar drangs te zan byin @386a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-2: mi pham skra'i la ba can g-yar drangs te zan byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-4: k'a ty'a'i bu nog can g-yar drangs te zan byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-5: drug pas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu g-yar drangs te zan byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-6: de nas bdun pas phu bo de dag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-7: khyed kyis rang rang gi ston pa la zan byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-8: bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bshos gsol gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-9: der khyed kun gyis kyang bdag gi grogs gyis shig ces byas nas khye'u des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs so; ;spyan drangs nas de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-10: bca' ba gtsang ma mang po sta gon byas te nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te chu ra bkang ste bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-11: btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas khyim bdag gi bu de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386a-14: de nas khyim bdag de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386b-0: bu 'khor dang bcas pas sangs rgyas @386b la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386b-1: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386b-2: rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386b-3: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te gsang sder ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386b-6: bcabs par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de bu dang 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386b-11: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386b-12: des na khyim bdag de bu dang 'khor dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te khyim bdag des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:386b-13: bcom ldan 'das la brten nas bdag sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-1: dang mi'i nang du gom pa 'dor du stsal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-2: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-6: ngan song gi sgo rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-7: bcad; mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-9: yun ring po nas goms pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-10: mthar gtugs te zhi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu bdag la na bza' dang zhal zas dang gzims cha dang gdan dang snyun gsos dang sman zong rnams bzhes bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-15: khyim bdag gzhan dag gi don yang bya dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-16: thong zhig ces bka' stsal te bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs nas khyim bdag gi phus bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-17: bdag gis khyim na gnas pa btang la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas pha ma la bzlugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387a-19: bdag lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-0: @387b bsnyan par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-1: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-5: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-6: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-7: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-8: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-9: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-10: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-11: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-12: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:387b-14: khyim bdag 'di'i bu drug lta ba du ma 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-0: phan tshun mi mthun par smra ba las nu bo tha chung gis lta ba gcig tu mthun pa la bkod nas de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon @388a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-1: mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-3: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-4: ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na'ang spun drug po 'di rnams phan tshun mi mthun pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-5: nu bo tha chung 'di kho nas gcig tu mthun pa la bkod nas de rnams kyang drang srong la rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-6: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-8: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na yul dbus kyi rgyal po bdun rang rang gi yul na rgyal po byed pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-9: de rnams phan tshun mi mthun te dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-10: de nas phyi zhig na yul k'a shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-11: bdag gis nyi 'og gi rgyal po 'di dag thams cad thabs ci zhig gis bsdum par bya snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-12: de'i tshe yul k'a sh'i'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi yul na dka' thub kyi gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-13: rdzu 'phrul tshe zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-14: de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388a-15: bdag gis drang srong de la bcol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-0: des 'di rnams kyi bsdums byed nus par 'gyur ro snyam nas drang srong de ga la 'dug pa der song ste rkang pa la phyag @388b btsal nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-1: nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug po 'di dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-3: dus dus su skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-4: de bas na khyod kyis thams cad bsdum par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-6: de nas drang srong des k'a shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-7: de nas k'a shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis drang srong nges cang mi smra bas gnang bar rig nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-8: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po drug po rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te yul w'a ra n'a sir lhags nas grong khyer thams cad dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas bskor te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-9: de nas k'a shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis drang srong de la spran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-10: de thos ma thag tu drang srong de gnas de kho na nas rgyal po drug po gang na 'khor pa der nam mkha' la song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-11: de nas de mthong ma thag tu rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug po de rnams drang srong de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-12: dga' bar gyur nas drang srong ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rkang pa la phyag btsal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdung du 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:388b-13: de nas drang srong des de dag la chos bstan nas thams cad mjal du ma byed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-0: de dag gis mjal du ma byas nas drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i sems @389a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-1: skyes so; ;de nas de dag gis gcig la gcig bzlugs nas yul yul du song ste rang rang gi bu rgyal por bcug nas sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-2: de dag der rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-3: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-6: de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-8: de'i tshe rgyal po drug po phan tshun mi mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-9: spun drug po phan tshun mi mthun par smra bar gyur pa 'di dag kho na yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-10: de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-11: nu bo tha chung 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-12: de'i tshe'ang drang srong des phan tshun mi mthun pa de dag 'dum nas de dag kyang rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-13: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-14: da ltar yang 'dis spun drug po phan tshun lta ba mi mthun par smra ba rnams lta ba gcig tu mthun par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-15: de dag kyang rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389a-16: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-0: khyim bdag bu @389b dang g-yog 'khor du bcas pa 'dis las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-1: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyang 'di rnams kyis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-3: bu bdun yang rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-5: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-8: 'di rnams kyis gang du smon lam btab lags bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-10: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-13: skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-14: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-16: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de'i bu spun drug phan tshun lta ba mi mthun par smra bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:389b-17: khyim bdag de'i bu tha chung ni; sangs rgyas la dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-0: des phu bo thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la btsud nas de dag thams cad kyis pha ma la gsol @390a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-1: te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas de dag gis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-3: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-4: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-5: khyim bdag des kyang sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-6: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi khar smon lam btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-8: de'i tshe'ang bu bdun po 'di dag nyid bdag gi bur gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-9: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390a-10: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-0: de'i @390b tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-1: khyim bdag 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-2: des der sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-3: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te 'chi khar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-4: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-5: 'di dag kyang 'di'i bu kho nar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-6: bu 'di rnams kyis kyang tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa des na; dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-7: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-10: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-11: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-13: gling gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:390b-14: de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dgon pa'i gnas mal zhig tu yun ring du lon te skra dang kha spu ring zhing gos snyings par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:391a-0: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung @391a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:391a-1: la bzhugs te dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:391a-2: de nas dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po thag ring po zhig nas mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la brnyas pa'i sems skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:391a-3: tshe dang ldan pa dge slong skra dang kha spu ring zhing gos ngan la ma brtags pa'i cha lugs can 'di ga las 'ongs shig gu snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:391a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gi bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas dge slong 'od srung 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:391a-5: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu nga'i bstan pa'i don byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:391a-6: mdo sde dang chos mngon pa dang 'dul ba yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba yin la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:400b-2: mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:400b-6: khyod song la der 'dug ste nga'i yul srungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:400b-8: lhas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:400b-10: de der song nas kyang nyi 'og gi yul de bzung nas ci nas yul der gnod pa cung zad kyang byed mi nus par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:400b-11: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgas pa'i 'og tu chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:400b-12: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:400b-15: bdag rgas bas ring po mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:401a-1: nus na; 'dis na bdag shi ba'i 'og tu bdag gi blon po'i nang na gang zhig gis bdag gi bu dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:401a-4: rgyags shing bag med par gnas na gzhan su yod snyam ste brtags na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-073-001:401a-6: mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa /
